Title: 🇷🇺🪖 Again about light vehicles in the troops Yesterday Alexand...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖 Again about light vehicles in the troops Yesterday, Alexander Kharchenko again raised the topic of providing troops with light vehicles. Alas, the situation has not changed radically, and three years later, fighters mainly receive cars from volunteers, or even buy them themselves. Moreover, consumable components are needed for cars purchased with their own money. Mechanics have to spend their salaries on them - often the funds received from humanitarian aid workers are not included in the supply of the army.📌 Sometimes, as a counterargument to solving the problem, they name the price, they say it is expensive to give each platoon an SUV. And somehow the fact is omitted that this is still cheaper than paying millions for the deaths of those who could not be evacuated or rotated due to the lack of suitable vehicles. Since we were unable / did not want to create a front-line vehicle, in terms of mass numbers and reliability superior to -Loaf-, then you can go a different way. Now, after all, there is a campaign underway to transfer vehicles to military license plates as part of restoring order.➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️So why not, at the same time, accept the same L200 and Pajero for supply? There will be a compromise: some will be satisfied with -black license plates-, others will be able to officially receive consumables and even officially purchase such vehicles for the troops.➖➖➖➖➖➖But for now, some kind of unilateral restoration of order is coming out: if you really want to -legalize- vehicles from humanitarian workers , then isn’t it worth going to the end in this matter with a consistent focus on both balance and supply? #AFRF #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramWitnesses of BayraktarWhat kind of car is needed at the front? The answer is obvious. Soldiers need any type of vehicle. Everything that can move in space will be used for its intended purpose. Smart people are designing the ideal machine for the army of the future. And at this time, the killed -kopecks- and -fields- are transformed...

Title: 🇮🇩🇷🇺🖇 Against the background of sanctions against RT and the...
Description: 🇮🇩🇷🇺🖇 Against the backdrop of sanctions against RT and the US desire to prevent its work in the countries of the global South, when reporting a sudden deterioration in the health of the producer of the Indonesian bureau of the channel, the phrase -coincidences may not be accidental- comes to mind. So, such news, alas, no longer seems impossible. And we wish the employee of the RT bureau in Indonesia a speedy recovery and return to work, so that the American embassy in Jakarta can write reports on the decline in the influence of its media. #Indonesia #media technologies #Russia #USA @rybarSupport usTelegramRT in Russian❗️Last ​​week, the producer of the Indonesian bureau of RT refused persistent invitations from the American Embassy to visit them have a chat. And on Sunday night she was taken away in an ambulance with a bloody cough. Now she is out of contact, we are trying to find out from her relatives...

Title: 🇷🇺🪖 Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin announced that from Janua...
Description: 🇷🇺🪖 Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin announced that from January 1, 2025, participants and veterans of the Northern Military District will be able to receive a grant of up to 7 million rubles to start entrepreneurial activities in the field of agriculture. The initiative was included in the state program for the development of the industry as part of solving the problem attracting personnel to the agricultural sector, as well as the goals for employing veterans repeatedly voiced from high stands.📌 How exactly Whether this mechanism will work is another question. However, it should be noted: despite all the difficulties, the Russian state is taking very specific practical steps to support the participants of the Northern Military District in their integration into peaceful life. Moreover, in the foreseeable future, the relevance of this topic will increase exponentially. Therefore, such initiatives cannot but be welcomed: the main thing is that they function properly, and not in spite of them. #VSRF #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRIA Novosti Veterans of the Northern Military District will be able to receive a grant for engaging in agriculture, the amount is up to 7 million rubles, Mishustin said

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 Donald Trump's future national security adviser Mike Wat...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 Donald Trump's future national security adviser Mike Watz openly stated that the new American administration will insist on reducing the so-called. In Ukraine, the conscription age is up to 18 years. Recently, Western countries have been actively recommending that the Kyiv regime make such a decision. But the new authorities in Washington, apparently, will not stand on ceremony on this issue and will address it head on.➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️In fact, this is a response to the talk about Trump the peacemaker: the United States, under the old and new president, is still planning not to curtail -war to the last Ukrainian-, but only to intensify her.➖➖➖➖➖➖ Let us repeat that the Kyiv regime’s conscription of yesterday’s students is a condition for the continuation of Western military assistance. The United States also understands that if the Armed Forces of Ukraine have no one to fight with, then supplies of even the most modern weapons will not make a difference. Therefore, expecting any gifts from Trump after he takes office is at least irrational. And even in the event of potential negotiations, positions in them will in any case be determined by successes - on the ground -. #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Well, almost.❗️The future American administration of President-elect Donald Trump insists on lowering the mobilization age in Ukraine to 18 years. The corresponding statement was made on ABC by Trump's future national security adviser Mike...

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Last night, Israeli aircraft carried out one of the m...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Last night, Israeli aircraft carried out one of the most powerful series of strikes on Lebanese territory after signing a ceasefire agreement with Hezbollah. The hits occurred both at ammunition depots of the Lebanese group in the southern part of the country and at facilities on the border with Syria. According to a statement by the IDF press service, the reason for the attack was the inaction of the Lebanese army, which the Israelis had previously informed about the discovery of attempts by Hezbollah fighters to accumulate ammunition and use the border infrastructure to smuggle weapons. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Nevertheless, with the coming to power in Syria of supporters of the terrorist organization Hayat Tahrir al-Shamlivan group, it lost land transit from Iran through Syrian territory. And on the border itself, the tense situation has remained in recent days amid clashes between progressive jihadists and the Lebanese. ➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️In the meantime, Israel still has less than two weeks left before, according to a previously signed agreement with Hezbollah, it will be necessary to withdraw the units located there from southern Lebanon. However, the ultra-Orthodox government can always replay the agreement, once again accusing the Lebanese group of violating the agreement and declaring a continued threat to the country. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 Continuing the topic of military cooperation between...
Description: 🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 Continuing the topic of military cooperation between Russia and the DPRK: judging by the footage posted on the Internet, the North Korean analogue of the Tor air defense system on a wheeled base was seen in Russian battle formations. In a similar way, 107 mm were spotted in the Russian Armed Forces Koksan self-propelled artillery mounts, and even earlier — self-propelled long-range ATGM Bulsae-4 controlled via a fiber-optic cable. As we wrote earlier, you shouldn’t expect any very impressive performance characteristics from the samples of the gloomy Korean genius - there is no such wunderwaffe either in the DPRK, much less in the so-called Iran .➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️However, each such sample adds fire power - for the same reason, the RF Armed Forces do not hesitate to use old T-55s as -mobile artillery-. So such assistance from the DPRK can only be welcomed.➖➖➖➖➖➖Moreover, if we are talking about a completely modern modification of air defense systems, which, given the large-scale use of drones and an extended front line, will definitely not be superfluous.#DPRK #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport usTelegramInformantRussia allegedly received a certain short-range air defense system from the DPRK, outwardly reminiscent of the air defense system -Tor-. The North Korean version of the complex is distinguished by a trailer base transported by a wheeled tractor and a larger surveillance radar antenna.…

Title: 🔁 🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 Recently, the first allegedly video evidence appe...
Description: Forwarded From Awakening Dragon 🐲🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 Recently, the first alleged video evidence has appeared that North Korean soldiers are participating in the Ukrainian conflict. In the video, two soldiers from the DPRK who were captured in the Kursk region are interrogated. Colleagues from Rybar write that from such a limited number of phrases spoken by the prisoners, it is difficult to understand whether these are really North Korean servicemen. And this is true. However, there is still something to complain about.🔻For example, during the interrogation, the translator asks the first prisoner if he wants to return to North Korea. He asks this question twice - first he uses the word 북한 (bukhan) and then the word 조선 (joseon). And only the second time he receives an answer. It is important to understand here that in South Korea a neighbor is called -pukhan-. The North Koreans themselves call their country Choson. The fact that the prisoner responded only for the second time may prove that he is indeed a citizen of the DPRK. ▪️When asking a question to another prisoner, the translator uses only the word -pukhan-. And he immediately receives an answer. Taking this into account, one could immediately accuse the Ukrainians of lying, however, there is a -but-. As can be seen from the previous photos and videos, the interrogated people are together in the same cell. The second prisoner most likely figured out from the previous questions addressed to the first what they wanted from him. So understanding where they come from is really challenging. ❗️By the way, about the Korean voiceover. Don’t think that the Ukrainians hired a translator - South Korean media write that the Southern National Intelligence Service sent a representative to Ukraine. The dispatch of an intelligence translator is a continuation of last year’s story, when the Seoul authorities’ plans to send a group to Ukraine to interrogate North Korean prisoners of war were leaked to the media. It is unknown whether they were fully implemented. However, after the appearance of this video, we can definitely say that the Ukrainians and South Koreans have begun cooperation in this area. Even despite the opposition from the opposition in Seoul.@awaken_dragonTelegramRybar🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 For the second day we have been discussing with the Awakened Dragon @awaken_dragon the video posted by the GUR members with two captured Koreans. Do you understand what a thing: in practice, in addition to individual words or features of writing, determine by such a small number...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 13, 2025 ▪️ At night, elec...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 13, 2025▪️ At night, electronic warfare and air defense systems suppressed and destroyed several enemy UAVs in the suburbs of Voronezh. Also, a drone was shot down over the Bryansk region.▪️ In the Kursk region there are battles on the outskirts of the village. Cellars, in Makhnovka, near Russky Porechny and Kruglenky. The enemy yesterday distributed a video recording of an interview, as stated, of two captured DPRK servicemen. Even Zelensky was brought in to hold the information event, although the Treaty on Strategic Partnership between Russia and the DPRK, as well as the participation of foreign military personnel in battles on the side of Ukraine, have not been any sensation for a long time.▪️ East of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), the enemy yesterday admitted a temporary loss of control over the outcome highway Pokrovsk-Konstantinovka (3 km east of the village of Malinovka). In any case, the road is already under the fire control of the Russian Armed Forces, which complicates the enemy’s logistics.▪️ Southeast of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces liberated the village of Yantarnoye. ▪️ In the Vremevka area, our group units continue to block and encircle the enemy in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka. There are battles for Neskuchnoye, followed by clearing and consolidation, which will allow Velikaya Novoselka to be captured from the southwest. Conditions are being created for the operational encirclement of the enemy.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, intelligence from the 58th Guards Combined Arms Army revealed that the enemy, having failed to achieve results in the Kamensky direction, is transferring reinforcements to the Orekhov area. Concentrates forces there to create strike fists and attempt revenge for the lost territories in the Rabotino, Malaya Tokmachka and Belogorye areas. Yesterday, ultra-high activity of enemy FPV drones was recorded in the Kamensky direction.▪️ In the Bryansk region, yesterday a woman was killed as a result of an attack on the Karachevsky district. Another local resident was injured. Several households were damaged.▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the village of Borisovka, a drone detonated on the territory of a commercial facility. The village of Berezovka was attacked by an enemy drone. In the village of Zozuli, an FPV drone hit a car. In the Grayvoronsky district in the village of Golovchino, a woman was injured as a result of a drone attack. In the village of Plotvyanka, Volokonovsky district, two FPV drones attacked a private home. In the Belgorod region, in the village of Malinovka, a UAV detonated near a private house. Another drone attacked the village of Yasnye Zori. A drone attack also occurred in the village of Ilek-Penkovka, Krasnoyaruzhsky district. In the area of ​​the village of Dunayka, a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone hit a moving car, injuring a woman.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a driver was killed as a result of an Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV dropping onto a city bus. A man died at a public transport stop - Mercury Plant. Three more civilians were wounded as a result of the shelling. In liberated Kurakhovo, a civilian was wounded as a result of shelling by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors South-west of Kurakhovo Stormtroopers of the 10th Tank Regiment of the 20th Guards Motorized Rifle Division liberated the village of Yantarnoye. Two majors

Title: 🔁 ❓💸 Why support us? Against the backdrop of urgent collections...
Description: Forwarded From Rybar❓💸 Why support us? Against the background of urgent collections for the needs of the units, the requests of the Rybar team to neglect a cup of coffee and donate the conditional 150 rubles for Russian analytics look from the point of view of many ridiculous. Many do not understand why support an information project at all, because it is of no use. There is a point: we concentrate on covering the actions of the enemy, which increases the awareness of our troops (by helping us, you are helping them with information). We tell our bureaucrats what is happening in distant countries so that they can make informed decisions. We fight off information attacks and show what is really happening. If you think that all this is unimportant, well, you are right. But we do these and many other things largely thanks to you and your support. With your help, we are capable of more.❓How to support us?📄offer an information order or simply use our services;📍join our GIS service map.rybar.ru🖋subscribe to the closed channel @rybar_plus_bot or the Rybar+ section with our reports and with notes in the margins💵 make a direct transfer to a legal account through SBP💰 use the donation button on our website rybar.ru💲 transfer cryptocurrency to us What seems like an unnoticeable contribution to you is an opportunity for us to develop. Title: 🎬 🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 For the second day we are discussing with the Awa...
Description: 🇰🇵🇷🇺🇺🇦 For the second day we have been discussing with the Awakening Dragon @awaken_dragon the video posted by the GUR team with two captured Koreans. Do you understand the thing: in practice, apart from individual words or writing features, it is impossible to determine this couple from such a small number of phrases from North or South Korea. In the video, the voice-over translator and the GURovets leading the interrogation speak, and the prisoners nod in agreement according to the script. ➖➖➖➖➖➖However, it is difficult to expect any other behavior from prisoners of war on both sides of the front. There are very few who persevere to the end. Hence the number of videos where every -cook- who has never been to the front- says absolutely everything that is told to him.➖➖➖➖➖➖The emphasis on the video is purely Korean, some phrases that are not memorized non-native speakers. Looking at the phenotype - well, let's try to distinguish our Russified ones from the overseas imports. For Russia this is another task. In fact, given the huge number of foreigners in the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, jumping around every Korean and looking for evidence of the supply of soldiers from the DPRK in commercial quantities is a so-so story. Foreigners are fighting with us. Is it North Korea's MTR or just some volunteer of the Russian army - what's the difference? ❗️This whole story with the need to prove the presence of North Korean troops in the Northern Military District zone has acquired the most political character. The main thing is to tell the whole world that Russia has allies, so the Kyiv regime needs more loans, more weapons and military equipment. #DPRK #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week 6 - January 12, 2024▪️Russian troops throughout the week inflicted fire on targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine. In the Dnepropetrovsk region, the Russian Armed Forces launched a missile strike at the control point of the S-300 air defense system in the vicinity of Pavlograd.▪️ At the same time, air bombs once again struck the industrial zone of occupied Zaporozhye. The hits occurred on one of the buildings of the Motor Sich enterprise, which had previously been repeatedly targeted by Russian troops.▪️Ukrainian formations, in turn, also did not sit still and struck both front-line and rear regions of Russia. As a result of the missile strike, several arrivals were recorded on the territory of one of the military warehouses in Kamensk-Shakhtinsky.▪️In addition, for the first time in a long time, the enemy carried out a massive drone raid on Engels. Most of the UAVs were shot down on approach; several more hit a local oil depot, which burned for at least four days.▪️Several drones attacked a residential building in Kotovsk, Tambov region. As a result of the detonation of the drones, seven people were injured, they were provided with medical assistance.▪️ At the same time, for several days, the Ukrainian Armed Forces tried to attack targets in the Black Sea region, as well as in the Voronezh and Chaltyr region of the Rostov region. Russian air defense units successfully intercepted the drones, several residential buildings were damaged by the debris of some of them, but there were no casualties.▪️In the Kursk region, Ukrainian formations launched several unsuccessful attacks, trying to gain a foothold in the Berdin farm on January 6. The enemy was knocked out of the settlement a day later, at the same time the soldiers of the Russian Armed Forces managed to liberate Russkoye Porechnoye.▪️Slightly to the south, there were also significant successes of Russian troops east of Sudzha. During the recent clashes, the village of Agronom was liberated, while fierce fighting continued in the center of Makhnovka.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on January 11-12, 2025. Russian troops attacked targets of Ukrainian formations in the central and western part of the so-called. Ukraine. Ukrainian formations attacked the Black Sea region and rear regions with drones: in Kotovsk, seven people were wounded as a result of a UAV attack. In the Kursk region, Russian troops are fighting in Pogrebki, Makhnovka, and have also advanced in the area of ​​Russian Porechny and Kruglenkoye. In the Alexander-Kalinovsky direction, attack aircraft are advancing in urban development of Dzerzhinsk, currently only about 20% of the city remains under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Andreevsky (Kurakhovsky direction) Russian troops liberated Yantarnoye, at the same time fighting continues in the area of ​​​​Petropavlovka, Slavyanka and Shevchenko.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military zone operations: (ru; en)Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Andreevka #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #map #Kotovsk #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for January 11-12, 2025 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israel Defense Forces continues its ground operation in Jabaliya. And in Beit Hanoun, a convoy of Israeli equipment was ambushed, losing at least four fighters. In the central and southern parts of the enclave, shelling of Hamas-controlled settlements has not stopped, as a result of one of which a freelance employee of the Turkish Anadolu Agency was killed. In the West Bank, police operations are going on as usual, during which Israeli security forces are detaining citizens suspected of having links with terrorists. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, it was possible to establish that the Israel Defense Forces still maintain control over several border settlements, but some IDF units have withdrawn from Bint Jebel in the direction of Maroun al-Rasa.🔻Detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish versionOnline maps are available by subscribing to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 Russian resources, meanwhile, are discussing the New Year's in...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl Meanwhile, Russian resources are discussing the New Year’s interview with the Chief of the Serbian General Staff to the authoritative publication Vecernja Novosti. General Mojsilović honestly spoke about the current state of Russian-Serbian military-technical cooperation, which is in... a very difficult situation. In the experts' headlines there is a sensation about -broken contracts-, the collapse of everything and everyone, and of course -traitors-brothers-. At the same time, Mr. Moisilovich did not say anything new (at all) in his interview. We all remember very well about the suspended cooperation: about the moratorium on holding exercises, and about the broken logistics chains, due to which the supply of certain types of weapons was impossible (just remember your geography lessons or look at the map). Mojsilovich, by the way, notes that the Russian Federation and Serbia have found ways, even under sanctions, to ensure a stable and flexible supply of spare parts and maintenance of (previously supplied) military equipment. Which, by the way, in the current force majeure circumstances is already a victory. In general, why everyone was suddenly so ostentatiously surprised in some media outlets, and why they started hype again on an already sad topic, I don’t understand. @balkanossiper - we have been setting world trends since June 28, 1914

Title: 🔁 🇻🇦🏳️‍🌈The Vatican has approved new recommendations that al...

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🏴🇺🇦 The Supreme Court introduced the movement - Forum o...
Description: Forwarded From Severyanochka🇷🇺🏴🇺🇦 The Supreme Court added the movement - Forum of Free Peoples of Post-Russia - and all its structural divisions to the list of terrorist organizations. Including the virtual Pomeranian movement -Bjarmiya-, which advocates the separation of the territory of the Arkhangelsk region from the Russian Federation.▪️The leader of the movement is the former bass guitarist of the Arkhangelsk punk rock band -Kablam- Mikhail Gradov.🔺The musical creativity of the guys at one time attracted the attention of the Center’s specialists -E- Ministry of Internal Affairs. It is possible that the future Pomeranian terrorist had connections with Mikhail Zhlobitsky, a 17-year-old anarchist who blew himself up in the building of the regional FSB headquarters in 2018. Be that as it may, Gradov decided to breathe more freely and move to Estonia, where for some time he worked in low-skilled labor and was treated for anxiety disorder (GAD) ... with various substances. In the fall of 2022, with the announcement of partial mobilization in Russia to the Ukrainian special services , as you know, I urgently needed free hands. And Mikhail (not otherwise than through an advertisement) found himself an ideal part-time job remotely - searching for and recruiting arsonists of military registration and enlistment offices in Russia. And already in February 2023, a new ambitious project awaited him - to lead the Forum... - the movement of Pomeranian separatists... Or at least create the appearance of their presence. 🔺 At first, Mikhail actively tried to encourage Arkhangelsk residents to join the ranks of -partisans-: set fires, collect information about law enforcement officers, arm themselves with drones to fight the regime and beat cars with -ZOV- symbols. But very soon, Ukrainian curators stopped allocating a budget for this business, since the idea showed its inconsistency and futility. The movement remained purely virtual.🔺So - Pomeranian separatism - survived its second incarnation in the history of modern Russia (apparently, having finally buried this phenomenon). This time the beneficiaries were Ukrainian curators. In the past period (2000s and 2010s), the main beneficiaries and ideologists of the movement were Norway and the United States. But Severyanochka will talk about this some other time. #separatism #Russia #UkraineSeveryanochka

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for the morning of January 12, 2025 ▪️ The pa...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Report for the morning of January 12, 2025▪️ The past week and the meeting of NATO defense ministers in the Ramstein format clearly showed that it is too early to talk about an actual reduction in the level of military-technical assistance to Ukraine. In the last days of Biden’s tenure, the United States also intensively allocated funds to support the Armed Forces of Ukraine, trying to create conditions for prolonging Kyiv’s actions to deplete Russia’s military and economic resources. Zelensky, trying to please different forces, simultaneously declared the need to achieve peace in 2025 and sent attack UAVs to strike Russian energy facilities.▪️ The Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, despite maintaining combat stability and the ability to conduct organized defensive battles, are increasingly faced with the problem of shortages personnel and the low level of moral and psychological state of their forcibly mobilized troops. This is evidenced by the multiple increase in the number of criminal cases initiated for SOC, massive interdepartmental raids on the organizers of evasion in the service in Ukraine, scandals with desertion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine trained abroad.▪️ However, it is too early to talk about the collapse of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front, despite the preservation of the Russian Army initiatives throughout its entire length.▪️ Thus, in the Kursk region, the enemy is conducting intensive counter actions with the aim of slowing our progress in the region. The Russian Armed Forces, in heavy bloody battles, advanced to the northern ledge near Pogrebki and Novaya Sorochina, Kruglenkoe, Malaya Loknya, advance south from Russian Porechny, and break their way to Sudzha along the shortest route through Makhnovka. At the same time, the enemy maintains a large group in the Sumy region, from which it transfers reserves to the LBS and tries to localize our advance. On the ground, our troops are preparing for another politically motivated attack by the enemy in the last days before Trump takes office.▪️ Control of the Russian Armed Forces on the right bank of the river is gradually expanding. Oskol north of Kupyansk in Dvurechnaya. In Chasov Yar, battles are taking place around the fireproof plant, and enemy approaches to the facility are being blocked. The most difficult assault on Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) is nearing completion, but the enemy stubbornly clings to the remaining positions. Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) The Russian Army is trying to deprive supply routes from the southwest; to the east of the city, the Russian Armed Forces were moving towards the highway to Konstantinovka. After the liberation of Kurakhovo, our troops create conditions for closing the pocket south of the city, and the offensive and liberation of villages continue in the north-west. The position of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novosyolka is worsening, the enemy garrison is holding defenses on the approaches to the village, the Russian Armed Forces are having tactical successes and are consolidating in the positions they have achieved. The Zaporozhye Front and the Kherson direction are without significant changes, the situation is characterized by mutual strikes by the parties on each other’s positions.▪️ In the Black Sea, more and more data is being received about the expansion of the range of enemy MBECs, which have gone from -kamikaze boats- to various platforms with guides for MLRS, machine gun turrets, air defense systems and launch containers for attack FPV drones. The development by the enemy of a whole range of such naval drones, which, as part of a battle formation, solve various tasks on the water, is a new challenge for the Russian Navy and requires the speedy adoption of systemic new decisions, because the enemy has found effective means to combat our countermeasures.▪️ The coming week will be the last before Trump's inauguration. It is not without reason that our military command expects politically motivated actions by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, only on a larger scale than what happened on January 5-6 in the Kursk region. The transformation of statements by Trump and his team about plans to help resolve the conflict is indicative: from a day to 100 days/six months. At the same time, if the United States completely controls all decisions in Kyiv, then Washington has virtually no leverage over Moscow. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above ✨Thus, the Russian Army maintains a strategic initiative at the front, and only this allows politicians to take a strong position on foreign policy track. At the same time, attempts by Kyiv to take further populist steps cannot be ruled out...

Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇦 About the corps structure of the Armed Forces of Ukrain...
Description: Forwarded From Globalistics🇺🇦 About the corps structure of the Armed Forces of UkraineUsing materials from colleagues, the Z Committee and the ZVI Search Engine, summarized all available information about the new corps system of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the reforms of which were written in MilitaryMaps.♦️The point is: in addition to various reforms like tax cuts for military-industrial complex enterprises, recruitment through recruiting, the Armed Forces of Ukraine have finally reached the finalized corps system. In 2023, before the counter-offensive, the enemy created two army corps - 9 and 10. Then they included an average of 5 brigades, and they were a strike force that was confused in attempts to advance in the Zaporozhye direction. In addition to them, there was a reserve corps, where the basis was supposed to become the 5th Brigade, but it didn’t work out. She was torn to pieces, which later became commonplace. Now in the new reform there is even a ban on such practice.❗️So, the corps.▪️9 AK now, judging by information from open sources, consists of three brigades: 33 and 47 Mechanized Brigades, as well as 3 Specialized Brigades.▪️10 AK - also of three connections. 116 and 118 Mechanized Infantry Brigades and the recently reformed 117th Mechanized Infantry Brigade.▪️11 AK is still the most numerous. There are ten brigades in it. This is due to the fact that it was a reserve corps previously, and all brigades that were sent to full strength were assigned to it.▪️12 AK is a new corps. There is not even information about who will enter it. And it seems that some of the compounds 11 AK will become part of it. This will be logical for the operational recruitment of 12 AK.❗️In addition to this, there is the 30th Marine Corps. Its composition has also recently undergone changes. The 150th Mechanized Infantry Brigade became the 40th separate coastal defense brigade (OBrBO). In addition, it has 39 OBrBO, which will most likely be created on the basis of 124 OBr TerO. The 7th Corps of the DShV includes all airmobile and air assault units. Almost all of them are fighting in various sectors, which is why they have a huge turnover.♦️In general, the structure of the Armed Forces of Ukraine has changed radically. If we evaluate it in terms of combat capabilities, the most important improvement is the creation of separate control lines that are independent of each other. That is, each corps, or rather the command, can make decisions independently. This simplifies both replenishment, manning, and combat operations, since they are not waiting for a decision from Kyiv. In conflicts of such intensity, this is a key factor. Individual battalions of UAVs and BECs deserve special attention. Priority acquisition, large funding and PR are important changes in the context of the growing importance of these weapons. #Ukraine Globalistics - subscribe to the channel

Title: 🇰🇿⚛️ Why does Kazakhstan need three nuclear power plants? Presi...
Description: 🇰🇿⚛️ Why does Kazakhstan need three nuclear power plants? President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev said that it is necessary to -accelerate- with the construction of nuclear power plants, and also repeated his recent thesis about the need to -build two large plants, possibly three. Three nuclear power plants were discussed even before the referendum: the head of the Ministry of Energy of the Republic of Kazakhstan Almasadam Satkaliev voiced this need and even named possible sites. Nuclear power plants are convenient for the Republic of Kazakhstan because they can close the generation gap, without undermining declarations of striving for carbon neutrality. ➖➖➖➖➖➖One can even assume that the authorities initially considered such a scenario, but decided not to escalate the situation right off the bat and first achieve the population’s consent in principle for construction. In this case, the construction of one or more nuclear power plants would become a technical issue. At the same time, it seems that Astana has already resolved the issue with the contractor. And then Tokayev’s statement is a sweetened pill for those counterparties who were left without a contract. It is no coincidence that the president mentioned in his interview (in this order): Rosatom, Chinese companies and Western ones, thus setting priorities. #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usKazakhstan's main news - Tengrinews.kzAn extensive interview with President Tokayev has been published. Title: 🔁 🇩🇪🇷🇺 German authorities took in tow the emergency tanker -...
Description: Forwarded From Severyanochka🇩🇪🇷🇺 German authorities took into tow the emergency tanker -Eventin-, which was sailing under the flag of Panama from Ust-Luga to Egypt. It is reported that the area is experiencing stormy conditions and the vessel's ability to maneuver is limited. 🔻 The tanker is currently being kept from drifting by three tugs northeast of Cape Arkona in German territorial waters. The patrol ship -Bamberg- of the Coast Guard and the special vessel -Arkona- of the German Federal Waterways and Shipping Administration are on duty nearby. According to German authorities, 99 thousand tons of oil were loaded on board the tanker. 🔺The nature of the tanker’s malfunctions is not reported in the press release. It is possible that with the improvement of weather conditions in the area, an inspection team will board the tanker to assess the technical condition of the vessel, which will reveal any significant violations in the operation and maintenance of the tanker -Eventin- and will keep it from going to sea under the pretext of a threat to environmental safety. Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week 4 - January 10, 2025 ▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked various areas of the capital of the Palestinian enclave. At the same time, the Israeli ground operation continued in the city of Jabaliya, located north of Gaza. After two months of fighting, the 900th infantry brigade -Kfir- was withdrawn from there.▪️Nevertheless, the Palestinians did not lose the opportunity to strike at Israeli territory. During the launches in Sderot, one of the missiles fell on the roof of a house, the second in an open area, and the third was intercepted. ▪️In the center of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops continued to strike Nuseirat and other cities. In response, Palestinian forces daily fired at Israeli positions at the Netzarim intersection and in Juhr ad-Dik.▪️In the south, Israeli troops carried out engineering work in the Philadelphia Corridor. Against this background, the bodies of several Arab citizens of Israel, abducted by Hamas militants, were discovered in Rafah.▪️Police raids by Israeli security forces continued in the West Bank. So, starting from October 7, 2023, more than 12,200 Palestinians were detained.▪️One of the raids took place in Tammun in Tubas province, where the Israelis used unmanned aircraft. Hassan Ali Rabaya, the field commander of the military wing of the Fatah party, was eliminated.▪️In response, the Palestinians carried out a terrorist attack, shooting at two cars and a bus in the Jewish settlement of Kdumim. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 11, 2025 ▪️ At night, the ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 11, 2025▪️ At night, the enemy attacked our regions with aircraft-type UAVs. In the Belgorod region, several enemy drones were shot down over the Belgorod district; as a result of falling debris in the village of Maisky, windows were broken in private households and roofs were damaged. At least 15 UAVs were shot down at night in the Voronezh region. The Krasnodar region was subjected to a massive drone attack. Local residents reported the sound of explosions over Anapa and in Novorossiysk, where a fire started after one of the explosions. In Kotovsk, Tambov region, two residential buildings were damaged and there were casualties. Drones were also reported from the Kursk, Saratov and Lipetsk regions, Sevastopol, Kerch and Taman. ▪️ In the Kursk region, the enemy, taking advantage of poor weather conditions with limited visibility, launched 11 unsuccessful counterattacks on different sections of the front in the Sudzhansky border area. Our troops have completed clearing out enemy strongholds between Guevo and Kurilovka, and are advancing with stubborn battles into the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district. Fierce fighting continues in Makhnovka and Cherkasskaya Porechnaya, where the enemy is transferring more and more units.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), our troops, with heavy fighting, are developing an offensive against the remaining enemy positions in the mines and urban development on the outskirts of the city. The waste heaps at mine No. 10 have been taken. The months-long assault on the city is gradually coming to an end, but it is too early to talk about the complete capture of the city; the battle continues. The enemy clings to positions, conducts an organized defense, strikes with many drones.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces have not yet begun to storm the city itself, trying to cut off the enemy’s logistics, moving from the southwest (Volkovo-Solyonoe line). Although there are a couple of kilometers left to Pokrovsk itself (Krasnoarmeysk)▪️ North-west of the liberated Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing from the settlement. Shevchenko towards Andreevka, leveling the front at Slavyanka. ▪️ In the direction of Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, fighting continues around nearby settlements. It is necessary to completely block the enemy's possibility of delivery; a pocket has been formed again, in which enemy forces remain.▪️In the Belgorod region, near the village of Yasnye Zori, a kamikaze drone attacked a moving car, two men were wounded. On the Nikolskoye-Yasnye Zori highway section, another drone hit a regular bus, injuring the driver. ▪️In the DPR, the enemy fired at a village with a 122 mm MLRS. Svetlodarsk, used high-explosive JROF-M missiles with a range increased to 40.2 km and increased striking power, presumably from the area of ​​the settlement. Konstantinovka (Dzerzhinsky direction). Three women were killed, a girl born in 2008 was seriously injured, and six civilians were wounded. Donetsk was shelled from the M142 HIMARS (M-270) MLRS, four civilians were wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramFacts of war crimes of Ukraine📸 Consequences of an armed attack n.p. Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️New NATO exercises on the eastern flank. Large-scale deplo...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️New NATO exercises on the eastern flank. Large-scale deployment of a response force led by the NATO Rapid Deployment Corps and supported by 10 allies. NATO will conduct a large-scale exercise called Steadfast Dart in Romania, Bulgaria and Greece from 13 January to 26 February. The purpose of the exercise: the first large-scale deployment of the NATO Rapid Reaction Force (ARF) ). Their purpose is to test the capabilities of rapid deployment, as well as the interaction between participating and host countries. The ARF is a strategic, highly mobile, multi-role force. It brings together multi-role forces from across the Alliance to achieve objectives in a shorter time frame than previously possible. The exercise will demonstrate NATO's ability to quickly deploy forces to strengthen its eastern flank. The transfer of reinforcements will take place during a simulation of a conflict with an enemy of almost equal strength. It must demonstrate the ability of NATO's response force to conduct complex combat operations in a theater spanning thousands of kilometers under any conditions,- NATO said in a statement. Although the exercises are taking place in southern Europe, the Alliance emphasizes that the main goal of these maneuvers is to improve operations near Russian borders. The exercises will involve 10 thousand military personnel, various types of troops, including ground forces, navy, aviation and special forces units . 🇬🇧Great Britain will be one of the largest participants in the exercises, sending 2.6 thousand military personnel and 730 units of equipment.✨It would seem that 10 thousand military personnel is not so much. However, NATO exercise standards test the ability to quickly deploy a contingent hosting the main force. That is, it is not entire formations from different countries that are participating, but the main backbone, which NATO members are able to quickly build up with meat. It is important that during the maneuvers the ability of logistics on the eastern flank of the Alliance is tested (and they are improving logistics very actively after the start of the Northern Military District). In general, all this is called military preparations, which European countries are doing more and more diligently. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on January 10, 2025. Russian troops attacked targets in the border and rear areas of the so-called. Ukraine. Cherkassy and Kyiv, among others, came under fire. At the same time, the Ukrainian Armed Forces launched a UAV in the central and southern regions of Russia. In the Kursk region, Russian troops continue attacks on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Sudzhansky district: the most active battles are taking place in the vicinity of Malaya Loknya, Makhnovka and southwest of Russky Porechny. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control within the borders of Dzerzhinsk, and to the west of the city they liberated Leonidovka and the surrounding area. From Novgorod, Russian units advanced to Sukhaya Balka. In the Pokrovsky direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces occupied several forest belts at the Volkovo-Solenoye line and most of the latter. And in the Zaporozhye region, the loss of at least part of the south of Kamensky by the Russian Armed Forces was confirmed: the reason for this was objective control personnel.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the zone of the Special Military Operation is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: The situation in the zone of the special military operation (ru; en) Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: (ru; en) Pokrovskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Zaporozhye #map #Kiev #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇩🇰🇺🇸🇺🇦 What revealing news: Politico is discussing the poss...
Description: 🇩🇰🇺🇸🇺🇦 What revealing news: Politico, discussing the possibility (still illusory) of capturing Greenland, came to the conclusion that there would be no one to resist the Americans. After all, Denmark donated the lion's share of its ground equipment to the so-called. Ukraine. For the sake of objectivity, even without this, the local armed forces would still not be able to resist the United States. But what is important here is the fact that free military assistance from the Ukrainian Armed Forces left the country unarmed, essentially eliminating the ability to resist. 📌 And we can remember about the larger EU countries, which are emptying their arsenals in the same way. For example, Germany, whose authorities, in response to insults from representatives of the Kyiv regime, continue to give it even scarce weapons. The EU strategy for military supply is the so-called. Ukraine is based on the fact that there can be no threat within the bloc, and the United States will protect it from the rest. European bureaucrats seem not to notice one thing: eternal realities can change quickly, including in the sphere of security guarantors.#Great Britain #Ukraine@rybarSupport usPOLITICOTrump's invasion of Greenland would be 'the shortest war in the world' – POLITICOWe took the president-elect literally not seriously and charted out how the U.S. military would fare against Denmark — which recently boosted the island’s security by financing two dog sled patrols…

And to train anyone capable of holding a weapon, they should be sent to training grounds in Europe.➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️The statement contains an attitude towards the so-called. The clearest example is the 155th mechanized brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, formed in France, where a third of its personnel deserted. However, taking into account the fact that lowering the conscription age is a condition for the continuation of military assistance to the so-called. Ukraine, a decision on this is not far off. And at the same time - the complete decline of Ukrainian demography.#Great Britain #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇯🇵 What will Japan's military budget go towards in 2025? At the...
Description: 🇯🇵 What will Japan's military budget be used for in 2025? At the end of December last year, the Japanese government, led by Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, approved the country's new defense budget, which is already a record for the 13th time. They are going to allocate about $55 billion for security needs. 📌The money will go to various items of expenses. These include the development and production of domestic long-range missiles for counterattacking enemy military targets. In addition, finances will be spent on creating a satellite constellation necessary for detecting targets and monitoring them. It seems it's no coincidence that a unit of the US Space Force was stationed in Japan last year. 🔻Approximately three billion has been allocated to improve the conditions of service of the Japanese military. This also includes an increase in salary. Such expenses are necessary because in Japan there is a certain shortage of personnel in the Self-Defense Forces. Here, by the way, it is worth considering that the approval of the budget by Ishiba’s cabinet does not mean that it will be adopted in the country’s parliament. According to the results of last year's elections, the ruling party lost its majority in the legislative body, which means the opposition can still put a spoke in the wheels of the government. We will be able to find out the final defense spending later this year. #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News+Japan defense budget hits record 8.7 tril. yen amid regional threatsJapan's defense budget grew to a record 8.70 trillion yen ($55 billion) for fiscal 2025, the government says, as the country continues to enhance its capabilities to address regional threats amid China's rapid military buildup and North Korea's growing ties…

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 10, 2025 ▪️ At night, our ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 10, 2025▪️ At night, our air defense repelled UAV raids on Russian regions. In the Rostov region, at least 16 drones were destroyed and suppressed by electronic warfare in the morning. In the Myasnikovsky district in the village of Chaltyr, a fire broke out in a private house and cars caught fire. In the village of Crimea there is a fire at a production plant. In the Kryukov village of the Kuybyshevsky district, several buildings were damaged due to the fall of a drone. Drones were also destroyed in the suburbs of Voronezh, and private houses were damaged. At least three UAVs were shot down over the Bryansk region. The channels also reported on the work of air defense in the Krasnodar region.▪️ Information on the network about events in the Kursk region is often either ahead of the events, or is deliberately not covered for obvious reasons; there are heavy oncoming battles. It is guaranteed that we can only talk about battles near specific settlements due to the high intensity of hostilities. The Russian Armed Forces retain the initiative, the group of troops - North - reports the encirclement of the enemy at strong points between Guevo and Kurilovka. Our assault troops are advancing with persistent fighting in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky border region, in the vicinity of the settlements of Darino, Sverdlikovo, Orlovka, Nikolaevka, Makhnovka and Cherkasskoye Porechnoye. Five Ukrainian Armed Forces servicemen and a mercenary from Colombia were captured. Over the past 24 hours, the enemy has transferred units from several different territorial defense brigades from Kramatorsk and a special forces group from the Dnepropetrovsk region. ▪️ Our bridgehead on the right bank of the river is expanding north of Kupyansk. Oskol in the village Dvurechnaya. Our troops advanced in the village itself and its environs. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), heavy fighting continues in the north and west of the city, the enemy is pushed back to the outskirts, while maintaining control over important strongholds.▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeysky) direction, our troops advanced south of the settlement. Baranovka, in the Vozdvizhenka area in the direction of the Pokrovsk - Konstantinovka highway. There is an offensive through the settlement. Peschanoye and to the west of Volkovo. South of Pokrovsk, the Russian Armed Forces are pushing through the enemy’s defenses in the area of ​​the settlement. Slavyanka Petropavlovka. The enemy's resources state that they expect the transfer of our reserves to maintain a high tempo of combat operations, although this may be an inept attempt to justify the growing number of tactical crises of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in this sector of the front.▪️ In the Zaporozhye region, as a result of an enemy artillery strike on Kamenka-Dneprovskaya, two women died in 1940 and Born 1965 The artillery attack was accompanied by strikes from enemy drones.▪️ In the Kherson region, Podo-Kalinovka, Abrikosovka, Velikiye Kopani and Novaya Mayachka were hit by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Two people were killed and six people were injured.▪️ In the Belgorod region, in the Shebekinsky district in the village of Murom, a UAV attacked a private house, a man was wounded. In the village Borisovka detonated an FPV drone of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In Nikolskoye, Belgorod district, the roof of a high-rise building was broken and windows in 3 apartments were broken. In the village of Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, a drone attacked the parking lot of a commercial facility. In the Volokonovsky district in the village of Konovalovo, a private house was damaged by an enemy FPV. In the Belgorod region, the village of Chaiki was attacked by several FPV drones. In Malinovka, Belgorod district, a power line was damaged. ▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a woman born in 1965 was wounded as a result of an artillery strike. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk region. Generalized report for the evening Berdin Farm, in the direction of which the enemy threw his columns with equipment and personnel, has been cleared.N.p. Kruglenkoye is firmly controlled by our troops (updated: disputed from the ground). To the west…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of week 3 - January 9, 2024▪️The Yemeni movement -Ansarallah- attempted to attack Israeli territory with a hypersonic missile -Palestine-2-. The target was the Orot Rabin thermal power plant in Hadera, but the ammunition was intercepted over the Mediterranean Sea.▪️In response, the American and British Air Forces bombed Houthi positions in Yemen. Suspected missile launch sites in the vicinity of the capital, Saada, were hit.▪️Clashes continue in Syria between militants who seized power and supporters of the overthrown government. In Latakia, partisans attacked a patrol of Uyghur jihadists; among those eliminated was a commander of Turkish origin.▪️In the north of the country, fighting between Kurdish forces and pro-Turkish formations intensified somewhat. The Syrian National Army factions managed to advance south of Maskana, but attacks at the Tishrin Dam were unsuccessful.▪️In parallel, Turkish troops launched artillery and air strikes on the border areas. At the same time, there has not yet been a ground offensive by the Turkish Armed Forces to capture Ain al-Arab and its countryside.▪️The situation on the border with Lebanon has worsened, where firefights broke out between unknown militants and Lebanese troops. After the cessation of the clashes, the Lebanese Armed Forces and the HTS security service sent reinforcements to the border villages.▪️In the south of the country, Israeli troops maintained a presence in the Syrian province of Quneitra. Soldiers of the Ha-Arim brigade reported the discovery of caches of weapons in the area of ​​occupied Mount Hermon. Taking advantage of the instability in the country, the Islamic State terrorists expanded their capabilities. In the city of As-Sanamain in Daraa province, jihadist cells attacked the facilities of the new administration.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on January 9, 2025. Russian troops launched a series of attacks on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in the border zone and rear regions of the so-called. Ukraine. The enemy launched several drones across the territory of the Krasnodar Territory, most of them were shot down by air defense systems on duty. In the Kursk region, the clearing of the environs of Berdin from the enemy was confirmed; it also became known about the control of the Russian Armed Forces over Agronom and advance in the direction of Nikolskoye. In the Liman direction, Russian troops advanced to the western border of the LPR, knocking out the enemy from positions in forest belts near Makeyevka. In the Pokrovsky direction, fighters of the Russian Armed Forces are pushing through the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces along the entire front line, clearing the landings in anticipation of the possible start of an offensive in the direction of Pokrovsk and Mirnograd. In the Kurakhovsky direction, fighting continues at the Yasenovoye - Slavyanka line and south of Kurakhovo, in both areas the fighters of the Russian Armed Forces are enjoying success. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction: (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online -maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Krasnodar #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Liman #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for January 8-9, 2025 Israeli troops launched another series of attacks on parts of the Gaza Strip controlled by Hamas. The capital of the Palestinian enclave, Nuseirat, and the surrounding area of ​​Khan Yunis came under the most concentrated fire. At the same time, IDF operations continue in the north of the enclave, where this time Palestinian forces were active: they carried out successful ambushes in Beit Lahia and Jabaliya, killing at least three Israelis. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces conducted a series of raids in more than ten settlements: over the past two days, more than 60 local residents were detained. The largest clashes occurred in Jenin and Tulkarm. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, the situation has not undergone significant changes: the Israelis periodically strike at identified targets in the south of Lebanon, while fighters from the Arab Republic are gradually entering some settlements. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution map English version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: expansion of the zone of control of ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: expansion of the zone of control of the Russian Armed Forces on the right bank of the Zherebets River. Over the past two weeks, the front section has clearly revived, Russian troops have advanced to the western border of the LPR. Thanks to footage from Makeyevka, it was possible to establish that fighters of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control, clearing several forest belts on the right bank of the Zherebets River. To the south, work is underway to eliminate the bridgehead of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the vicinity of the recently liberated Ivanovka, but information about the breakthrough of the defense of the Armed Forces in the direction of Kolodezy cannot yet be confirmed. The development of the success of the Russian Armed Forces in the direction of Yampolovka and Torskoye will make it possible to free the entire left bank from the presence of the enemy and begin the assault on Zarechny, from where the road to Liman opens. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Liman #Russia #Terns # Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 Aliyev is creating reasons for a new war against Armenia...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 Aliyev creates reasons for a new war against Armenia. The New Year in Baku begins with yet another claims against Yerevan. Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev said that Armenia is a threat to the South Caucasus. Aliyev demanded that France and other countries stop arming Armenia: break military contracts and return the supplied weapons. Another condition is the opening of the so-called. Zangezur corridor through the south of Armenia, which will connect Azerbaijan and Turkey. To the stated conditions, Aliyev added changes to the Constitution of Armenia and the abolition of the OSCE Minsk Group on the settlement of the Karabakh conflict. 📌As we wrote, the peace process between Azerbaijan and Armenia has predictably reached a dead end, despite the demonstrative optimism promoted by the now retiring US presidential administration. The deadlock in the situation lies in the fact that Yerevan is already making concessions, including on amending the Constitution. Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan even spoke about his readiness to open a message via the so-called. Zangezur corridor, but with respect for the sovereign rights of Armenia. 🔻Since Baku still accuses Armenia of sabotaging the opening of communications in the south, the main claim of the Azerbaijanis is aimed at the sovereign rights of Armenians to their territory. To achieve this, the Azerbaijani media are promoting the image of an -aggressive- and -revanchist- Armenia, which does not correspond to reality. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️All this once again suggests that Azerbaijan is creating a reason for another military aggression, which may happen in the near future and its target will be the Syunik region. The state of the Armenian Armed Forces raises big questions: French and Indian-made weapons do not create offensive potential and it is unclear to what extent they can even provide defense. #Azerbaijan #Armenia @rybarSupport usInterfaxAliyev called Armenia a source of threat to the South CaucasusPresident of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev said that Armenia is a source of threat to the South Caucasus.

Title: 🇹🇩🖇 What happened in Chad? On the evening of January 8, multip...
Description: 🇹🇩🖇 What happened in Chad? On the evening of January 8, multiple sources reported shootings near the Presidential Palace in N'Djamena, the capital of Chad. There were different rumors about the incident - from a coup attempt to an attack by almost defeated Boko Haram terrorists. The latter story was even initially supported by the Chadian authorities, to whom political strategists proposed to hush up the incident in this way. Later, officials confirmed that the attackers did not belong to terrorist groups. It was especially noted that they did not have firearms, and they got to the Palace by public transport.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❓So what really happened? The incident turned out to be an ordinary skirmish between representatives of tribes who met - not in that place... There has long been a saying among Chadians that you should not look at the president for more than half a minute, and in this case they started a fight right in the center of the capital. To separate them, the police and the Palace guards opened warning fire, which is why some participants in the brawl attacked them . During the clash, according to media reports, 18 attackers and 1 policeman were killed. The real number of victims is somewhat lower.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️But the main thing in this story is the reaction of the French media. The largest media agencies AFP and RFI reported the shooting in N'Djamena half an hour after the incident and cited rumors of a coup attempt or terrorist attack .And this is due to the fact that on the same day the first group flew from N’Djamena to the mainland French military personnel, which was a reputational blow for France. In addition, in the morning Debi the Younger received the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Thus, the Western media inflated the molehill out of a molehill and turned a domestic skirmish almost into a military coup against the anti-French president . Most likely, they planned to increase the degree of escalation and try to ignite a civil conflict, but, as we see, this was not possible.#Africa #Chad #France #mediatechnology@rybarSupport usBurkina24.com - Actualité du Burkina Faso 24h/24Tentative de déstabilization au Tchad : La version des faits du gouvernement qui évoque 18 morts côté assaillants et un mort du...Actualité - Tentative de déstabilization au Tchad : La version des faits du gouvernement qui évoque 18 morts côté assaillants et un mort du côté des gardes de sécurité présidentielle

Title: 🔁🖼 🇬🇧 Britain is creating new stealth boats to attack Russia ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇬🇧 Britain is creating new low-profile boats to attack Russia from the sea. On January 22, the UK Ministry of Defense will hold a conference in London on the new COOKSON project to develop a universal, fast and stealth maritime system intended for operations in Ukraine. The project involves the creation of a small fast attack boat equipped with a modular payload and capable of operating in difficult conditions. Options for boats and completely without a crew are being considered. The Ministry outlined the desired characteristics of COOKSON:▪️Maximum speed: from 40 knots▪️Range: 800 nautical miles with a full load▪️Autonomy: at least 72 hours▪️Unobtrusive silhouette▪️High noise immunity▪️Ability to carry several weapon modules with a range at once 30-100 km.▪️Availability of air defense systems The system should be able to quickly be supplied to Ukraine by land on a trailer about 6-12 meters long. Each long-range weapon will carry an 80-kilogram high-explosive warhead. The primary targets are unprotected land areas, the secondary targets are surface ships. The project requirements include scalability and production time with a target of 2-3 ships in the first months with 20 weapon modules. The UK plans to begin purchasing the first 10 COOKSON systems, along with hundreds of weapon modules, in the first quarter of 2025.✨ It is noteworthy that such systems are being directly prepared specifically for British missions in the Black Sea under the guise of Ukrainian activity. They act systematically: first they test the MBECs, making the operation of the fleet of large warships as difficult as possible, then they modernize the MBECs in order to reduce the efficiency of our aviation. Now we have moved on to the next stage - they will try to attack from the sea the coastal strip and objects in the rear, where the air defense density is traditionally lower. An important requirement for the system is the ability to send mission information remotely, and target detection, identification and planning can be performed by third parties. Two majors

Title: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Again about the issues of the Russian presence in Syri...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾🏴 Again about the issues of the Russian presence in Syria. Here, the next questions have surfaced regarding the presence of the Russian contingent in -New Syria-: for several days now, the cargo ship -Sparta- has not been able to enter the port of Tartus, where the 720th point is located materially - technical support (720 PMTO) of the Russian Navy. Now the Russian ship is standing on external roadstead in the Mediterranean, awaiting further decisions. The official reason for the delay has not yet been named; different versions are being considered - from internal logistics and technical problems to the refusal of the new authorities to provide permission to enter the port.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻The second option is most likely. The country is now headed by functionaries of the terrorist organization Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) and structures loyal to it. Of course, relations with those who were bombed by the Russian Aerospace Forces only yesterday will be strained, to put it mildly. The essence does not change - we face a new reality. There are no longer those with whom first the Soviet and then the Russian authorities signed agreements, according to which our troops were stationed at the Khmeimim airbase and in Tartus. There were no agreements on this issue with HTS or anyone else. However, new realities also arose for the militants of the new Syrian government. Now it will no longer be possible, as before, to play the role of -irreconcilable Mujahideen-, who under no circumstances collude with the enemy. This is no longer a small Idlib that can be given under the wing of Turkey. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 If yesterday’s moderate opposition could safely call Russia an occupier, today it is the presence of Russian naval and air bases that will allow balancing the political influence of friendly countries and internal competitors from among the most radical factions. And judging by the presence of the Russian embassies on the territory of the country, the absence of public diplomatic attacks on the Russian Federation and statements by the leader of HTS himself about the existence of strategic interests between the two countries, Damascus understands this fact. #Russia #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 9, 2025 ▪️ In the Kursk re...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 9, 2025▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is fighting stubbornly, knocking out the enemy from strongholds between Guevo and Kurilovka, as well as in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky border area. There are battles in the area of ​​the settlement. Staraya Sorochina, Makhnovka and Bondarevka. During the day, the arrival of over 350 enemy personnel in the region was recorded, including from special operations forces and 132 separate reconnaissance battalions. Data are being received about the concentration of the enemy in the area of ​​the settlement. Cellars and the presence of reserves at the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Sumy region.▪️ In the Krasnolimansky direction there are battles in the area of ​​​​Ivanovka and Ternov. ▪️ From the Pokrovsky direction, data is received that east of the city, movement to the north towards the Pokrovsk-Konstantinovka highway through Vozdvizhenka and nearby villages has become effective. ▪️ West of Kurakhovo, our troops liberated the village. Shevchenko and are expanding the zone of control around him, aggravating the position of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the pocket to the south. There are battles for the settlement. Dachnoe.▪️ In the Velikonovoselkovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces advanced along the forest belt northeast of the settlement. Rivnopol and to the west of the settlement. Not boring. New Komar.▪️ Yesterday from the Zaporozhye region it was reported that the enemy carried out a guided missile attack on the port of Berdyansk. There were no casualties. The village of Chaiki, Belgorod region, was attacked by two drones. As a result of the fall of drones in the village of Razumnoye, a power line was damaged. In the village of Voznesenovka, Shebekinsky district, as a result of a shell strike in one private house, windows were broken. The summary was: Two majors Telegram Two majors Belgorod region, governor: 6 settlements of our region were attacked by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Preliminarily, none of the residents were injured. In the village of Voznesenovka, Shebekinsky District, as a result of a shell strike, a private house was knocked out...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on January 7-8, 2025. Russian troops launched a series of targeted strikes on targets in the territory controlled by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. One of the targets in occupied Zaporozhye was Motor Sich, where a fire broke out. Ukrainian formations launched several dozen UAVs across the rear regions of Russia. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, 32 were shot down, and a fuel storage facility in the Saratov region was damaged. In the Kursk region, the enemy was driven out of several settlements, Russian troops are advancing in the area of ​​Malaya Loknya, Russky Porechny and Pogrebkov. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, the enemy attacked in the Kotlyarka area, and Russian troops advanced between Zagryzovo and Lozovaya. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction they continue heavy fighting within the borders of Dzerzhinsk, Russian attack aircraft are cutting their way to the western outskirts of the city. In the Pokrovsky direction, local advances of the Russian Armed Forces are observed in several areas, as well as a breakthrough at Vozdvizhenka, and heavy fighting is taking place. In the Kurakhovo direction, the enemy was also driven out of several fairly large strongholds in the fields south and southwest of Kurakhovo. And in the Vremevsky direction the noose around Bolshaya Novoselka is tightening. Russian attack aircraft occupied the surrounding fields and reached the outskirts of the village and neighboring Neskuchny.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Aleksandro-Kalinovskoye direction: (ru; en) Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en) Vremevskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Zaporozhye #map #Kupyansk #Kurakhovo #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇸🇮🇺🇦 Where are the American self-propelled guns being ta...
Description: 🇸🇮🇺🇦 Where are the American self-propelled guns from Slovenia being taken? Last night in the port of Koper, our subscribers from Slovenia captured the movement of a large convoy of weapons in the direction of the Slovenian capital Ljubljana. The footage recorded the movement of a convoy with the M109 self-propelled guns. It is difficult to reliably determine the modification in this video due to the darkness. In addition, the video is cut off, and it is not entirely clear how many self-propelled guns were on the trawls. In addition, it is unclear whether there was any other equipment besides the M109.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❓In this regard, the question is brewing: where is the convoy moving from the Slovenian port? As a rule, deliveries are made through Slovenia and Greece to the so-called Ukraine through Hungary to Uzhgorod. Of course, this may be connected with some planned NATO exercise or rotation of military contingents in some Romania. However, recently the Ukrainian Armed Forces have been supplied with weapons and equipment. The offensive in the Kursk region does not yet look like the final chord. There was no major deployment of armored vehicles or large-scale missile strikes, so the enemy’s preparations are probably still ongoing.
