Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇺🇦 BECs in the American fleet - integration is in full s...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 BECs in the American fleet - integration is in full swing American media report that the Independence-class frigate Santa Barbara underwent modernization, as part of which a mine countermeasures module was installed. In addition to radars and other equipment, it includes a surface unmanned boat. This mine protection BEC is manufactured by Textron. An AN/AQS-20C radar is installed on it to search for mines, as well as their subsequent non-contact destruction. -Santa Barbara- is the third frigate of this class to receive this module. In accordance with the plans of the American command, in 2025 and 2026 it is planned to send the first coastal zone ships to the Middle East with new crewless modules for testing them in the crisis zone.➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖➖🔻A remarkable fact is that the company Textron has an active presence in the NWO area. According to our data, specialists from an American company supplied the Ukrainian Navy with parts, components and samples for assembling BECs. During the NVO, about a dozen different naval drones have already been spotted in the Black Sea. Some of them were assembled with the help of British engineers, and some by American ones. And this is not surprising, since the so-called Ukraine was a testing ground from the very beginning. Neither missiles, nor tanks, nor artillery, but UAVs and BECs are probably the key change in the framework of armed conflicts, which changes their character. Aircraft are used everywhere in all hot spots, and BECs are increasingly playing the role of ersatz MLRS/SAM/carrier of FPV drones.❗️The fact that the United States will move on to introducing these technologies into the combat fleet is a logical consequence that in the coming years we will observe in different countries. And it is important to understand that the USA or Britain were engaged in BECs even before the Northern Military District, but it was in the so-called Ukraine that they managed to test them in battle.#USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇳🇪🇷🇺🖇 Why does Russia need its own media infrastructure i...
Description: 🇳🇪🇷🇺🖇 Why does Russia need its own media infrastructure in Africa? A video of Afrika Corps employees distributing food on the streets of the capital circulated on Niger’s social networks. The action was carried out on the initiative of military personnel. This was a simple gesture of politeness for those whom they came to visit and, of course, there was no malicious intent.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌It would seem that the soldiers did a good job and worked to create a positive image of the Russian soldier in a counterbalance to the eternal propaganda and accusations of war crimes. Moreover, the Russian Armed Forces are officially present here and such actions, even amateur ones, should be encouraged. However, everything turned out quite the opposite, local authorities expressed dissatisfaction with the incident, and the command eventually reprimanded the military personnel and forbade repeating such amateur activities.❓But why? Since the action was unplanned, no one thought to present it in the local media from the right angle. And when the video was picked up by French publications, there was no ready-made algorithm for working out the negative. So it turned out that the French and local African media, on salaries from Paris, promoted the version that the Russians humiliated the country’s population by distributing handouts to the lower strata of society. Western observers could not discern any other motive.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Because until we have created media resources (at least in the Sahel countries) capable of shaping the right attitude towards the Russian security forces, holding such actions is pointless. And after all The image of the military is just the tip of the iceberg. Literally every Russian business project (especially profitable and strategically important) will be attacked, even to the point of environmental protests (we remember when in South Africa, environmental activists actually disrupted the construction of a nuclear power plant from Rosatom) and will require anti-crisis measures. By the way, the same PMC - Wagner - understood this very well, therefore the development of its local (radio, newspaper and Internet media) media infrastructure in the country of presence was one of the most important areas. #Africa #Niger #Russia #mediatechnology @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: advance of the RF Arm...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces within the borders of Dzerzhinsk (Toretsk)🔻At the end of last year and the beginning of January, Russian troops achieved significant success within the borders of Dzerzhinsk (Toretsk) and practically made their way to the northwestern regions of the city. Based on footage of objective control by the enemy, assault groups under drone strikes are already operating close to the western outskirts of the settlement.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️After successes in the Khimkolonka microdistrict and the 12th district, Russian troops drove the enemy out of most of the microdistrict Fomikha. The presence of attack aircraft was noted in the area of ​​Gorsky Lane 4 and north of Trudovaya Street, as well as on the approaches to the local motor depot. ❗️Given that the presence of units of the Russian Armed Forces was noted both to the west and to the east of waste heap No. 10, it also came under the control of Russian troops.▪️At the same time, thanks to objective control personnel, it was possible to find out that Russian troops came close to the territory of the Toretskaya mine. , the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces at which were previously repeatedly subjected to air raids.▪️She and her The waste heaps still remain under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Their capture will open the way to the neighboring villages of Krymskoye and Dachnoye. For a long time, the latter was the key place from which the Ukrainian garrison in Dzerzhinsk was supplied. Successes at waste heaps -Fomikha- and No. 12 will allow Russian troops to reach the northern outskirts of the city. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖At the moment, the Ukrainian formations still have the last fortified positions in the settlement in the area of ​​the former repair base and at the mechanical repair plant. Thus, now approximately a third of the settlement remains under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Title: 🇬🇧 Results of 2024 for the UK Armed Forces and plans for the fu...
Description: 🇬🇧 Results of 2024 for the British Armed Forces and plans for the future Over the past year, news surrounding the British Army has often appeared on the pages of the media. Sometimes it even came to direct and far from groundless ridicule of the state of the armed forces, because enough reasons had accumulated: breaking down aircraft carriers, fires on nuclear submarines, lack of personnel and much more. Even the British military leadership openly discussed the presence of serious problems. Thus, Deputy Chief of the Defense Staff of the Armed Forces Rob McGowan, speaking before the relevant committee of the House of Commons, directly stated that there are risks when deploying the most combat-ready army unit. Of course, one of the goals of such publications is to escalate the situation around the armed forces in order to increase military spending and budget development, but problems do exist. They can be seen with the naked eye. How the British will correct the situation is not yet clear. So far, they decided to change the procurement system and tried to increase salaries in order to keep people in the army (it didn’t help much).🔻One way or another, the British over the past year have prepared the ground for increasing military spending. An increase in the defense budget is only a matter of time. But whether these financial funds will be used for the development of the armed forces or will end up in the right pockets is another topic. #Great Britain@rybar together with @oldGBR Support usTelegramRybar🇬🇧 To be honest, openly laughing at the combat capabilities of the British army is still somewhat reckless even despite all the objective problems with a shortage of personnel and a reduction in military production. Yes, there are reasons to doubt...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 New UAV raid of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Rus...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 New UAV raid of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Russian regions of RussiaAt night, Ukrainian formations again launched drones in the rear Russian regions: according to the Russian Ministry of Defense, air defense intercepted 32 devices in the territory of seven regions, as well as over the waters of the Azov Sea sea.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The Saratov region was subjected to the most massive attack, where, judging by footage from local sources, hits occurred on the territory of the Kristall-Rosrezerva plant, one of the largest aviation fuel storage facilities in the region. As a result of the attack, a large fire broke out on the territory of the oil depot; at least several fuel tanks are currently burning. Specialists from specialized services are working at the scene of the incident to eliminate the fire and other consequences of the raid. 🔻Only since the beginning of December, Ukrainian drones have attacked at least four facilities of the fuel and energy complex in Russia: in addition to the aforementioned Saratov region, oil depots in the Smolensk and Oryol regions, as well as the infrastructure of the Druzhba oil pipeline in the Bryansk region, came under fire. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Special attention should be paid to regularly appearing footage of the consequences of such raids, filmed by local residents. They not only actively relish various anti-Russian resources promoting all kinds of theses, but also allow the enemy to objectively evaluate the results of past attacks. On the same so-called In Ukraine, the fight against similar filming is being conducted at a much higher level: if at the beginning of the special operation the search for the consequences of Russian raids was reduced to simply viewing regional media, then over the past two years it has become much more difficult to find such information, and the appearance of the attack footage itself is, for the most part, exceptional character. High resolution mapEnglish version #Saratov #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇺🇸🇩🇰🇬🇱 In fact, it’s not entirely clear why Donald Trump...
Description: Forwarded From American issue🇺🇸🇩🇰🇬🇱 In fact, it is not entirely clear why Donald Trump needs Greenland as part of the United States. The United States and Denmark already have a 1951 treaty regarding agreements on military bases and strategic use of Greenland by the United States. 🔻Main provisions of the agreement:▪️The United States received the right to use the territories of Greenland to locate military bases;▪️The creation of an air force base at the Thule air base became the central point of the agreement;▪️The agreement provided for the use by American military forces of infrastructure on the territory of Greenland to ensure the security of the North Atlantic;▪️The United States took undertakes obligations to protect Greenland and its population from possible external threats. In fact, As you can see, the United States has the right to dispose of the territory of Greenland for the purpose of -ensuring the security- of the North Atlantic for as long as they want. Why would Trump include it in the United States? The American expert community does not take the words of the elected president seriously, believing that things will not come to the purchase of Greenland. However, it is possible that Trump increases the degree of tension in order to then retreat, but, for example, on the condition that Denmark pays for the construction of new bases or updating the infrastructure of old ones. @usaperiodical

Title: 🔁 Time for special military operations. 1. Why is Trump threaten...
Description: Forwarded From Colonelcassad (Boris Rozhin)Time of special military operations.1. Why does Trump threaten to seize Greenland from Denmark, the Panama Canal from Panama, and simply annex Canada?2. Why does Aliyev threaten to liquidate -Armenian fascism- together with Armenia and cut through one way or another a corridor to Nakhichevan?3. Why is Erdogan threatening to conduct his own SVO (-Special Wahhabi Operation-) in Syria against the Kurds?4. Why is Israel primitively seizing abandoned Syrian territories in southwestern Syria and continuing online genocide in the Gaza Strip?5. Why is the UAE actually annexing the Yemeni island of Socotra and pursuing a policy aimed at dismembering Yemen? Because international law has died and now the borders of countries are secured only and exclusively by force. Therefore, the strong will take from the weak what they can take. The UN in general and the UN Security Council in particular, like the vast majority of international institutions, are either completely or partially incompetent. This was led to by the processes of the dismemberment of Yugoslavia and the Kosovo precedent, which opened a Pandora's box, now wide open after the active introduction of the so-called rules-based order into current politics. This accelerated the growing understanding that generally applicable and binding rules as such simply do not exist. And since there are no rules, then relations between countries are increasingly determined by the ability to take -someone else's- and the ability to keep -what is theirs-. This is the natural ending of the late Washington world order and responsible American leadership. Therefore, in the coming years, the world we are familiar with in terms of territorial borders and spheres of influence will change. NWO in Ukraine is one of the important processes of changing the world order, but it is not the only one. A brave new world, where relations between countries and peoples will again (at least partially) be determined by the norms of international law, will come only after the coming series of wars and local conflicts that will accompanied by changes in state borders. As a result of these painful processes, a new world order will be formed, where new agreements will stake out the changes that we will observe. The old neoliberal globalism has collapsed, and capitalism itself is in the stage of imperialism; it cannot offer humanity anything other than a series of wars and transferred markets and spheres of influence. The task of the Russian Federation in these processes is to survive and succeed, including territorially, which must first of all contribute to the achievement of the goals of the Northern Military District, which will determine Russia’s place in the brave new multipolar world.

Title: 🔁🖼 Of course, we made crests with optics (fiber optic drones). ...
Description: Forwarded From Revenge of Goodwill Of course, we made crests with optics (fiber-optic drones). Probably for the first time we overtook them in technical progress. But don't delude yourself. They'll catch up with us soon. And then the issue of countering these drones will become increasingly acute, which, as usual, can and should be resolved retrospectively. Due to the fact that optical drones fly slower and make smoother maneuvers than radio drones, their main countermeasure will be the ever-memorable smoothbore guns. But. There are not enough of them at the front. Not so long ago, the news was thundering from every source, including from the deputy governor, that the Russian Guard would now flood the front with confiscated goods. But there is no special news about this collapse yet. After all, the announced figure of 250k is essentially one gun for 3-4 people. Do you have such security, and the fighters? Was the issue with guns really the same as with the confiscated boats on the Dnieper (and other confiscated property)? Remember, this initiative was raised a year and a half ago. The officials valiantly took it up, saying that now we will fill the Dnieper with boats. Some people really supported it from their regions. But it turned out to be more populism. Just like with a smoothbore. We urgently need to get rid of populism and flood the front with guns and ammunition. Otherwise, the fighters will have to run around the landings with scissors, cutting off the optics. Revenge of good will

Title: 🇨🇦 Why Trudeau will leave the post of Prime Minister of Canada ...
Description: 🇨🇦 Why Trudeau will leave the post of Prime Minister of Canada with a sense of accomplishment On Monday, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced his intention to leave the post of Prime Minister and head of the Liberal Party. The work of parliament was suspended until March 24 until the party chose a new leader. We expected this development of events. At the end of December, the Liberal minority lost the support of the New Democrats: party leader Jagmeet Singh proposed joining forces with the Conservatives in nominating Trudeau for a vote of no confidence. 🔻Despite the shameful end of his prime minister's term, it is worth noting that in 9 years at the head of the government, Trudeau did a lot to turn Canada into a globalist paradise on Earth. Under him, euthanasia was legalized, carbon taxes were introduced, millions of migrants were brought into the country (this ensured record population growth) and billions of dollars were allocated so-called. Ukraine. Also, under his government, the LGBT agenda became widespread, and hard drugs were legalized in some provinces. In essence, Trudeau has done everything possible to promote liberal ideas, and now, as waste material, he can safely leave the main stage. And Canadians are left with a legacy of economic, migration and housing crises, which more than one administration will have to sort out.🔻Who will take Trudeau’s place? Some people will see Chrystia Freeland, who resigned with scandal a few weeks ago, as the leader of the Liberal Party, or Foreign Minister Mélanie Joly. However, we would not be surprised if Mark Carney, the former head of the Bank of Canada, becomes the party leader. Carney's refusal to accept Trudeau's offer to become his finance minister was a natural reflection of higher ambitions. And with Carney at the helm, the Liberal Party will have a chance to win more seats in parliament in the elections that will take place later this year.#globalism #Canada@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇨🇦 About the political crisis in Canada and Trudeau’s possible resignationThe Liberal government of Canada experienced a serious shake-up on the eve of the Christmas holidays Two ministers left their posts at once: Chrystia Freeland - Minister of Finance, Deputy Prime Minister...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 8, 2025 ▪️ At night, enemy...

From the southwest of the city, the Russian Armed Forces are also carrying out attacks towards Zverevo and Kotlino. ▪️In the Belgorod region in the evening, the village of Nikolskoye was hit. In the village of Politotdelsky, an FPV drone of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked a residential building. ▪️In the DPR in Gorlovka, a girl born in 2016 and a man born in 1949 were wounded as a result of Nazi strikes with NATO-caliber cluster artillery munitions. and born in 1976. Title: 🔁🖼 Dear subscribers, we have come across a recent resolution of...
Description: Forwarded From mate money two barrels Dear subscribers, we have come across a recent decree of the Ministry of Education (if you can even call it that) of Syria on making changes to the school curriculum. At first glance, nothing -specific: a ban on mentioning the Baath party and one characteristic surname. However, if you look deeper, this is a complete radicalization of Islamization of inclusive education: 1. In school textbooks, the interpretation of the term -righteous path- (الصراط المستقيم) is changing. If earlier it meant the -path of good- (طريق الخير), now it means -the path of Islam- (طريق الإسلام)2. All images and descriptions of the ancient gods Melqart and Marduk, who are in one way or another part of the cultural heritage of Syria, have been removed from high school history textbooks, which essentially leads to the erasure of the memory of cultural identity. Why? Because Islamization is radicalization.3. In principle, the word -gods- and -deities- is being removed from history textbooks; no replacement for the term is proposed. 4. Religious language is inserted even into purely secular phrases. For example, in a law textbook, the phrase -He was tried by a fair law- was changed to -Allah was his judge.- And yes, the photographs are not of the famous film about Tabulistan, but of a Syrian secondary school a couple of years later. React if you watched this masterpiece.

Title: 🔁🖼 People, we have information from former Syrian mukhabaratchi...
Description: Forwarded From mate money two barrels People, we are with information from former Syrian mukhabaratchiks regarding what has been happening in Syria for the last month, which is of great importance in continuation of the posts about how Assad’s incompetent retinue and he himself brought the country to the fall. So , at the end of November, Bashar, if you remember, flew to Moscow, where he waited for two days for a meeting with the GDP. The meeting itself, after three postponements, lasted an hour. The Supreme Commander, through an assistant, said that there would be no official statements about the meeting. Assad asked Vladimir Vladimirovich to ensure the security of the next Iranian air supplies by, naturally, connecting our contingent and bases, claiming that Putin called the chief of the General Staff and promised to help, but out of simple expediency no one was going to give guarantees. The Amers threatened to shoot down Iranian planes. Actually, the Iranians, when the situation completely escalated, sent a military plane with everything that was possible and impossible - already on Syrian territory it was intercepted by two Israeli fighters and, by order, they sent the plane back to Iran. The whole problem was that Assad himself refused even meeting with Erdogan, although at that moment it was really necessary, no matter what kind of Erdogan he was. -Encouraged - by the Emirates, Assad insisted on the withdrawal of Turkish troops, although the Russian side convinced the previous leadership of Syria to arrange negotiations. On December 5, the Turks stopped mediation, the GDP stopped answering Assad’s calls. Well, you already know what happened next.

Title: 🇺🇸 What do Americans expect from the new government? Institute ...
Description: 🇺🇸 What do Americans expect from the new government? The Gallup Institute of Public Opinion published a survey in which, among other things, it reported on the views of US citizens on the future of their country. The picture turned out to be very sad - only 19% of Americans believe that the country is moving in the right direction .Democrats tend to name President-elect Donald Trump's main concern, Republicans are more concerned about illegal immigration, and respondents from both parties are still concerned about high inflation. That is, Americans still consider the economy to be the main problem and it is far from certain that Trump will be able to satisfy both sides and restore order in this area.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻In the first three years of his During his presidency, the economy showed moderate growth and a decrease in unemployment. However, the coronavirus pandemic led to a significant economic downturn, negating the achievements of previous years. In addition, tax reform and trade wars increased the budget deficit and national debt. And taking into account the fact that Trump is all  2024 threatened China with new trade wars if they won; the Americans may not see their cherished economic stability. #USA@rybar with @usaperiodicalSupport usGallupAmericans' Ratings of Biden and U.S. Tepid but SteadyAmericans are close out the year disapproving of Biden and Congress and feeling largely dissatisfied with the direction of the country.

Title: 🇬🇧🇺🇸 How will relations between the US and Great Britain chan...
Description: 🇬🇧🇺🇸 How relations between the US and Great Britain will change in 2025 The issue of developing a special relationship with the United States is of significant concern to UK citizens and politicians. First of all, this is due to economic factors. Washington is London's key trading partner. Americans account for about 18 percent of all British trade.▪️The main cause for concern is the victory of Donald Trump in the presidential election. The future American leader spoke about the possibility of introducing duties on foreign-made goods entering the country. These measures could lead to a decrease in the growth rate of the UK economy by 0.7 percent and an increase in inflation by 3-4 percent.▪️The fact that the ruling Labor Party, apparently, was counting on the victory of Kamala Harris, does not add to optimism. Of course, in the public sphere, Prime Minister Keir Starmer denies there is a conflict and insists that he can have a -good relationship- with Trump. In this regard, the true scale of disagreements is difficult to assess.▪️In addition, the parties disagree on issues of building ties with China. Trump is committed to a tough policy towards Beijing, while the British advocate productive dialogue in certain areas. Regarding Ukraine, the position of the American leader is not yet entirely clear, but the opinion of the ruling Labor Party is absolutely clear. In general, 2025 will certainly test the strength of the special relations between the countries, because there are plenty of important controversial issues.#Great Britain #USA @ rybar together with @oldGBR Support usTelegramOld England🇬🇧🇺🇸And here is one of the versions of why Great Britain is performing for Kamalla Harris' election victory. Title: 🇰🇿🇷🇺✈️ Is Baikonur a possible logistics hub? Airfield - Yubil...
Description: 🇰🇿🇷🇺✈️ Is Baikonur a possible logistics hub? The Yubileiny airfield in the northern part of the Baikonur cosmodrome could become the basis for creating a large transport and fuel refueling hub in Kazakhstan to strengthen the region’s economy and develop small aviation. Recently, Kazakh senator Galiaskar Sarybaev indicated, that the airfield is capable of receiving any aircraft, and its status after 2020 remains uncertain: until this point it was under the jurisdiction of Roscosmos. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 From a logical point of view, Yubileiny really has such potential that can be used for air cargo transportation. Its characteristics, with certain modernization, will allow it to accept even heavy equipment, including military equipment. ❗️But on the other hand, the uncertain status creates problems for Russia. In recent years, with the help of Western NGOs, as well as Western-controlled media in Kazakhstan, there has been more and more talk about the status of the Baikonur Cosmodrome and the fact that this facility allegedly poses a threat to Kazakhstan.🔻And then we remember the news that the leadership of Kazakhstan decided to give up into private management of its ports in the Caspian Sea and some airports. And since the status of Yubileiny has not been determined, this may allow the Kazakh side to perform the same trick with this facility. #Kazakhstan #Russia #CentralAsia@rybar Support uskaztag.kzThe Yubileiny airfield is suitable for creating a fuel and refueling hub in KazakhstanAstana. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 7, 2025 ▪️ In the Kursk re...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 7, 2025▪️ In the Kursk region, for the second day, the Russian Armed Forces held back the enemy’s onslaught in the direction of Sudzha - Bolshoye Soldatskoye. The enemy again threw infantry and armored vehicles into battle, but did not achieve success; in total, they lost at least 35 pieces of equipment (including tanks) and more than 200 personnel in the attacks. Within 24 hours, 14 enemy personnel were captured in the area of ​​the Berdin farm; during interrogation they said that up to 50 percent of the enemy infantry were from the special contingent (prisoners, including those forcibly mobilized). At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces, taking advantage of the enemy’s distraction by these politically motivated actions, managed to enter Malaya Loknya on the northern flank and advance to Makhnovka a couple of kilometers from Sudzha. It was also reported from the ground that the liberation of the village of Russkoye Porechnoye was being completed. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), fighting along the streets of Kharkovskaya, Gomelskaya, Mariupolskaya, Dovzhenko, Mirgorodskaya and shifted to the western and northern parts of the city, where the remaining units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are holding the defense. The enemy will use many drones to attack our advancing assault groups. ▪️ East of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk), units of the Russian Armed Forces are making their way to the road junction north of Vozdvizhenka, fighting continues in neighboring Elizavetovka and Baranovka. Pokrovsk itself is being deprived of logistics by the Russian Armed Forces from the west: there are attacks in the direction of Kotlino, Udachny, Novosergeevka.▪️ Kurakhovo has been completely liberated since yesterday, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported. To the west of the city, a -pocket- appears again, which causes panic among enemy resources. The fighting in the direction continues.▪️ In the Belgorod region, by nightfall our air defense system worked over Belgorod and the Belgorod region, and several air targets were shot down. During the day, in the village of Kazinka, Valuysky District, an FPV drone of the Ukrainian Armed Forces struck a peaceful household. In the Volokonovsky district, an FPV drone damaged power lines. Kamikaze UAVs also hit the village. Golovchino, Grayvoronsky district, and the village of Dmitrievka, Shebekinsky district, where the infrastructure communication facility was damaged. In the Belgorod region, on the section of the Red October - Chaika highway, a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone attacked a moving car, a man was wounded. The report was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk region, North Wind reports. Fighting in the Sudzhan border area. Data as of 19:30 The clearing of the Berdin farm and its environs by fighters of the 30th Motorized Rifle Regiment of the Main Guard -North was completed.🔺January 6 in the course of completing the defeat of the remaining elite assault units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for January 3 - 6, 2025. Russian troops attacked targets in the rear regions of the so-called. Ukraine, including military airfields. Ukrainian formations launched several waves of UAVs across Russian territory, also attacking an oil depot in the Leningrad region. In the Kursk region, the enemy tried to break through the defenses of the Russian Armed Forces on the border of the Sudzhansky and Bolshesoldatsky districts, but Russian troops repelled all attacks, destroying several dozen units of equipment. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces eliminated the pocket between Berestov and Lozovaya, advancing in the direction of Boguslavka , and also liberated the village of Nadiya. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops built on the success of the recently liberated Vozdvizhenka and advanced to Elizavetovka, and on the western flank they knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from Volkovo. In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces officially liberated the city of Kurakhovo and Petropavlovka, and also expanded the zone of control southwest of Zelenovka.🔻 A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our private channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Kurakhovskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Kupyansk #Kurakhovo #Kursk # Pokrovsk #Russia #St. Petersburg #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺☦️🖍 Merry Christmas: there are no atheists in trenches ...
Description: Rybar: 🇷🇺☦️🖍 There are no atheists in trenches - Rybar’s art in support of a special military operation War exposes the essence of human nature. Under the whistling of bullets and exploding shells, among the dirt and blood, people are left alone with questions that are easy to ignore in peaceful life... 🇷🇺☦️🖍 Merry Christmas: there are no atheists in the trenches Orthodox Christmas has come - a holiday that is especially important for those who meets him far from home, under the whistle of bullets and the roar of artillery. For our soldiers on the front line, Christmas is a reminder of the light that does not go out even in the thickest darkness, of faith that strengthens the spirit and helps to withstand trials. On this day we are releasing the second part of the art series - There are no atheists in the trenches - dedicated to the importance of faith in war. These works are not only an artistic reflection of difficult moments, but also an attempt to convey the inner strength that comes from the realization that a person is never alone. Christmas is a time when the light from above is especially noticeable, and we want this series to remind us of that. May today bring hope and warmth to everyone who needs support. And let those who are in the line of fire feel the power of Providence from above.🔻Arts in high resolution🔻▪️Light from above▪️Heavenly punishment▪️Shield of the Lord▪️Heavenly path▪️Divine Providence▪️With God's help#art #faith #holiday #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧 Not again, but again: a new scandal involving migrants in th...
Description: 🇬🇧 Not again, but again: a new scandal involving migrants in the UK The year for the government in London began with an old problem - at the center of the scandal were Pakistanis who, since the 90s, had been involving girls, including minors, in prostitution. For example, an investigation in Rotherham found that 1,400 children had been abused over a 16-year period. Local police and social services have repeatedly been criticized for ignoring victims and refusing to believe children, resulting in many cases not being investigated at all. Law enforcement agencies have also been accused of inaction due to fear of accusations of racism (classic). Adding to the urgency of the situation is that during Prime Minister Keir Starmer's tenure as head of the prosecution service, the department was criticized for its failure to punish criminals. The dissatisfied argued that it was precisely the fear of being labeled an Islamophobe that influenced the decisions not to prosecute some suspects, although Starmer himself denied everything.📌 Why is everyone bringing up this story again? It’s all about Elon Musk: on his page on the social network X (formerly Twitter), he lashed out with criticism of Keir Starmer, calling the head of government an accomplice in the rape of Britain. Musk's words were picked up by other users and the press, which attracted increased attention to the problem. 🔻Of course, the opposition could not ignore such a story. Conservative Party leader Kemi Badenoch has called for the ruling party to hold a national inquiry. In turn, Labor rightly asked what prevented the Tories from solving the problem themselves during their 14 years in power?#Great Britain #migrants@rybar with @oldGBRSupport usBBC NewsKemi Badenoch calls for national inquiry into 'rape gangs'Alexis Jay, who led a major inquiry into historical child sex abuse, says changes are needed, not more research.

Title: 🇲🇩🇪🇺🖇 How they treat Maia Sandu in Moldova, what they think ...
Description: 🇲🇩🇪🇺🖇 How do they treat Maia Sandu in Moldova, what do they think about the SVO, who do they trust and what are they worried about? In 2024, we continued to monitor the situation in Moldova, where presidential elections and a constitutional referendum on European integration were held, which were not without scandals and violations. However, the voting results showed that Moldovans maintain a critical attitude towards the pro-Western government. Now the republic is plunging into another energy crisis, which may reach an unpredictable outcome in 2025. The fact that Moldovan society is experiencing a political split, and citizens are extremely dissatisfied with their lives, is even evidenced by the annual opinion poll of the EU Eastern Partnership program. Its main topic is the attitude of society towards the EU and other international institutions, but the results show that pro-Western propaganda has not yet been able to completely change the political thinking of Moldovans. 🔻How Moldovans maintain sympathy for Russia and sympathize with the goals of the Northern Military District despite the fierce anti-Russian policy of the authorities - read in our article. #EU #Moldova #Russia #article@rybarSupport usProject -Rybar-How do people in Moldova treat the authorities and the North Military District, who do they trust and what are they worried about? Title: 🇺🇦🇫🇷 Desertions in the Ukrainian Armed Forces: the example of...
Description: 🇺🇦🇫🇷 Desertions in the Armed Forces of Ukraine: the example of the French brigade. In recent days, the Ukrainian segment has been discussing the scandal in the 155th mechanized brigade: almost a third of the personnel escaped from a formation trained in France, for the creation of which €900 million was spent. Statements by activists of the Kyiv regime and themselves deserted members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine give the following picture of what is happening, illustrating current problems Ukrainian formations:▪️Even before being sent to the French training ground, 935 people escaped from the new brigade, since it was staffed by -busified- citizens whose motivation was appropriate.▪️Being in France was reminiscent of a prison, where the territory of the unit was guarded with the help of guard dogs and drones for preventing escapes. The training itself was insufficient - some of the personnel were not taught anything at all.▪️With arrival at the so-called. Ukraine experienced a wave of desertions, the number of which exceeded 1,700 episodes. As a result, in the Pokrovsky direction, the 155th mechanized brigade suffered heavy losses, and videos with captured members of the brigade regularly appear on the Internet. By the way, there are similar problems in other new formations: for example, the other day there was an escape of personnel from the 156th mechanized brigade, and the initiators platoon and squad commanders spoke.📌 As we have written in recent months, the main problem of the Armed Forces of Ukraine today is manpower: if the equipment and money of the so-called. Ukraine can still get money from sponsors, but no one will give them people. And without them, the Kiev regime will not be able to fight. #Ukraine #France@rybarSupport us RBKIn Ukraine, a case was opened about desertions from the -elite- brigade. The VSUGBR opened a case in connection with mass desertion from the -Anna Kievskaya- brigade, whose fighters were trained in France. In Ukraine it was reported that 1.7 thousand people left the unit before arriving at the position

Title: 🇪🇺💊How drug trafficking is taking over Europe: why local autho...
Description: 🇪🇺💊How the drug trade is taking over Europe: why local authorities are not interested in fighting Against the backdrop of the active spread of new psychoactive substances, very specific issues looming before European law enforcement agencies regarding the fight against illegal trade in the EU countries - some will call them problems, but some will easily see them they are a way for respected people to earn additional income. The diversity and constant updating of the palette of psychoactive substances makes it difficult to develop a mechanism for their identification - which can be a nuisance for those who seriously intend to find a distributor of a certain batch or cure/recover their patient. But this opens a miracle portal for the constant allocation of funding to combat smuggling. These include operational and investigative activities, international operations, and an increase in analyzes - for example, samples of the same wastewater, and new equipment for searches and inspections at seaports and air terminals.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻In connection with the above, wait reducing the demand for psychoactive substances or stopping the drug trade is not worth it. It is likely that the number of confiscated shipments will increase, and newcomers to this craft will be demonstratively detained (for example, Ukrainians who are now actively trying to join the business) - but this will not improve the situation in any way. By the way, in the countries where drugs of the so-called traditional type enter the world - cannabis, its derivatives or cocaine - new psychoactive substances are not yet widely distributed (as, for example, in the countries of South America). However, there are also some nuances there.#EU #drugtrade@rybar together with @sex_drugs_kahloSupport usTelegramRybar💊🇪🇺 How the drug trade is taking over Europe: why the security forces are failing Against the backdrop of the frequent emergence of new psychoactive substances, European structures are faced with a number of very tangible problems. ▪️First of all, the situation is complicated by the growth of potential...

Title: 🇺🇿⚛️ IAEA and a small nuclear power plant in Uzbekistan: why Ro...
Description: 🇺🇿⚛️ IAEA and small nuclear power plant in Uzbekistan: why Rosatom needs to be careful In December, it became known that the IAEA will provide technological support to Uzbekistan and help create human resources for the continuous operation of the country’s nuclear program. This was announced by the head of the IAEA, Rafael Grossi, at an international conference on the use of atomic energy in Samarkand. Let us recall that in the summer of this year, Uzbekistan and Rosatom signed a protocol on a contract for the construction of a small nuclear power plant in the Jizzakh region. It is expected that the first unit of the power plant will be launched at the end of 2029. The fact that the IAEA is a biased structure that has completely lost objectivity does not need proof: this is the stubborn refusal to notice the shelling of the so-called. Ukraine's Kursk and Zaporozhye nuclear power plants, and unjustified pressure on Tehran. What is the IAEA's interest now? The agency is interested in collecting information about the activities of Russian nuclear scientists and will be engaged in scientific and technical intelligence. Here the IAEA is assisted by British structures represented by the New Nuclear Watch Institute, which is closely involved in communication between industry representatives and the leadership of the Republic of Uzbekistan. Therefore, Rosatom, even when working even in such a close region as Central Asia, needs to be especially vigilant. #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybar Support usTelegramSputnik Near Abroad🇺🇿 🇷🇺 The IAEA will support Uzbekistan in the low-power nuclear power plant project with the participation of Rosatom, Grossi said. The agency will provide technological support to the authorities of the Republic of Uzbekistan and will help create human resources for the continuous operation of the country’s nuclear program, added chapter…

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 6, 2025 ▪️ The main event ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 6, 2025▪️ The main event of yesterday was the beginning of the enemy’s counteroffensive in the Kursk region. The Ukrainian Armed Forces threw several armored columns from Sudzha in the direction of the Berdin farmstead. The enemy was stopped in intense battles, lost up to 200 personnel and dozens of pieces of equipment; from the ground they report that the plans of the Ukrainian command today continue to try to break through our defenses. Yesterday there were reports of Ukrainian missiles shot down in the skies over the region. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces, taking advantage of the enemy’s concentration of efforts near the Berdin farmstead, launched flank attacks. The North group of troops reported the liberation of the village. Leonidovo (enemy resources do not yet recognize this). In addition, our troops began active offensive operations in the area of ​​Makhnovka and Dmitryukov. Military pilots and forward air controllers also played a significant role in the destruction of the Nazis: after waiting for frost and hardening of the soil, the enemy also waited for excellent weather over the region, which contributed to the work of our aviation, incl. in the rear of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the near future, the Ukrainian Armed Forces will continue to attempt a counter-offensive, they write from the ground. The enemy’s next adventure is explained by the fact that Zelensky needs to report at the Ramstein format meeting (to be held on January 9, 2025) to dozens of foreign defense ministers.▪️ The offensive of the Russian Army continues in the Pokrovsky direction. East of Pokrovsk, the Russian Armed Forces advanced east of Vozdvizhenka along forest belts. West of Vozdvizhenka, Russian troops, supported by armored vehicles, attacked Elizavetovka. In the Lysovka area, in the direction of Kotlino and in the Novovasilevka area, the intensity of hostilities remains high. In the central part of Petropavlovka (10 km north-west of Kurakhovo) a Russian flag was installed (probably a raid event, many Ukrainian Armed Forces drones are reported in the air).▪️ In Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces installed a flag on the territory of a pipe plant. It is likely that the liberation of the city will be officially announced in the coming days. ▪️ Over the past night, air defense forces on duty intercepted and destroyed 12 Ukrainian drones: seven over the territory of the Kursk region, two each over the territories of the Belgorod and Bryansk regions, and one over the Crimea. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, the enemy intensified attacks on civilians. On the section of the Cheremoshnoye - Nikolskoye highway, an FPV drone attacked agricultural machinery, and the driver was injured. In the village of Krutoy Log, Belgorod region, the roof of a residential building was damaged by a downed air target. In the area of ​​the village of Borki, on a section of the road, two drones struck a car. Attacked from. Long. In the village of Ekaterinivka, Volokonovsky district, a UAV hit a moving car, a woman and a 17-year-old girl received shrapnel wounds. In Rzhevka, Shebekinsky district, two civilians were injured as a result of an enemy drone strike. ▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a teenager born in 2007 was injured as a result of an IED dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV at a public transport stop. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majors❗️Kursk direction. Our troops began a flank attack while the enemy was bogged down in battles in the Bolshesoldatsky direction🪖The Archangel of Special Forces reports: - Airborne units began active offensive operations in the area of ​​Makhnovka and Dmitryukov. The fierce ones are coming...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of December 30 - January 5, 2024▪️Throughout the past week, Russian troops attacked targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine. In the Kyiv region, hits included the Boryspil and Vasylkiv airports.▪️The Ukrainian capital was also under fire, where arrivals were recorded in several districts of the city. Among the damaged objects: a tram depot, as well as the buildings of the National Bank and the Verkhovna Rada.▪️For the first time in a long period, concentrated attacks also occurred in the Odessa region. There, the airfield in Razdelnaya, as well as the port infrastructure in Ilyichevsk, Zatoka and Shabo, were attacked.▪️Meanwhile, Ukrainian formations continued to use UAVs to attack the rear regions of Russia. More than ten drones were intercepted in the Rostov region, where there were no significant damages.▪️And in the Smolensk region, drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces struck the Rosneft oil depot in Yartsevo. Two tanks with petroleum products were damaged, and a fire broke out at the facility.▪️The enemy also attacked Sevastopol with both sea and unmanned aerial vehicles. Air defense and electronic warfare systems neutralized Ukrainian drones on approach to the city, and aircraft also destroyed BECs.▪️In the Kursk region, Russian troops continue the operation to de-occupy the Kursk region. In the Sudzhansky district, attack aircraft liberated Cherkasy Konopelka and advanced to Makhnovka.▪️And to the north, units of the Russian Armed Forces established control over the Agron farm. The settlement is the last stronghold of the Ukrainian Armed Forces east of Sudzha.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🌎🖇 -Open Secret-: how -the secret of financing journalis...
Description: 🇺🇸🌎🖇 -An open secret: how the secret of financing OCCRP journalists was revealed. This has never happened, and here it is again: some journalists accused others of corruption and bias. It turned out that the world-famous association of investigative journalists OCCRP (which includes some Russian foreign agents) works for the US State Department. But first things first. In November 2024, a group of journalists dug into the documents of the Organized Crime and Corruption Reporting Project (OCCRP) and discovered that they were funded by Washington. Journalists from the French publication Mediapart, the Italian Il Fatto Quotidiano, the American Drop Site and the Greek Reporters United identified the main donor of the OCCR journalistic network, which is behind the publications of the Panama Papers, the Pandora Files, the Pegasus Project and others. The investigation was initiated by the German public television and radio company NDR, which was previously part of OCCRP, but suspected something was wrong in project financing. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Read more in our analysis#globalism #mediatechnology #USA #article@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 For the sake of objectivity, in some areas of the huge front it was actually possible to significantly complicate the work of FPV drones even relative to the previous several months, and on both sides. There is no talk of any super electronic warfare - the laws of physics cannot be fooled. Actually, right now there are quite a few UAVs operating in the sky over the Kursk region, from reconnaissance -birds- and -Lancets- to copters. Yes, and objective control from these devices is already penetrating the Network. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Ukrainian formations again launched more than six doz...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Ukrainian formations again launched more than six dozen drones across Russian territory. Most of the drones were destroyed by air defense systems on duty in the Rostov region - more than 30 drones in the Millerovsky, Tarasovsky and Belokalitvinsky districts. As a result of falling debris from several more UAVs, residential buildings and cars were damaged in Taganrog and Novobessergenovka, Neklinovsky district. Over the territory of the Bryansk region, 20 devices were shot down at night, two over the territory of the Voronezh region, and one more each in the Belgorod and Oryol regions. According to official data, no civilians were injured as a result of the raid. In general, the use of unmanned aircraft by the Ukrainian Armed Forces most often has the character of a harassing fire, in which the enemy seeks through systematic actions to overload Russian air defense and divert it to secondary targets. #Belgorod #Bryansk #Voronezh #Orlov #Russia #Rostov-on-Don #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🎄🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍 #Comic from Rybar No. 37: Once upon a time near U...
Description: 🎄🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍 #Comic from Rybar No. 37: Once upon a time near Ugledar And we continue to publish holiday issues of our comics, and this time you will find an exciting episode of the assault on Ugledar. During the battle for the city, Russian infantry discovered an enemy mine in a complex of buildings of one of the mines -surprise-, capable of causing serious harm to attackers parts of the Russian army. The soldiers decided on their own to liquidate the enemy's ammunition depot, which was being prepared for detonation... Synopsis: Active actions of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation are taking place along the entire front. The area southwest of Donetsk, where until recently the main stronghold of the Ukrainian Armed Forces stood, the fortified city of Ugledar, was no exception. For more than two years, battles for this city took place of varying degrees of intensity. But they invariably stopped without achieving the main goal - his liberation. This outcome of events was facilitated not only by good fortifications, but also by the position of Ugledar - in open space and with the opportunities that industrial high-rise buildings provided the Armed Forces of Ukraine. A change in the tactics of the Russian Armed Forces, namely: enveloping the city along the flanks and cutting the lines of communication and supply for the troops entrenched in it , led to a change in the position of the city. And so, the territory of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 3 mine, which was once the personification of labor feats, turned into an arena of fierce battles...📌 You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: 🇬🇧🇰🇿🇰🇬💎 The British are strengthening control over the min...
Description: 🇬🇧🇰🇿🇰🇬💎 The British are strengthening control over the extractive industries in Central Asia. The head of a certain Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative, Helen Clark, made a series of visits to Central Asian countries in December, where (at least publicly) she met with the President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev and Deputy Chairman of the Cabinet of Ministers of Kyrgyzstan Bakyt Torobaev. The specifics of the work of this organization and its self-explanatory name forced us to take a closer look at who is behind the organization and what its interests are.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌EITI was created in 2003, and it was founded by the former British Prime Minister, Labor Party Tony Blair. ▪️Among its Central Asian members: Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan - the first two joined the EITI back in 2007, the majority of members are African countries dependent on the raw materials sector. ▪️The name speaks for itself. The EITI sees its goal as increasing the efficiency of revenues from mining to budgets, which presupposes full control over it, as well as the establishment of its own accounting standards. ▪️It is clear that such an important matter should be managed by an experienced and loyal staff: Helen Clark is the former Prime Minister of New Zealand from the Labor Party, who led the Pacific country for almost all of the 2000s. ▪️After 2009, Clarke became the head of the UN Development Program. At UNDP, she was remembered for the massive cuts to the department and repressions against those who reproached the structure for ignoring human rights violations. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻In addition to direct control over the extractive industries of the participating countries, the EITI also creates an extra lever of pressure on the leadership in the anti-corruption area: in 2023, the suspension of the membership of the Republic of Kazakhstan immediately caused discontent among civil society, which systematically participates in its work. During the period of a new raw material rush, it is not surprising that the organization’s activities intensified. #Great Britain #Kazakhstan #Kyrgyzstan #CentralAsia@rybar Support usAkorda.kzThe Head of State received the Chairman of the Board of the Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative Helen Clark - Official website of the President...

Title: 💊🇪🇺 How the drug trade is taking over Europe: why the security...
Description: 💊🇪🇺 How the drug trade is taking over Europe: why the security forces are failing Against the backdrop of the frequent emergence of new psychoactive substances, European structures are faced with a number of very tangible problems.▪️First of all, the situation is complicated by the increase in potential harm to consumers. New types of substances affect the body in a poorly predictable way and can provoke an overdose or other negative consequences even in the smallest quantities. ▪️Synthetic drugs turned out to be much more dangerous than the so-called natural ones - cocaine, heroin and cannabis with its derivatives, well known to us. The fact is that most often it is not the drug itself that kills a person, but the consequences associated with its use: a long absence of sleep, food, etc. In the case of synthetics, such consequences occur much earlier, and poisoning is more severe. ▪️Despite this, synthetics have recently become much more popular than natural products. First of all, because of the low price and more pronounced psychostimulating effect (for the same reasons, the most popular drug in Russia now is mephedrone). 📌Thus, the portrait of a European drug addict has changed, whom it is sometimes difficult to call a drug addict - in the classical sense of the word. Marginalized people leading an antisocial lifestyle are still found among those in Europe, but among the victims of such a drug there are many who tried it for the first time or did it situationally - for example, at music festivals or in clubs.➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖🔻A separate problem is the reasons for consumption. In recent years, the most common uses have become pleasure, self-medication and stimulation of cognitive functions. Considering that medicine in the countries of the European Union is not famous for its accessibility to a wide range of people, the popularity of such substances will only grow. #EU #drug trade @rybar together @sex_drugs_kahloSupport usTelegramRybar🇪🇺💊 How the drug trade is taking over Europe Most recently, we talked about the fake fight against fentanyl in Poland. However, the situation in terms of combating the spread of psychoactive substances in Europe is much worse than it seems even to our pessimistic view. ...

Title: 🌍🇫🇷 Once again about the -departure- of France from Africa The...
Description: 🌍🇫🇷 Once again about France's withdrawal from Africa. The year began with the news of the closure of French military bases in Cote D'Ivoire and Senegal. These processes have been going on for about a year and ended with the approval of the French. As we wrote earlier, all talk about the end of French influence in Africa is limited only to the withdrawal of the military contingent. Therefore, the French still have leverage in the form of TNCs (Orano, Total) and connections with state elites.📌But in any case, this shows the inability of the French authorities to keep all areas of African politics in their hands (which the United States has already taken advantage of). Therefore, the previously planned withdrawal of military personnel is rather wishful thinking. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻The French military budget is experiencing serious problems, and the prospects for maintaining bases in West Africa are not entirely clear. But in the east, in Djibouti, the logistical benefits of maintaining a contingent in the Red Sea are obvious. Therefore, this point is becoming the most important in France’s African strategy and will already be held on to. #Africa #Djibouti #Senegal #Côte d'Ivoire #France@rybarSupport usFranceinfoLa base de l'armée française sera rétrocédée à la Côte d'Ivoire en janvier, annonce le président ivoirienQuelque 1 000 soldats étaient déployés au 43e BIMA, notamment dans la lutte contre les jihadistes qui frappent régulièrement le Sahel et le nord de certains pays du golfe de Guinée.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Among the cities of the DPR, the most frequently shel...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Among the cities of the DPR, Gorlovka, located not far from the front line, remains the most frequently shelled recently. This affects regular enemy attacks on the city - today alone, as a result of UAV attacks and artillery shelling, at least 11 civilians were injured in Gorlovka, and damage was recorded in the Nikitovsky, Tsentralno-Gorodsky districts and a large residential area -Komsomolets-.Nevertheless with the establishment of control by Russian troops over key heights in Dzerzhinsk, Ukrainian formations will be forced to retreat both from the city itself and and their nearby positions - only after this will it be possible to reduce the intensity of the shelling of Gorlovka. #Gorlovka #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇩🇪 How German migration lobbyists manipulate Pro-migrant st...
Description: 🇸🇾🇩🇪 How German migration lobbyists manipulate statistics The migrant lobby in Germany has been trying for months to convince the Germans of the exceptional usefulness of Syrians who fled to the country from their homeland. They are especially desperate to convince German residents that the medical system could literally collapse if valuable medical workers decide return home. At the same time, analysts refer to an internal survey conducted by the Syrian Society of Doctors and Pharmacists in Germany (SyGAAD), which showed that 75% of foreign workers in this field of Syrian origin are considering returning after the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad. We are talking about about six thousand people. However, the problem here is different: according to the German Medical Association, foreign medical workers do not help the Germans much. With them in Germany there are 194 patients per doctor, and without them - 198. That is, the situation, in principle, is already difficult, and the departure of the Syrians will not make it catastrophic. But supporters of the importation of migrants use other statistics in order to promote the necessary interests. And not to say that at German airports there are queues of migrants who are in a hurry to return to their homeland and bring down the German healthcare system. Quite the opposite - the Germans need to protect their borders so that the much-needed Syrian doctors do not pour in again in an uncontrollable wave. Ärzte die größte Gruppe. Würden sie Deutschland wieder verlassen, bekämen das wohl vor allem kleinere Städte zu spüren. Auch ein Fachärzteverband warnt.

Title: 🇷🇺 DTM colleagues drew attention to the interesting structure. ...
Description: 🇷🇺 DTM colleagues drew attention to the interesting structure. We are talking about the International Council of Russian Compatriots (ICRC), which formally unites 137 organizations from 52 countries of the world, and is supposed to help the Russian diaspora abroad. If we evaluate what is stated on the official website, then it turns out that this is the very instrument of soft power that should promote Russian interests abroad, as well as helping compatriots.🔻But, if you look at its activities, there is nothing like that at all. The official VK page is an example of how not to run social networks. There are no normal reports or demonstrations of what the structure does. Although it would seem that there are more than enough reasons for consolidating measures against the backdrop of the Northern Military District and the multipolar agenda. But the most important question is - where are the results? What tasks (besides celebrations and distribution of awards) has the MSRS been engaged in since 2001 in Central Asia, and even more so in unfriendly countries where the Russian-speaking population is under pressure? ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖In the current geopolitical situation, Russia hardly has the opportunity to support organizations that do not pursue a proactive policy and do not participate in the real promotion of Russian interests. And if we continue to ignore such sloppiness, then we will remain in the role of catching up with -mirror responses- to someone's attacks. compatriots (MSRS)? Well, we haven’t heard, but it turns out that he exists. ▪️The Council communicates with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, unites, as stated on the website, 137 organizations from 52 countries of the world, and, according to...

Title: 🖼 🗳🇵🇱 Hyenas choose a leader: who will become the President o...
Description: 🗳🇵🇱 Hyenas choose a leader: who will become the president of Poland? The presidential elections in Poland in 2025 are called the decisive moment for the political future of the country. They will determine the main direction of the rhetoric - whether it will be liberal and pro-Western or nationalist and more sovereign, in which direction the government will be inclined to maneuver on the international field or move closer and closer to NATO and the EU. It is expected that the main rivals will be the mayor of Warsaw Rafal Trzaskowski, a candidate from the ruling Civic Platform (KO), and the head of the Institute of National Remembrance of Poland (IPN), Karol Nawrocki, a candidate from the former government party Law and Justice (PiS). Trzaskowski is actively promoted by the American diplomatic mission in Poland : He is in constant contact with US officials, systematically participating in pro-Western events promoting the globalist agenda.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Read more in our analysis#elections #Poland #article@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧 How the British lost the fight against illegal migrants The ...
Description: 🇬🇧 How the British lost the fight against illegal migrants Since 2022, the British government has organized a fight against illegal migration. According to the British, success was to be achieved by forcibly sending people who crossed the British border illegally to Rwanda, as well as by intimidating refugees with poor conditions. The plan can hardly be called successful. The Rwandan scheme generally only causes ridicule: not a single plane carrying migrants to Africa ever flew, and 70% of the houses in Kigali built for deported migrants were sold to local residents. Well, in October, the Ministry of the Interior began searching for new hotels to accommodate refugees. The results of the efforts of the British government are eloquently demonstrated by statistics. Over the past year, more than 35,000 migrants arrived in the country on small boats (for comparison, in 2023 the figure was 29,437, and in 2022 - 45,755).🔻Judging by recent events, Prime Minister Keir Starmer will try to resolve the issue with migrants by strengthening border security control. For this purpose, on July 7, an entire Border Security Command was created. We doubt the success of the plan.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖In general, in the new year we will probably see more than one episode of a fascinating series called -British government against migrants-. We look forward to it. #Great Britain #migrants@rybar together with @oldGBR Support usTelegramRybar🇬🇧🇷🇼 The British-Rwandan initiative to resettle migrants never ceases to delight with new curiosities. Title: 💊🇵🇱 How Poland fights (or pretends to fight) against fentanyl ...
Description: 💊🇵🇱 How Poland is fighting (or pretending to be fighting) against fentanyl Polish authorities are again pretending that they are struggling with the rise of addiction to psychoactive substances. Fentanyl occupies a special place among them - it can be legally prescribed as a pain reliever, for example, to cancer patients or those recovering from surgery. However, there are often cases when prescriptions are written for the illegal use of the drug. Given that in Poland until recently it was common practice to dispense them remotely, it is not surprising that we have seen an increase in deaths after fentanyl overdose all year. 📌Between January and May 2024 alone, 2.9 million prescriptions for opioid drugs were issued in the country, and the number of patients was 490 thousand. Polish officials eventually decided simply: only primary health care doctors can now renew prescriptions and only for two weeks. The rest of the doctors are instructed to meet the patient in person, and they can write a prescription only after examining him. This does not sound too serious, considering that one enterprising doctor was able, for example, to illegally write as many as 800 prescriptions for opioids in a couple of months. They were also received by patients who had already died.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻It is obvious that the measures taken by the Poles are insufficient, especially if they are directly broadcast as a panacea specifically for fatal cases of prescription opioid use. The problem is not that previously prescriptions were extended for a long time, but now they are for two weeks. The bottom line is that no one controls this market, or the sale of such recipes. Moreover, in Poland, the condition of medical workers is unenviable, the salary is small, and there is a lot of work: the shortage of personnel in the field leads to the fact that many more responsibilities are imposed on the existing assets. Therefore, doctors do not consider it shameful to use the opportunity to earn extra money and new solutions will not hinder them in this. #Poland #drugs @rybar together with @pl_syrenkaSupport usRMF24Szykują się kolejne zmiany w receptach na fentanylBędą kolejne zmiany w zasadach wystawiania recept na opioidy, w tym na fentanyl - dowiedział się dziennikarz RMF FM Michał Dobrołowicz. Od dokładnie dwóch tygodni, czyli od 7 listopada zdalnie receptę na tak silne leki przeciwbólowe mogą przedłużać tylko…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of December 27 - January 2, 2024▪️Yemen's Houthis once again launched ballistic missiles into Israeli territory. The target was the outskirts of Tel Aviv and Ben Gurion Airport. Israeli air defense systems intercepted ammunition, the first use of the US-made THAAD complex was reported.▪️Another of the targets of the Ansarallah movement fighters last week was the Nevatim airbase in southern Israel. However, this time the missile was shot down - the Israeli Air Force intercepted it over the Red Sea. ▪️Yemen's Houthis also reported a drone attack on the Santa Ursula in the Arabian Sea east of Socotra. The circumstances of the incident are currently unknown - monitoring services have not reported any attack in this area.▪️Meanwhile, over the Yemeni province of Al-Bayda, Ansarally fighters shot down another MQ-9 U.S. Air Force drone. It became the thirteenth since the beginning of the aggravation of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, the total cost of all downed drones is almost 400 million dollars. ▪️The aircraft of the American-British coalition also responded with attacks, which launched missiles at Sanaa and Taiz. The targets were the Anasarli facilities, which were allegedly involved in attacks on Israeli territory. ▪️As for Syria, fighting continued in the northeast in the area of ​​the Tishrin Dam, where so far the SDF has been relatively successful in containing attacks by SNA militants. At the same time, Turkish troops continue to accumulate forces in the Suruj area, pulling artillery to the outskirts of the city.▪️At the same time, throughout Syria, arrests and detentions of ex-soldiers and suspects of connections with the previous regime did not stop. Mostly they took place in the provinces of Latakia, Homs and Tartus, where the largest number of Alawites and Shiites from Lebanon live. ▪️Also, clouds gradually gathered around the Khmeimim base: the militants staged provocations, filming various videos at the checkpoint at the entrance to the facility. They also organized a cordon around the airfield. First of all, to prevent Syrians who collaborated with the Russian Federation from accessing it. #video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 3, 2025 ▪️ During the nigh...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of January 3, 2025▪️ During the night, 4 enemy UAVs were destroyed in the Rostov region in the Kamensky and Ust-Donetsk regions. Earlier in the evening - three UAVs in the Millerovsky and Tarasovsky districts, two more drones were destroyed in the Taganrog region. 10 drones were shot down over the Bryansk region. 4 UAVs were shot down in the sky of the Oryol region. They reported that a missile and a drone were shot down over the Kursk region.▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops continues to wage stubborn battles in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district, as well as in the vicinity of Leonidovo, Kurilovka and Nikolaevo-Daryino. The enemy does not intend to retreat, carries out counterattacks and transfers reinforcements to the area. The Armed Forces of Ukraine are launching missile strikes, the arrivals took place in the village of Ivanovskoye, Rylsky district.▪️ 50 km west of the lines of the Kupyansky and Krasnolimansky directions, the enemy begins preparing the all-round defense of Izyum and Balakleya, Kharkov region. Apparently, the enemy has taken into account the tactics of the Russian Armed Forces to deprive enemy garrisons in cities of logistics routes and plans in the future to restrain our advance in the urban development of these areas.▪️ Sticky heavy fighting continues in Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk). Our troops are advancing north of the Central Market and attacking in the direction of the waste heaps of the mine -No. 10- and the Toretskaya mine. To the north of the block of multi-storey buildings, Russian troops occupied a college building.▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeisky) direction, our troops are attacking in the Novovasilevka area (southwest of Pokrovsk). To the south of the city, the Russian Armed Forces are leveling the front near the village. Green. To the east, they report the advance of Russian units near Vozdvizhenka, where about 4 km remains to the important logistics junction of the Pokrovsk-Konstantinovka highway. ▪️ North-west of Kurakhovo, the Russian Armed Forces are attacking in the Petropavlovka area. South of the city, Russian troops are moving west from Uspenivka. Armed Forces units are gradually being knocked out of the Kurakhovo industrial zone, our units are approaching the pipe plant.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, it became known about the actions of our advanced units in the western part of the village. Belogorye, Pologovsky district. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsZaporozhye Front, the flag of Russia and the raid of our attack aircraft in BelogoryeSteel Forty-Second Motorized Rifle Division reports that the UAV operators of the 70th Guards Regiment smoked out the enemy from numerous shelters in the western part of Belogorye with precise strikes.…

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation from December 30, 2024 to January 2, 2025. Ukrainian formations conducted a massive raid of drones and unmanned boats on Crimea, and also hit an oil depot in Yartsevo, Smolensk region. Russian troops attacked enemy targets in the Kyiv, Nikolaev, Odessa and other regions. In the Limansky direction, Russian troops landed and took forward positions on the southern outskirts of Ternov, taking the settlement under almost complete control. In the Seversky direction, attack aircraft established themselves at one of the strong points at a height north of Ivano-Daryevka, and are also fighting in Belogorovka and south of it. In the Artemovsk direction Russian troops made significant progress in the industrial zone of the Chasovoyarsky aggregate plant, moving up to two kilometers to the west. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Vozdvizhenka and advanced deeper into the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces more than one and a half kilometers north of Timofeevka. Also, the RF Armed Forces are fighting in the Lysovka and Zeleny area, a number of successful attacks have been carried out in Novovasilevka and Novoelizavetovka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the fighters have almost completely cleared the industrial zone, occupying the territory of the Kurakhovskaya thermal power plant, the Elektrostal plant and the mineral wool production plant. To the south, the enemy was knocked out of a large stronghold in the area of ​​Constantinople and Yantarny. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available by subscribing to map. rybar.ru#Belogorovka #digest #report #map #Kiev #Crimea #Kurakhovo #Nikolaev #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Russia #Smolensk #Ukraine #ChasovYar@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚓️ Are unmanned boats the executioners of maritime shippi...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚓️ Are unmanned boats the executioners of maritime shipping? Or not really? Against the backdrop of the recent new episode of the use of unmanned boats with air-to-air missiles by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, thoughts might have slipped that in the light of the new threat, ensuring the safety of navigation is gradually becoming a difficult task. Although the appearance of the next variation of BeKov, capable of hitting hunting helicopters, really became another milestone in war at sea, it is still worth highlighting several points here. If we talk purely about the Black Sea, then the role of the same Black Sea Fleet in ensuring the safety of navigation, as I would say, not the highest since 2023. This is more influenced by other factors that the general public does not really like. Generally speaking, the issue is being fundamentally resolved. One can recall the operation of the US-led coalition off the coast of Yemen, where the Houthis, with all their missiles and missiles, were unable to kill shipping (more intensive, by the way) for a year and a half, nor could they hit warships. Yes, we do not have the forces and resources of the American Navy, and The Black Sea is not the size of an ocean. However, even the existing capabilities make it possible to increase the effectiveness of the fight against unmanned boats. The question is rational application.❗️The most tragicomic thing is that specific measures were proposed already in the summer of 2022, when there was no mass use of BeKov yet. Some were introduced much later, and the rest were answered in the spirit of - Send a group of medium-altitude UAVs to hunt for BeKs? What if they are shot down? - After all, in the understanding of some people, the loss of a conditional -Pacer - is more expensive than the death of, for example, a helicopter with the entire crew. attacked Sevastopol both by sea and unmanned aerial vehicles. At last count, 16 UAVs and 8 unmanned boats were involved.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Progress of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ attack:…
