Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Zaporozhye direction: raid on Belogorye situation as ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Zaporozhye direction: raid on Belogorye situation as of 16:00 January 2, 2025 While the Russian army is successfully advancing near Pokrovsk and completing the liberation of Kurakhovo, in the Zaporozhye direction east of Orekhov there has been an unexpected activation of the front in the Malaya Tokmachka area. ❗️Soldiers of the 70th motorized rifle regiment hoisted a flag in the center of Belogorye during the fighting. After completing the task, the scouts retreated to previously prepared positions. The settlement itself is actually located in the gray zone and is not controlled by any of the parties. 📌At the same time, the attack on Belogorye would have been impossible without the liberation of neighboring Lugovsky. Previously, the village had been seized many times, according to statements on the Internet, back in the fall, but there had been no objective control personnel from the locality for the last six months. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Now, thanks to the video of the fire raid on Belogorye, the fact of Lugovsky’s release is clearly confirmed. Thus, at the moment, about 5 km remains to be reached to the eastern outskirts of Malaya Tokmachka. Title: 🎬 🇺🇸🇲🇪🇮🇹💀 The New Year in the West began with terrorist a...
Description: 🇺🇸🇲🇪🇮🇹💀 The New Year in the West began with terrorist attacks. On the first day of 2025, the attention of the world media was captured by a series of terrorist attacks, confirming the growth of instability in Western countries. 🔻In the USA, in the city of New Orleans, a Ford pickup truck crashed into a crowd of celebrating people. The driver, 42-year-old former military man Shamsud-Din Jabbar, opened fire and was killed by the police. 15 people were killed and 35 were injured. Homemade explosive devices and an IS flag were found in the car. On the same day, a Tesla Cybertruck exploded outside the Trump International Hotel in Las Vegas. A car filled with fireworks and gas cylinders injured seven people and killed the driver. The attacker turned out to be another former military man, Matthew Livelsberger, who previously worked in special forces. It is noteworthy that both pickup trucks were rented through the same application, but the police consider this to be a coincidence. 🔻Meanwhile, Europe had enough of its own incidents.➖In Montenegro, a certain Aco Martinovic started shooting in a cafe in Cetinje. As a result, 12 people died, and the perpetrator tried to commit suicide and died. ➖In Italy, an Egyptian attacked passers-by with a knife, shouting -Allahu Akbar-. The terrorist was shot dead by police and five people were wounded. ➖In Berlin, migrants started riots with arson, explosions of homemade bombs and attacks on civilians. The result is 5 dead, dozens of wounded, 390 detained. Alisa Weidel, co-chair of the Alternative for Germany party, said that the situation is reminiscent of a civil war, and citizens who just want to have fun are paying the price for migration policy. 🔻What does this mean? Events in the United States, which captured the news agenda in the morning, will become a topic of discussion in the coming days and will be actively used by supporters of tightening the fight against illegal migration. Moreover, this will to some extent free the hands of the future Trump administration in strengthening control over the work of the intelligence services and (given the profession of both terrorists) the defense sector. Well, events in Europe became a completely logical backdrop for American events: in the countries of the Old World, with their failed migration policies and persistent policy of constantly stressing the population, it would be strange to expect that the New Year’s celebrations would take place without fatal incidents. #Germany #Italy #USA #Montenegro #terrorism@rybar Support us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of January 2, 2025 ▪️ At night, enemy...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of January 2, 2025▪️ At night, enemy UAVs were destroyed over Voronezh and the region; drones were reported downed over the Bryansk region. In the evening, over the Rostov region, enemy drones were destroyed in the Millerovsky and Tarasovsky districts, as well as in the Taganrog region. During January 1, 2025, power supply was restored in the village. Giryi, Kursk region, which was hit by the Ukrainian Armed Forces with missiles in the first minutes of the new year. Also during the day, a drone was shot down in the sky of the Oryol region.▪️ Over the past 24 hours, the Russian Armed Forces, using aviation, attack UAVs and missile forces, struck military targets in Kyiv, and the roof of the building of the National Bank of Ukraine and a tram depot were also damaged.▪️ In the Kursk region, the group of troops - North - advances with stubborn battles in the forest belts of the Sudzhansky district, as well as in the surrounding area n.p. Leonidovo and Kurilovka. They are reporting plans to transfer enemy reserves to the region, incl. from among foreign mercenaries.▪️ In the Krasnolimansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are trying to take the heights beyond Ivanovka near Terny. The enemy records the build-up of our forces on the newly formed bridgehead in Ivanovka on the right bank of the river. Stallion, which our troops managed to force in winter conditions. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky (Krasnoarmeysky) direction, the capture of Vozdvizhenka (20 km east of Pokrovsk) was confirmed; this is a relatively new direction of our offensive. From Vozdvizhenka there is a direct route to the Pokrovsk – Konstantinovka highway. There are 4 km left to the north. In addition, a difficult situation for the Ukrainian Armed Forces has developed in Novovasilyevka (10 km southwest of Pokrovsk), active assault operations are underway. The Russian Armed Forces are advancing to the West. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, two civilians were injured as a result of a drone attack on a car on the Shakhovka-Tishanka highway section. As a result of the shelling, a partial power outage was recorded in the city of Shebekino. In the evening, two men who were wounded during yesterday’s shelling of Shebekino independently turned to the Shebekino Central District Hospital. ▪️ In the DPR from attacks by enemy MLRS and cannon artillery in the village. In Panteleimonovka (Yasinovatsky municipal district), four civilians were injured of varying degrees of severity. In Gorlovka, a radiotelephonist of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations was injured by a 155-mm artillery gun at his workplace. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramBelarusian security officer 🇧🇾Ukrainian resources confirm that the Russian Armed Forces occupied Vozdvizhenka in the Pokrovsky direction. From Vozdvizhenka there is a direct path to the Pokrovsk-Konstantinovka highway. There are 4 km left to reach it. @belarusian_silovik

Title: 🔁 Is everyone back in working order? Time to discuss an importan...
Description: Forwarded From Witnesses of BayraktarIs everyone back in working order? Time to discuss an important issue. There is still an acute shortage of smoothbore at the front. This topic has been raised more than once, the right steps have been taken, but the fact remains that there are not enough guns even for delivery and evacuation groups. Sometimes a group does not even have one smoothbore unit, but several are required. As a result, the guys drag their civilian guns to the front line. It reaches the point of absurdity. The soldier has his own gun in his hands and he also purchases ammunition for it at his own expense. Yes, it all depends on the unit, but such cases are not isolated at all. Why is it important now to resolve the issue with smooth trunks? The enemy ordered huge quantities of fiber optic spools from China. Very soon, Ukrainian fiber optic drones will become a mass phenomenon at the front. They fly slower and perform maneuvers more smoothly. Electronic warfare is useless against them, but it’s easier to shoot them down with small arms. I don’t think that saturating the front with 12 gauge barrels and cartridges is a big problem. Alexander Kharchenko

Title: 🖼 🇦🇲🌐🇺🇸 American software with Armenian flavor: how Synergy...
Description: 🇦🇲🌐🇺🇸 American software with an Armenian flavor: how Synergy International Systems is seizing digital infrastructure in the interests of the United States In 2024, we talked a lot about how Armenia is losing its sovereignty. Along with the deployment of agents of Western influence in the republic, digital control by the United States is being established. The history of the digital dictatorship of Americans in satellite countries has a long history, but one of its plots is connected with a native of Soviet Armenia, Ashot Hovhannisyan, who, with his company Synergy, has been a Washington contractor for more than 20 years installing software for the governments of countries - victorious democracies - Hovhannisyan also did not forget about his native Armenia, where after the Velvet Revolution of 2018 they also began to implement software from Synergy. But the IT giant was not spared by the traditions of local democracy and the struggle for power through criminal cases, which is why the US Ambassador had to save it personally. 🔻Read the history of political intrigues in Armenia using the example of Synergy on our website. Advance groups of the Russian Armed Forces were spotted in the private sector of the Severny microdistrict - most of it, apparently, has already been liberated. At the same time, the positions of Ukrainian formations in the territory of the mine of the same name are regularly suppressed by aviation and artillery. To the south, attack aircraft are advancing towards the Chasov Yar railway station and the fourth workshop of the refractory plant. Ukrainian formations use UAV crews and regularly transfer reserves to the site in order to restrain the advance of the Russian Armed Forces. Title: 🎬🖼 🇺🇦🇰🇷 Funny episode: yesterday the head of the Ukrainian ...
Description: 🇺🇦🇰🇷 A funny episode: yesterday the head of the Ukrainian quasi-state entity Zelensky announced the development of a locally produced OTRK - Sapsan - and even showed an alleged video of their combat use. However, it turned out that the footage is actually old and was taken six years ago. And they are not based on Ukrainian developments, but on the launch of a South Korean ballistic missile - Hyunmoo-2 - with an OTRK on a vehicle base. What were the representatives of the Kyiv regime guided by when making such a clumsy stuffing? Perhaps because the local audience, pumped up with rabid propaganda, will not understand and will eat up any information.📌 However, the enemy is really developing missile systems, although he is facing difficulties. A significant part of the units will be produced abroad from Western components, and the assembly itself will be made using the so-called. Ukraine. In terms of product characteristics, the product will be inferior to ATACMS or Storm Shadow, but this will allow the sponsors of the Kyiv regime to relieve themselves of some of the costs, from purely production to political ones, when permission to use such missiles in the old regions of Russia will not be required. #Ukraine #South Korea@ rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsky direction: crossing the State Torets and li...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: crossing the State Torets and liberation of Vozdvizhenka Today, reports about the intensification of offensive actions of the Russian Armed Forces west of Mirnograd, which had been spreading on the Internet for more than a week, were confirmed. Russian troops, relying on Timofeevka and Novoaleksandrovka, crossed the Kazenny Torets River and penetrated the enemy’s defenses for several kilometers. On the eastern flank, attack aircraft, during heavy fighting, knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from Vozdvizhenka. Now the Russian flag has been raised on the northwestern outskirts of the village, which allows us to talk about the complete control of its territory by the Russian Armed Forces. On the western flank, Russian troops occupied a large stronghold, having advanced significantly along the C-05-09-07 route. Probably, the primary goal of the Russian Armed Forces in this area is access to Elizavetovka and the interchange on the N-32 highway, control of which will allow cutting off communications between Konstantinovka and Mirnograd. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovsky direction: liberation of most of the Kura...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kurakhovo direction: liberation of most of the Kurakhovo industrial zone and deterioration of the position of the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison On the evening of December 31, almost a week after Russian troops took control of the entire residential development of Kurakhovo, footage of the hoisting of the Russian flag on the roof of one of the workshops of Elektrostal LLC appeared on the Internet -. Apparently, the Russian Armed Forces managed to drive the enemy out of the territory of the Kurakhovskaya Thermal Power Plant, which was previously a key center of the city’s defense. The position of the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison is rapidly deteriorating due to the capture of almost all supply routes under the fire control of Russian troops. Currently, fighting is taking place in the area of ​​the Kurakhovsky Mechanical Plant, the last large enterprise controlled by Ukrainian forces. The enemy is conducting a defense based on Dachnoe, trying to prevent the collapse of the defense to the south and west of Kurakhovo. Title: 🇬🇧 About the results of 2024 for the Labor Party In July, a...
Description: 🇬🇧 About the results of 2024 for the Labor Party In July, parliamentary elections were held in Great Britain and ended with the triumph of the opposition. Labor won a landslide victory with 411 seats in the legislature. The conservatives were content with only 121 representatives. Despite the great success, the ruling faction was not able to enjoy the historical achievement. ❗️A couple of weeks later, mass riots broke out in the country, which became the loudest political event of the year. The protests and the reaction of the authorities (or rather, the lack thereof) immediately had a negative impact on the positions of the Labor Party. The economic measures of the ruling party aimed at achieving economic growth did not add at all to the people's love. Yes, public opinion began to be prepared in advance for an increase in taxes with the help of the media, but this did not play a significant role. Ultimately, the ratings of the ruling party rapidly collapsed, and not a trace remained of the summer triumph. According to public opinion polls, only 26% of citizens evaluate the activities of the faction positively, which is one of the worst results since the Second World War. In fact, there is nothing surprising in this state of affairs. There are enough accumulated problems in the country, and someone has to make unpopular decisions. Now this burden has fallen to Labour. One way or another, all Starmers and others are just talking heads who will do as more serious people demand.#Great Britain@rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usTelegramRybar🇬🇧 Protests against migrants in the UKWe recently saw migrants organize riots in Leeds after an attempt by social services remove children from disadvantaged families. Their actions cost the British budget a million pounds.  ...

Let's reveal a little secret: we saved them in order to post them for the New Year holidays. The first sign is the next issue of the comic book series -Once Upon a Time-. Synopsis: Hiding behind statements about the desire for peace, the leadership of the so-called Ukraine continues to conduct hostilities and does not reduce their intensity. There is indiscriminate shelling of peaceful Russian cities and attacks on its infrastructure. T.N. Ukraine also does not refuse to invade Russian territory. To implement such plans, only equipment and weapons from NATO countries are not enough - new people in the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are required in commercial quantities, with whom they can replace the missing, dead, wounded, and prisoners. However, there are fewer and fewer people wishing to go to the front after hasty preparation. In such conditions, recruitment centers (RMCs) mobilize the population using far from humane and illegal methods, because the plan to capture soldiers must be carried out in any case, otherwise, who knows whether the military commissar himself will go to the line of combat contact. This approach can lead to very unexpected encounters...📌 You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. Title: 🇷🇺🇪🇺🇺🇦 While you were sleeping, there was a complete stop i...
Description: 🇷🇺🇪🇺🇺🇦 While you were sleeping, there was a complete stop in the transit of Russian gas to Europe through the so-called territory. Ukraine. The decision about this was actually announced by Vladimir Putin during a -straight line- at the end of last year. Pumping -blue fuel- through the Ukrainian gas transportation system has long worried part of the public. Let us repeat what was said earlier: gas supplies, first of all, filled the country’s budget, including for that very war with systematic attacks on the energy sector. Nevertheless, the leadership of the Kyiv regime has repeatedly announced its reluctance to extend the 2019 agreement after its expiration on the same terms. Russia was clearly not satisfied with the new requirements, and the era of transit through the so-called. Ukraine has ended. Now the only way to deliver Russian gas to Europe remains the Turkish Stream, not counting the transportation of LNG from terminals by sea. Which, for the logical reasons described above, do not plan to stop.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Well, almost.❗️ - Gazprom - at 08:00 Moscow time stopped gas supplies to Europe through Ukraine due to the completion of the transit agreement, the holding reported. -Gazprom is deprived of the technical and legal ability to supply gas for transit through Ukraine.

Title: 🇧🇦🇸🇾 From the Balkans to the Middle East: new threats and cha...
Description: 🇧🇦🇸🇾 From the Balkans to the Middle East: new threats and challenges The number of Bosniaks in the ranks of radical Islamists from the Balkans in the Middle East is in the hundreds, and after the Syrian events, the number is only growing. But the main problem is that they calmly return to Bosnia and Herzegovina, where they either become sleeper cells or openly continue terrorist activities, often even evading punishment due to the disastrous state of the legal system in BiH. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️Recently, rallies in support of Hamas, car rallies and marches with IS flags took place in Sarajevo. Due to the destructive policies of the authorities of the Muslim-Croat federation with the support of the EU, the Balkans have become a stronghold of extremists, who have even gained access to weapons factories in Bosnia. ▪️The radicalization of the BiH Federation is proceeding at an incredible pace. Given the increasingly aggressive rhetoric and the number of sleeper cells and jamaats, Sarajevo can safely be considered a kind of hub for terrorist activity in Europe. Türkiye, Saudi Arabia and Austria played a big role in this. In the Republika Srpska they speak directly about the increased danger of terrorism, but, as in the 90s, when Wahhabis from all over the world came to BiH, in the West they again prefer not to listen to the Serbs. ❗️Another detail has practically remained unnoticed: from January 1, Pristina will cancel visas and entry with passports for BiH citizens. That is, it actually creates a logistics corridor for sending militants: from Bosnia to Serbia (via the predominantly Muslim Sandjak), then to Kosovo, to Albania, then to Europe. Alternatively, you can use the mountainous north of Montenegro to cross into Kosovo or Albania. The only obstacle to such a route at the moment is the Republika Srpska, which does not recognize the abolition of visas and passports, which has become another reason for the pressure on the Serbian entity. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻 Regardless of how events develop in Syria, the situation in the Middle East will directly affect the security and stability of the Balkans. In addition to a possible new wave of refugees (their number is estimated at 1.5 million), sleeping cells are waking up, and the number of terrorist attacks being prepared and already committed has increased significantly. #Bosnia #Syria #terrorism@rybar together with @vestniksrbSupport usIN4SThe justice of the Americans Gestapo in BiH - IN4SPishe: Џevad Galiјasheviћ Kako su from the edges of BiH, according to the Americans it is imposed and tied...

Title: 🖼 🎄 HAPPY NEW YEAR 2025! Dear friends, the chimes have struck i...
Description: 🎄 HAPPY NEW YEAR 2025! Dear friends, the chimes have struck in the capital region, a loud -Hurray!- thunders through the streets, and the atmosphere is filled with New Year’s mood. In the Northern Military District zone, Russian soldiers look at their watches while performing combat service, and in the frosty darkness they whisper congratulations to each other in the trenches, without closing their eyes. At headquarters, hard work is interrupted for a moment, people hug each other and rejoice, like little children, for a brief moment forgetting that they are stern adults who decide the fate of the world. For all of us, the New Year is always the brightest and brightest holiday that gives confidence that everything will be fine in the future (even regardless of how difficult the subsequent years are). The New Year gives us all joy and light that penetrates to our very core. We sincerely wish you all to preserve this joy and light for the entire 2025th. Title: 🖼 🇲🇱🇨🇳 Why are the Chinese bringing business into the zone o...
Description: 🇲🇱🇨🇳 Why are the Chinese bringing business into the zone of Russian military influence? We would be glad to stop asking this question, but, unfortunately, the flow of news does not stop about how countries where stability is ensured by the sweat and blood of the Russian military are entering someone else's business. The Chinese company Ganfeng Lithium has completed construction of a large lithium processing plant in Mali, based on the Goulamina mine. The planned annual capacity is 506,000 tons of lithium, which will increase to 1 million tons in the second phase.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Despite security problems in the country and the new mining code, due to which many companies have fallen into legal proceedings, the Chinese decided to implement this project. At the same time, the Chinese companies themselves are not interested in the overall maintaining security in the country, limiting itself to the presence of private companies to protect industrial facilities.❗️Thus, external actors, not our companies, are promoting their interests on the shoulders of Russian fighters. This is primarily due to the reluctance of our business to advance in Africa, despite the large amount of resources . This is something new and risky and, in general, everything is complicated. And it is precisely this fact that leads to the fact that our military efforts do not advance the interests of Russia, but act into the hands of the same Anglo-Saxons and Chinese.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖🔻Equally poorly developed are the elements of soft power, which do not cultivate a population loyal to Russians. And it is mainly people who are personally close to the leader of the country who advance to power, and Russian influence rests on the fact that at the moment they are opposed to the French. All this speaks of a general lack of strategy regarding the Dark Continent. And in general, there is a feeling that our influence is filling a certain vacuum arising from anti-colonial trends, but at the same time does not formulate an alternative in contrast to at least the Turks and the Gulf countries. I would like to believe that in the new year this trend will be overcome. The map is high permissionEnglish version#Africa #China #Mali #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇾🇪🇺🇸 The American and British Air Forces again attacke...
Description: 🇮🇱🇾🇪🇺🇸 The American and British Air Forces again attacked Yemeni territory. The target was the positions of the Ansarallah movement near the Medical School on September 21 in Sana'a. It is noteworthy that footage of the attack was published on the Internet, which is usually not what you get from the Yemeni segment. Probably, the air strike by the Western coalition was a response to the Houthis launching ballistic missiles at the US and British Navy flotilla in the Red Sea. The official representative of the movement, Yahya Sari, announced the defeat of the aircraft carrier USS Harry S. Truman, but there is no confirmation. The Yemenis also reported attacks with a hypersonic missile - Palestine-2 - and a ballistic missile - Zulfiqar - on Ben-Gurion Airport in Tel Aviv and a power plant on south of Jerusalem. The Israelis announced the interception of one ammunition outside the country. Despite the fact that more than half of the attacks announced by the Houthis were not confirmed, the intensity of attacks in the region has not yet decreased. However, this may soon change: the same Israel will not avoid the opportunity to demonstratively respond to shelling with strikes on Yemen. We set big goals for ourselves and achieved them. We overcame challenges more than once because we were together. ▪️On this New Year's Eve, the intentions, hopes of family and friends, millions of people throughout Russia - together with our soldiers and commanders. ▪️Putin said that the soldiers in the Northern Military District are true heroes who have taken on the great military work of defending Russia and providing the people with lasting guarantees peace and security.▪️The Russian Federation is faithful to the covenants and traditions of veterans of the Great Patriotic War war.▪️The coming year 2025 has been declared in Russia as the Year of Defender of the Fatherland.▪️The Russian leader wished well-being and prosperity to every home, every family and Russia.#digest #Results of the Year #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 -We will come to an agreement with Trump!- or about ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🇺🇦 -We will come to an agreement with Trump!- or about sharing the skin of an unkilled bear In the context of discussing the prospects for 2025, the idea is popular in some circles that the arrival of a new administration in the United States will definitely have a good impact on the course of the North Military District. They say that Trump will want to come to an agreement with us on equal terms. For the sake of objectivity, today in the Russian media and political field there are noticeably fewer positive expectations from Trump than in 2016. However, some again see him as someone who will stop helping the Kyiv regime. 🔻Sometimes it even comes to talking about how many (and which) Ukrainian regions Trump will give us. But for some reason a simple question does not arise: what are the grounds for such optimistic ideas? Is the Kiev regime on the verge of collapse? Judging by the scale of support, the West does not think so, and the battles today are not taking place near Kiev or Odessa, but only Pokrovsky and Belogorovka, where the defenses have to be chewed through. Has the West run out of leverage on Russia? Looking at the announcement of piracy plans against the shadow fleet, this is also far away. And the US, Britain and the EU are also trying to improve the already worn-out sanctions. Does the US need Russia for the sake of a military alliance against China? Vladlen Tatarsky spoke succinctly on this matter two years ago. In addition, you can look at the shipbuilding conveyor of the People's Republic of China and remember the problems of the domestic Navy. If you continue to ask such questions, you will find that there are somehow no reasons for generous charity from Trump in our direction.❗️Inflated and unreasonable expectations only lead to subsequent disappointments. Relying on gifts from Trump or another external factor is not only irrational, but also dangerous. This is also a reason to remember the need to avoid making too loud statements on sensitive issues, so as not to become a hostage to your words. When decisions are made based on previous slogans, and not on objective reality.#Russia #USA #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramAndrey MedvedevThe coming year 2025 will be difficult. I would like to write something different, but illusions are dangerous, self-deception even more so. It is better to enter the New Year with a clear vision and a clear attitude than with a bag of empty hopes. It won't be easy for us. Because this is already completely...

Title: 🇺🇸 Crisis in the American House of Representatives: will Johnso...
Description: 🇺🇸 Crisis in the American House of Representatives: will Johnson retain the post of speaker? Speaker of the US House of Representatives Mike Johnson again finds himself in an unpleasant situation - the politician has lost confidence that he can defend the speaker's gavel during the upcoming vote in the lower house of Congress.▪️January 3 On the first day of the 119th Congress of the United States in 2025, the House of Representatives will elect a Speaker. Johnson, who secured the support of Donald Trump in the summer, has already managed to disappoint the influential Republican and his allies. ▪️Conservative Republicans were once again dissatisfied with the government funding bill - they are outraged that Johnson again failed to show firmness and made concessions to the Democrats. ▪️Trump, in turn, was disappointed that Johnson could not achieve an increase in the national debt ceiling, so he is considering whether to -give the command to the government. ▪️Trump can really remove Johnson from office - the shaky majority of Republicans in the House of Representatives is 219 people, Johnson needs to get 218 votes. Already, at least one Republican has said they will vote against his nomination, and two others have said they will consider whether they want Johnson as speaker. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Thus, the last word will most likely remain with Trump - if Johnson loses at least two votes, he will lose the speaker's gavel. Another thing is that the future American president does not need chaos in the House of Representatives now - it would be much easier to work with what is available. And, judging by the statements on December 30 about support for Johnson’s candidacy, it is precisely this decision that the future president will lean towards. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number🇺🇸 The United States once again faces the threat of a shutdown: the draft law on temporary government funding has collided obstructed in Congress by the objections of Donald Trump and his allies. ▪️Firstly, Trump is in favor of the project...

Title: 🔁📄 810th. Second issue .pdf - 11.2 MB
Description: Forwarded From RaZVozhaev810th. Second issue .pdf11.2 MB We continue, together with the Rybar team, a project - a series of graphic stories dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet - #Comic 810 No. 2: - It doesn’t matter who’s opposite. It is important who is nearby. I have already said that as the governor of the Hero City and the head of the State Council Commission on Culture and Traditional Spiritual and Moral Values, I see that there is a shortage of modern formats for conveying to schoolchildren the exploits of our children. And that’s why I proposed making such a joint project for the Rybar team - a series of graphic stories about our guys from the 810th brigade, based on real events. The 810th Brigade is a legend written with blood and sweat, these are pages of heroic history that will be passed down from generation to generation as a symbol of courage and patriotism. Someone came to its ranks at the call of their hearts, following friends and colleagues. Someone was brought here by service. But they all have one thing in common - military brotherhood. On the eve of the New Year, the story of the political officer of the 810th brigade with the call sign - Truth - reminds us of the essence of the North Military District, of people who overcome inhuman trials shoulder to shoulder. Is luck important at the front? Of course it is important. But, as the history of the encirclement of seven Marines near Kursk shows, -Those who are lucky are lucky.- The true meaning of this phrase is revealed in brotherhood in battle, in mutual assistance, in the willingness to give one's life for a comrade. In this special New Year's edition, we tried to reflect the indestructible spirit of our Marines and the true meaning of brotherhood in battle. Let this be the third New Year away from home. But faith in Victory, faith in the coming victorious year 2025 is stronger than distances and difficulties. In the future, comics will be available in our children's and school libraries.📍The second issue of the comic about the 810th Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Russia #Sevastopol

Title: 🔁🎬 Crimean coast Both Comrade Fisherman and the Archangel of Sp...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsCrimean Coast Both Comrade Fisherman and the Archangel of the Special Forces are right. The enemy continues to aspire to the Crimean shores and his water drones are becoming more and more dangerous for our air equipment, with which the Russian Armed Forces calmly destroyed the enemy’s MBEC for many months. In the new footage, the GUR shows an attack on our helicopter using a Magura V sea drone equipped with missile weapons (R- 73 -SeeDragon-)The second helicopter was damaged.✨Sad, but the tactics of using the R-73 with MBEC has been known for several months. Already, as can be seen in the footage previously taken from the enemy, machine guns from enemy surface platforms are being used. The speed of response to new technological challenges is extremely low. Once again, we consider it extremely important to draw attention to the fact that the enemy has now received battle-tested means of protection against the air threats of its mosquito fleet and is accumulating both the MBEC itself and small sea boats with navigation equipment. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Night drone attack on Sevastopol This night, Ukrainia...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Night drone attack on Sevastopol This night, Ukrainian formations attacked Sevastopol with both sea and aerial unmanned vehicles. At last count, 16 UAVs and 8 unmanned boats were involved.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Progress of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attack:▪️The Ukrainian Armed Forces attack came in waves of two or three UAVs. The first targets were shot down in the Cossack Bay area by rifle detachments and Pantsir crews. ▪️Then, in the same area, two BECs were spotted trying to break through the booms, but without success. The first one was hit and stopped, the second one was blown up nearby.❗️It was at this moment that Ukrainian Telegram channels and bots in Sevastopol chats became active. The former talked about hitting the anti-aircraft missile system and passed off the destruction of the BEC as this, while the latter sowed panic among the residents.▪️In the next two hours, more than a dozen more drones were shot down and suppressed by electronic warfare crews along the coast of Sevastopol. And army aviation helicopters were hunting for the BECs, eventually destroying 6 more drones.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️No attacks on Crimea have been recorded since the beginning of December, when several BECs were first destroyed near Sevastopol and Tarkhankut, and then repelled attack on the Kerch Strait. And after that the enemy fell silent. This is due to the fact that the Ukrainian Armed Forces accumulates resources for each attack. Over the past two weeks, tests of the BECs that were used in today’s attack have been carried out at the Kiev Reservoir. Again, attention is drawn to the fact that the BECs of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are increasingly dangerous for aircraft. In addition to machine guns, anti-aircraft missiles are being adapted for them, which previously were not highly accurate, but now pose a serious danger. Despite the fact that the attack was repulsed, new attacks should be expected in the coming days, because the Ukrainian Armed Forces received a new batch of both cruise and operational -tactical missiles. Their APU also hasn’t been used for a long time, so you can’t relax under any circumstances. High resolution mapEnglish version#Odessa #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🌍🇷🇺 What the Afrika Korps managed to do in 2024 The passing ye...
Description: 🌍🇷🇺 What the Afrika Korps managed to do in 2024 The year 2024 has opened a new page in the Russian military presence in Africa. In addition to the Wagner PMC, the activities of the recently created Afrika Korps of the Russian Ministry of Defense have fully developed. It has already replaced semi-official formations in Libya and expanded the activities of Russian military specialists to Burkina Faso, Niger and Equatorial Guinea. Plans to change the format of presence in Mali and the Central African Republic are also obvious.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Read more on our website#Africa #Russia #article@rybarSupport usProject -Rybar-On the activities of the Afrika Corps in 2024

Title: 🖼 ⭐️🖍#Comic 810 No. 2: It doesn’t matter who’s opposite. It mat...
Description: ⭐️🖍#Comic 810 No. 2: It doesn’t matter who’s opposite. It is important who is nearby. The Rybar team, together with the leadership of Sevastopol, continues a series of graphic stories dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet. Hundreds of people passed through the ranks of the 810th Brigade: someone joined its ranks out of duty hearts, leaving for the Northern Military District together with their neighbors and classmates. Someone ended up in the Sevastopol Marine Brigade at the behest of personnel authorities. What is important is not the reason why they ended up in the Donetsk People's Republic, the Kherson region or in the south of the Kursk region. The important thing is who was next to them.📌On the eve of the New Year, through the history of the political officer of the 810th brigade with the call sign Truth, it is important to remind every Marine not only for the sake of why everyone finds themselves shoulder to shoulder in the crucible of a special military operation. The reasons and motives are completely different for everyone. But by the will of fate, all the Marines found themselves in the most difficult situations, fulfilling the tasks assigned to them with dignity. Some people rely on luck. But the truth is always simple: -Those who are lucky are lucky. And in the example of the history of the encirclement of seven Marines in the Kursk region, this is clearly visible. In this special New Year's issue, we tried to reflect the true meaning of military brotherhood and mutual assistance. Let this be the third New Year away from home and family. But the Marines are confident that the coming year will be special. Victorious.📍The second issue of the comic about the 810th Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Crimea #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: fighting on the southern outskirts o...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: fighting on the southern outskirts of Terny On Monday evening, the enemy published footage of a recent attack by a Russian armored group in Terny. Several armored vehicles broke into the southern part of the village, one of them landed troops more than a kilometer from previously known positions. The Ukrainian Armed Forces tank that allegedly launched a fire raid on the attack aircraft, judging by the weather in the video, has nothing to do with the landing and attacked the positions of the Russian Armed Forces for weeks previously. At the moment, over 90% of the village is under the control of Russian troops; the basements and ruins of houses in the village are being cleared of remnants of members of Ukrainian formations. 🔻After securing new positions, the Russian Armed Forces will continue their journey south along Oskol towards Yampolovka and Torskoye. On the way, they will have to knock out the enemy from several ravines and the Yampolsky nature reserve, battles for which are about to begin soon. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us to the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Liman #Russia #Terns #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇷🇺🇺🇦 It so happens that every New Year or on the eve of th...

From 2022 to 2023 there was information about the preparation of the first drone attack on Moscow. Then the Shells appeared on the roofs. Remember? It’s as if it was so long ago and now everything has become so commonplace. From 2023 to 2024, at first there were attacks by unmanned boats on Sevastopol, similar to today’s. The GUR officers then posted footage from the moment of the shootout, where BeK’s on-board weapons were first recorded. And on New Year’s Day, the Armed Forces of Ukraine shelled the Donetsk agglomeration and killed many civilians. Now it is no longer so easy for them to reach Donetsk, but there are long-range missiles, drones and BeKs that are in use. What we are seeing now is essentially a standard set of measures on the part of the enemy. Moreover, there have been no attacks in Crimea for a long time, and there were plenty of warnings that a new wave was coming. #Crimea #Russia #UkraineGlobalistics - subscribe to the Telegram channelRybar🇷🇺🇺🇦🖇 What a revealing video: a representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate (GUR) is on air on the TV channel Ukraine claims that the Ukrainian Armed Forces, it turns out, do not strike at Donetsk. Title: 🔁 A diplomatic source in Brussels draws attention to the growing...
Description: Forwarded From Diplomatic source A diplomatic source in Brussels draws attention to the panic and growing concern of the financial circles of the European Union about Washington’s next initiatives regarding sponsoring the Kyiv regime. The idea is not new - to pay for the banquet for Zelensky and his criminal state-owned company using income from -frozen- Russian sovereign bonds stored in European clearing corporations. These are the same structures little known to the general public through which colossal volumes of mutual settlements take place. Their work is based, first of all, on the trust of clients, which has already been largely lost after the cynical theft of Russian assets in 2022. But it is one thing to freeze, and another to appropriate income. The reputational damage and financial losses that will follow could be critical for the entire industry. At the same time, the scheme is beneficial for the United States - it does not have to spend money from the deficit budget, and in the long term, a strong European competitor is eliminated. Another example of unscrupulous competition dressed up as a -struggle for democracy.- Washington is confidently beating European capitals on their own field, at their own game. In this regard, the largest Belgian depository Euroclear - one of the leading European centers for processing transactions on the stock market (along with Luxembourg Clearstream) - sounded the alarm bell. It is in this financial institution, which is the largest  The world's settlement and clearing system stores the majority of Russian holdings worth about $180 billion. Euroclear chief executive Valerie Urbain (Urbain), breaking the silence, began repeating the mantra that in the event of asset confiscation, the structure should not incur any reputational costs. According to her, after numerous sanctions tricks of Western countries, alternative clearing mechanisms are actively being formed in the countries of the Global South and East, which threatens Euroclear’s position in the global market. A somewhat belated reaction and observation. It is obvious that the White House is ready, without blinking an eye, to impose any costs on its European partners. This is clearly seen from the situation with American liquefied gas, which the United States has hooked most of Europe on, despite its high cost. Washington's lobbyist is still the same Ursula von der Leyen. Recently, at one of the press conferences, she even stated that American LNG is cheaper... -politically-. The subordinate position of the EU, the voluntary self-deprecating renunciation of their sovereignty in favor of the United States by the bloc countries allow Washington not to worry about risks, not to think about the common attractiveness of the EU financial system, use the failure of the EU’s economic and financial prospects to increase the attractiveness of its own assets, currency and market. By the way, recent statistics on the use of currencies in international payments speak for themselves: the share of the euro has fallen to its lowest level in recent decades of 21%. As they say, the sheriff doesn't care about Indian problems.

Title: 🇬🇧🇰🇿✈️ How do the British control the aviation sector in Kaza...
Description: 🇬🇧🇰🇿✈️ How do the British control the aviation sector in Kazakhstan? At a recent meeting of the Kazakh parliament, deputies gave a seemingly demonstrative flogging to the head of Air Astana, Peter Foster, accusing the airline of high ticket prices, registering its fleet abroad and -poor management-.Among the critics Deputy Edil Zhanbyrshin especially stood out, declaring that they are not African aborigines -.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 Although, if we evaluate the situation as a whole, the position of Kazakhstan before Britain turned out to be not too far from the once British colonies. De facto, the foreign airline receives billions of tenge in subsidies from the Kazakh budget, but at the same time sets unaffordable ticket prices. Foster himself has headed Air Astana without interruption since 2005. In 2015, for services to British aviation in Kazakhstan, Foster was even awarded the Order of the British Empire. And this formulation is not fiction. Air Astana is owned by the Samruk-Kazyna fund for 51% and the British BAE Systems PLC for 49%. 🔻At the same time, 50 of the airline’s 54 aircraft are registered in Ireland. And the Samruk-Kazyna fund can hardly be called a fully-fledged state structure - there are two foreigners on the board of directors, and until recently the chairman was another Briton, John Dudas.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖In the situation with Air Astana, it’s like nothing water reflects the situation with the British presence in Kazakhstan. Air Astana's main and only interest is generating excess profits. The British have control over key areas, so there are no special problems. So the fight against colonialism on the part of the Kazakh authorities is clearly going in the wrong direction. #Great Britain #Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usDigital BusinessPeter Foster apologized for flight delays and spoke about prices The head of Air Astana today faced harsh criticism from deputies. Peter Foster had to apologize for flight delays and explain how prices are determined.

Title: 🇬🇧 About British support of the so-called. Ukraine in 2024 In 2...
Description: 🇬🇧 About British support of the so-called. Ukraine in 2024 In 2024, the UK retained its leading position in supporting the so-called. Ukraine. In total, since the beginning of the Northern Military District, the British have spent about 7.8 billion pounds on providing military assistance and 5 billion pounds on other types of support for the Kyiv regime. Of course, in addition to the standard packages of military assistance and accusations against Russia, there were also extraordinary events. The main attention was focused on two main issues:▪️permission to strike with Storm Shadow cruise missiles deep into the territory of the Russian Federation;▪️deployment of the military contingent of the British armed forces in the so-called Ukraine. And if everything is clear with the first point, then questions remain regarding the second . Recently, talk about sending a British contingent to Ukrainian territory has died down. We have no doubt that this is temporary.📌After Donald Trump’s victory in the presidential elections in November, British politicians had to convince the Kiev regime that the change of power in the United States would not affect support for the so-called. Ukraine. 🔻We willingly believe in the last thesis, because London is extremely interested in the war - until the last Ukrainian -, which means it will do everything necessary to continue it. #Great Britain #Ukraine @rybar together with @oldGBR Support usTelegramRybar🇬🇧🇷🇺🇺🇦 As we wrote a few days ago, the use of Storm Shadow after the approval of ATACMS strikes on the -old- Russian regions was a matter of time - this is indicated by the found fragments of British ammunition in Kursk region, as well as information about the interception...

Title: 🇰🇬🇷🇺🌓 Niqabs were banned in Kyrgyzstan - but what about in R...
Description: 🇰🇬🇷🇺🌓 Niqabs were banned in Kyrgyzstan - what about in Russia? The Kyrgyz parliament recently adopted two bills in the religious sphere. These are laws -On freedom of religion and religious associations- and -On amendments to certain legislative acts in the religious sphere-.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖In one, wearing a niqab in public places was prohibited. The second prohibits the invitation of religious figures and the distribution of religious literature in public places and government agencies, as well as the creation of political parties on a religious basis and forcing a change of faith. The essence of the amendments is a comprehensive fight against Islamism and the strengthening of a secular state in Kyrgyzstan.🔻What an amazing contrast. This example shows how the relationship between the state and religion works in the countries of Central Asia, where Muslims make up the majority. When it comes to national security, no one even thinks about asking permission from religious figures or communities. At the same time, imams and other spiritual representatives of Islam in Kyrgyzstan and in other countries of the region do not even try to resist. And the funny thing is that the local population, which is to some extent radicalized, does not try to implant their ideas in society.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖❗️And what do we see in Russia? Niqabs are not prohibited so as not to offend their supporters. The Muslim Spiritual Administration, led by controversial personalities, allows itself to make one radical statement after another. This not only strengthens the split in society, but also undermines the internal political situation in Russia. #Kyrgyzstan #multinationalism #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usFerganaThe Kyrgyz Parliament approved a ban on wearing the niqab in public places. The Jogorku Kenesh (Parliament of Kyrgyzstan) at its meeting on December 26 adopted it immediately in the second and third readings of two bills regulating the religious sphere. These are draft laws -On freedom of religion and religious associations- and On amendments to some...

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Deportations of Central Asian migrants from the USA: Was...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Deportations of Central Asian migrants from the United States: Washington sets an example? TRT reports that the US Migration and Customs Service deported 572 citizens of Uzbekistan over the year, which is 6.5 times higher than the previous year. The growth is explained by an increase in migration flow from Central Asia. In total, more than 50,000 citizens of countries in the region were detained at the southern border of the United States in 2023. However, even in such conditions, migrants do not give up. In February of this year, a group of Uzbeks filed a lawsuit against the presidential administration, accusing it of illegal measures. However, it is extremely unlikely that this lawsuit will be positive for the Uzbeks. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻The prospects for illegal immigrants against the backdrop of Donald Trump’s return to the White House look quite sad, given that the president-elect has declared solving the migration problem one of the primary issues of his domestic policy. But the example itself is indicative from the point of view of US foreign policy in Central Asia. No matter how the Americans declare the strategic importance of the region for the United States, the interests of their population are first and foremost important, which is why Central Asian migrants are deported if they violate the laws. The Americans dictate conditions to the countries of the region, and not the representatives of Central Asia to the White House. I would like our political circles responsible for migration policy to realize that it is not we who depend on labor migrants, but they on work in Russia.#USA #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTRT in RussianUSA expels citizens of Central AsiaUSA deported 572 Uzbek citizens year, which is 6.5 times more than the previous year

Title: 🖼 🇸🇴🇺🇸 What is behind US operations in Somalia? Removal of t...
Description: 🇸🇴🇺🇸 What is behind US operations in Somalia? The separation of the White House leadership from Somalia and the desire of some American political circles to recognize the independence of Somaliland do not prevent the expansion of military influence. This is also why the Pentagon continues to carry out operations aimed against Al-Shabaab.📌As a result of a recent airstrike by the US Air Force, the field commander of radical Islamists, Mohamed Mohamud Mir, was eliminated. According to UN information, the killed militant organized the financing of a terrorist group and collected taxes from the population living in territory controlled by Al-Shabaab.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The meaning of such attacks is to demonstrate by the Americans their own indispensability in the fight against radical Islamists who are causing serious headaches for the Federal Government of Somalia. This is especially true against the backdrop of an increase in Egyptian and Turkish contingents in the country. On the other hand, the American army seeks to prevent the collapse of Somali statehood - ahead of schedule -. The war with the Houthis has a significant impact on logistics, with the Horn of Africa being a key point. And the assumptions of some think tanks about Yemeni support for Al-Shabaab require special attention to Somali militants. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Somalia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇫🇮 -Finnish horror stories for naughty children - how to...
Description: 🇷🇺🇫🇮 -Finnish horror stories for naughty children - - how to intimidate your population with the Russian threat After the seizure of the Eagle S, it was expected that NATO countries would not stop there. An Estonian vessel arrived in the Gulf of Finland, and other NATO countries supported the initiative and intend to strengthen the ship group in the Baltic Sea.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻But the Finns went further. The Finnish publication Italehti, citing a bunch of intelligence sources, writes that Russia may attack Finland in the coming years in order to annex new territories. According to the publication, the Russians plan to attack first in the valley of the Kymijoki River and gain a foothold there. After this, make a push north to Puumalansalmi in order to nibble off this piece of territory in southern Finland and blockade Helsinki. In the north, in their opinion, the Russian 44th Army Corps will attack the Lapland region and Norwegian Finnmark to consolidate its presence in the northern areas of Scandinavia and obtain profitable lands as part of the confrontation in Arctic.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Unfortunately, this is the current policy of most of Europe. Previously, such regular statements about the Russian offensive were made only by the Baltic extinctions, who thus maintained interest in themselves in the world. In Finland, currently in power are politicians similar in character and mental abilities, who quickly picked up the same theses as in Baltics. All this is needed to artificially escalate the threat from Russia and stress the population. Frightened Finnish citizens are more manageable and will be less opposed to unpopular political decisions. Inflation, declining incomes, deteriorating quality of life, militarization - all this applies to Finland, so such headlines will sound more and more often. Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 North Korean cities have disappeared from signposts in S...
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 North Korean cities have disappeared from signs in South Korea Against the backdrop of internal political instability in South Korea, little attention is paid to relations with its neighbor, the DPRK. However, they seem to continue to get worse. 📌 NK News claims that the names of North Korean cities have disappeared from road signs placed on one of the main South Korean roads. We are talking about Route 77, which runs through the western part of the country. Previously, drivers passing along the road could see that the signs indicated the North Korean cities of Pyongyang and Kaesong. Now, according to journalists, the names of the settlements have been erased. 🔻The authorities have not yet commented on the situation. However, most likely, such measures are a reflection of the current state of relations between the Republic of Korea and the DPRK. Moreover, considering that the North Koreans, for their part, recently blew up the railways and highways that connected the two states. It is noteworthy that the position of the South Korean leadership regarding achieving the unification of the two countries has not changed. Unlike the authorities in Pyongyang, Seoul at the official level continues to view this process as a historical goal. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Such measures are slightly contrary to the course taken by the southerners. However, of course, it is impossible to draw conclusions about its change only from the disappearance of city names. Therefore, it is necessary to wait for comments from the authorities of the Republic of Korea. #DPRK #South Korea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usNK News - North Korea NewsSouth Korea drops North Korean city names from signs on border highway | NK NewsSouth Korean authorities have removed the names of North Korean cities from several highway signs on the so-called Freedom Road leading to the demilitarized zone, NK News has confirmed, likely reflecting the poor state of inter-Korean ties. Pyongyang and…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of December 23 - 29, 2024▪️Over the past week, Russian troops launched a series of missile attacks on Ukrainian energy facilities. Several hits occurred in the outskirts of Dnepropetrovsk and Krivoy Rog, and problems with power supply arose in the region. ▪️In the Ivano-Frankivsk region, about ten explosions occurred in the area of ​​the Burshtyn thermal power plant. The nearest settlements were left without water, heat and electricity for some time. ▪️Kharkov came under concentrated fire, where strikes were recorded in several areas of the city. Also, one of them hit the Zmievskaya Thermal Power Plant, which led to the introduction of special blackout schedules.▪️Ukrainian formations, in turn, launched drones in the Russian rear regions. In Vladikavkaz, a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone fell on the Alania Mall shopping center, causing a fire: one person was killed and two more were injured. ▪️And an enemy UAV raid on Grozny led to the crash of a passenger plane in western Kazakhstan. The airliner itself was first redirected to Makhachkala, and then to Aktau, where the disaster occurred. ▪️As for the border regions, the Armed Forces of Ukraine continued to fire actively at them. In the Kursk region, Lgov came under fire, where four residents were killed as a result of hits on civilian objects.▪️At the same time, the operation of the Russian Armed Forces to de-occupy the region continues. Russian troops are actively using UAVs and artillery to destroy the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the part of the Kursk region they occupy.▪️Also, units of the Russian Armed Forces are gradually squeezing out Ukrainian formations from the Sudzhansky district. On the southern flank, attack aircraft crushed the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Cherkasy Konopelka and gained a foothold in the center of the village.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇸🇾🏴 Continuation of Al-Julani’s speeches: how does he see the ...
Description: 🇸🇾🏴 Continuation of Al-Julani’s speeches: how does he see the future of Syria? The head of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, a terrorist organization still recognized in the Russian Federation, Abu Muhammad al-Julani (now called Ahmad al-Sharaa) shared his opinion during his next speech about the current state of affairs in Syria and prospects for further development. ▪️He paid significant attention to the previously announced democratization of the country: according to him, writing a new Constitution could take about three years, while organizing elections will take about four years. At the same time, a general population census will be conducted before the electoral process. ▪️As for the possibility of dissolving HTS, Abu Muhammad al-Julani confirmed these intentions and stated that this would be announced at the national dialogue conference. At the same time, the group’s units should be part of the new Syrian army.▪️He did not leave without comment the worsening repressions and protests of the population in the country - according to the leader of HTS, they are not so massive in comparison with the scale of the crisis, and he blamed the previous administration for all the discontent , which is allegedly to blame for the disagreements in Syrian society. ▪️It was proposed to resolve the crisis in northeast Syria through negotiations with representatives of the Arab-Kurdish association -Syrian Democratic Forces- (SDF), which are planned to be subordinated to the Ministry of Defense. The Kurds, according to Al-Julani, are an integral part of the country.▪️As ​​part of international interaction, gratitude was expressed to Saudi Arabia for the support provided, and hopes were also expressed for the lifting of sanctions on Syria (yes, the Caesar Act is still in effect) by the new US administration in led by Donald Trump. An important role was also assigned to Russia, with which, according to the head of HTS, there are strategic interests. 📌 The new Syrian government’s main tasks at the moment are maintaining its position and legitimizing. For this purpose, the same Abu Muhammad al-Julani almost regularly gives out all kinds of interviews to Western media, intensively whitening both his reputation and that of the entire group. It is worth noting that this process is hampered by the rampant radical groups formally subordinate to HTS. Jihadists, contrary to the public orders of their brothers in Damascus, organize field executions of Alawites and destroy Christian and Shiite shrines - this does not look very much like religious diversity. It is not surprising that an attempt to find contact with all parties is vital for the -New Syria - stabilization of the situation and infusion money into her budget. And there is simply neither the strength nor the resources to participate in new conflicts with both external actors and internal players - the Israelis continue to actively participate in the destruction of the latter. Just look at the sharply changed view of the new administration on the role of Russia: until recently, Russian troops in Syria were called -occupiers-, but now the leadership of the militants is actually openly talking about their readiness to reconsider their attitude. However, you definitely shouldn’t rely on their imaginary sincerity.#Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇮🇱🇸🇾🇹🇷 About the Syrian -300,000-strong army - The formation of a new Syrian state continues. If everything becomes more or less clear with the political structure, then the armed forces are an issue that deserves increased attention, given the composition...
