Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇷🇺 How the West is discrediting the Russian Arctic p...
Description: 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇷🇺 How the West is discrediting the Arctic projects of the Russian Federation Recently, the Arctic is increasingly on the news agenda: activity in this part of the world is almost as intense as tensions in other regions. In addition to outright provocations, such as the increasing frequency of NATO exercises, media campaigns directed against Russia's actions in the Arctic and its allegedly destructive work with the northern peoples.📌One of the mouthpieces of such propaganda was the Arctida project, which is managed by the ex-head of the Russian branch of Transparency International (TI, activity recognized as undesirable in the Russian Federation), foreign agent Ilya Shumanov. An NPO is another tool for media pressure, which legalizes and disseminates the theses its grantor needs through a network of loyal pro-Western media.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Read more on our website#Arctic #Great Britain #NPO #media technologies #Russia # USA #article @rybar Support us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇺🇸 What are American satellites looking for in Iran?...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷🇺🇸 What are American satellites looking for in Iran? After the Syrian events and the withdrawal of all Iranian military personnel and pro-Iranian paramilitary forces from Syria, American military satellites became more active over Iranian territory. There has not been such activity as in recent days for a very long time. Probably, the last time something like this happened was before the Northeast Military District, during moments of escalation in relations between countries. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Now this may be due to concerns about the acceleration of the development of the Iranian nuclear program or possible strikes by the IRGC on Israel, as the IRGC commander recently stated. This conclusion can be drawn from what objects are under surveillance USA. These are missile ranges, air bases, UAV bases, naval bases, as well as nuclear research centers like Fordo.🔻At the moment, the Americans, apparently, are playing it safe and trying to prepare for a possible worsening of the situation, which is why they are closely monitoring Iran by all possible means.High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #Iran #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇶🇸🇾🏴 Growing IS threat in Syria In addition to the factors ...
Description: 🇮🇶🇸🇾🏴 Growing IS threat in Syria In addition to the already announced factors that prompted the United States to increase its grouping in Syria, the intensification of IS should also be mentioned. Until mid-December, there were isolated references to the militants' increasing capabilities, but now their potential has begun to take shape.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖Iraqi Foreign Minister Fuad Hussein said that Islamic State militants had seized weapons from the Syrian army and were now reorganizing their units, expanding control in eastern and central Syria.❗️In reality, the situation with ISIS has become threatening. So far these are isolated attacks or attacks, but the terrorist group is going deeper not only in the Syrian desert, but also in the province of Raqqa, a significant region for ISIS. In recent days, attacks on SDF positions have been recorded in Marrat near Deir Ez-Zor, in Dabib in the south the province of Raqqa and the key one - in Abu Khashab at the junction of the provinces of Deir ez-Zor, Hasak and Raqqa. ISIS militants have not attacked so deeply for a long time. And this time they managed to kill three members of the SDF, which confirms the fears of the Iraqi Foreign Minister. The latter, by the way, also announced the escape of some IS prisoners from the largest prison for IS militants Al-Hol on the border with Iraq and IS plans to organize an attack on the facility.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Against this background, in the areas bordering Iraq French soldiers arrived from the vicinity of Khan al-Jabal (the Kurds call it Khana-Sere). And here we note: they were present in the northeast of Hasakah province, since some oil fields were under their control.#Iraq #Syria #USA #terrorism #France@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 What are the Americans doing in Syria? Title: 🇸🇾 Since the beginning of the aggravation of the situation in t...
Description: 🇸🇾 Since the beginning of the aggravation of the situation in the Red Sea, the Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - has not succeeded in defeating the ships or aircraft of the US-led coalition, despite all numerous attempts. However, the Americans themselves decided to help them with this. The Pentagon reported that this morning the missile cruiser USS Gettysburg mistakenly shot down an F/A-18 carrier-based fighter from the aircraft carrier Harry S. Truman. Both pilots ejected and were successfully picked up, one received minor injuries.📌 As you can see, in the United States, with its developed and streamlined control systems, episodes of friendly fire also happen - even in the most automated system there is a human factor that can affect the processes On the other hand, this is definitely not a reason to make fun of the Americans, especially against the backdrop of similar episodes from the Northern Military District zone. After all, their number over three years was, how can I say, more significant, and the outcomes are often much sadder.#Yemen #USA@rybarSupport usAP NewsTwo US Navy pilots shot down over Red Sea in apparent 'friendly fire' incident, US military saysThe U.S. military says two U.S. Navy pilots have been shot down over the Red Sea in an apparent -friendly fire- incident.

Title: 🖼 🇨🇩 Disruption of the peace process in the east of the DRC an...
Description: 🇨🇩 Disruption of the peace process in the east of the DRC and a new offensive by M23 militants Over the past few months, negotiations have been going on between Rwandan and Congolese representatives through the mediation of Angola. Their goal was to end the conflict in the east of the Democratic Republic of Congo and stop the M23 rebels supported by the pro-Western leadership of Rwanda. They even led to some success - during the fall, the fighting lost its former intensity. And some agreements, such as the disarmament of the anti-Rwandan FDLR group, were carried out by the Congolese.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌Only support from Rwanda for the rebels did not stop. Rwandan soldiers also took part in battles against the DR Congo army. And now the Rwandans have completely disrupted any negotiations, calling on the Congolese to conduct a dialogue directly with representatives of the M23 movement, and not with them. The authorities in Kinshasa were willing to make some concessions for the Rwandans, but the call was to conduct a dialogue with proxy forces, and not directly was received with hostility by them. For this reason, the Congolese side withdrew from the negotiation process. The militants immediately took advantage of this, and their hands were given a free hand. Over the course of a week, they significantly advanced north, taking one of the strongholds of the DRC Armed Forces on the way to the city of Butemba - Alimbongo. Despite some successes of government forces (in particular, they recaptured the village of Loofyu), they were unable to stop the advance of the rebels. Panic is rising in Lubero and Butembo, caused, among other things, by clashes between pro-Congolese Wazalendo militias and the army.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻As we expected, the curators of the Rwandan authorities from the United States did not plan any peaceful settlement. The negotiations were just dust in the eye so that the militants would get a break and continue their offensive. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #DRC #Rwanda@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇪🇺🇯🇵 NATO is moving east: new exercises in Japan The Japanese...
Description: 🇪🇺🇯🇵 NATO is moving east: new exercises in Japan The Japanese side continues to announce military exercises with other countries next year. On January 12, airborne training will take place, which will involve representatives of the armed forces of 12 countries, including the United States, United Kingdom, Poland, the Philippines and Singapore.▪️Several military aircraft from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces and the US Air Force will take part in the exercise. They will fly from two Japanese bases towards the landing site located at the Narashino training ground. The main goals of the exercises are to practice landing operations, as well as strengthening military cooperation between states. ▪️It is worth noting that the Japanese side, through official sources, is distributing a poster announcing the exercises and calling on locals to watch the progress of the event. Therefore, it can be assumed that these trainings will be more ceremonial in nature than practical. ▪️By the way, given the acute shortage of personnel in the Japanese Self-Defense Forces, the demonstration of the exercises is most likely needed to attract more citizens to military structures. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻However, despite this, such events once again prove that the Japanese authorities continue to actively develop relations with the US allies from Europe. And this trend, which began relatively recently, will definitely continue next year. High resolution mapEnglish version#Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us陸自調査団令和7年降下訓練始め（NYJIP25）｜2025年1月12日(日)｜陸自調査団千葉県 船橋市にある陸上自衛隊習志野演習場で「令和7年降下訓練始め（NYJIP25）」が2025年1月12日(日)に実施されます。習志野演習場を一般開放して、第1空挺団などによ展示などが行われます。

Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇦 Ukrainian media will soon get acquainted with the new head of USAID Joker DPR published an extremely interesting USAID document on the search for a candidate for the vacancy - Senior Communications Advisor - to organize propaganda work on the so-called. Ukraine. Already in January 2025, the new American leader will have to come to Kyiv and lead the work of coordinating various media structures, as stated - in order to strengthen public understanding of USAID's goals. And since USAID assistance programs in the so-called territory. Ukraine includes almost all spheres of the country’s life, it is not surprising that the range of responsibilities for an impressive $150 thousand is quite wide. In general, the tightening of manual control of Kyiv’s communication strategies is designed not so much for information wars with Russia (although that too), but to minimize the consequences of war fatigue among the local population and upcoming unpopular decisions, such as lowering the mobilization age. And apparently stories about Western assistance programs should sweeten the pill. #mediatechnology #Ukraine #USA@rybar Support usTelegramJoker DNRThe New Year will bring Ukrainians not only Olivier and tangerines, but also a fresh portion of American propaganda. Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🏴 A series of today's arson attacks involving pensioners ...
Description: 🇷🇺🏴 Today’s series of arson attacks involving pensioners raises a serious problem of preventing such incidents. 📌 It would seem that Ukrainian call centers have been doing this since the very beginning of the SVO, and deceived elderly people appeared in reports almost every month. Therefore, these incidents have already become a familiar information background. However, the attack on Rylsk, the UAV raid on Kazan with simultaneous arson in shopping centers, bank and post office branches in different cities demonstrate the growing attention of the Kyiv regime to terrorist methods. 🔻And, therefore, it is necessary not only to update the list of targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine, where they are organizing such events, but also to intensify educational work with the population of Russia, especially with older people. It is quite possible that many unfortunate pensioners, having seen an analysis and explanation of such manipulations on TV, would not have fallen for the bait of telephone scammers. #Russia #Ukraine #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🏳️🇺🇸 The US is preparing to build a military base in Somalilan...
Description: 🏳️🇺🇸 The US is preparing to build a military base in Somaliland Only recently we talked about the Republican proposal to recognize Somaliland. Now, officials of the fragment of Somali statehood are declaring at the official level that they will be happy with the American base in Hargeisa. This is a completely expected reaction to the opportunity to receive recognition from one of the world’s largest players, even if this threatens to turn into another American satellite. And for the Ethiopian authorities , who have nominally declared their commitment to preserving the territorial integrity of Somalia, US recognition of Somaliland would be a gift. Still, the status of the separatists will be guaranteed not by agreements in Turkey, but by American bayonets. The feds in Mogadishu will have to reckon with them, and the Ethiopians will be able to forget about their promises. Most likely, this is exactly what the US Republican Party expected, because in the event of another collapse of the federal government of Somalia (which the Egyptians and Turks are trying to stop), the Americans will retain their influence in the Red Sea region. Unless, of course, Russia and Iran become more active in establishing their bases in Sudan.#Africa #Somalia #USA @rybarSupport usTACCSomaliland is ready to host a US military base in exchange for recognitionSomaliland representative Bashir Goth noted that this is possible if it serves common interests - sides

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Today, footage taken by one of the Israeli military p...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Today, footage appeared on the Internet taken by one of the Israeli soldiers in the very south of the Gaza Strip. They quite clearly demonstrate the consequences of the so-called. -terraforming the area- in Rafah. At a distance of more than a kilometer from the border with Egypt, the city not only lacks any buildings, but there are practically no remains of ruins - all this is the result of an IDF operation that began in early May. At the same time, information appeared in the Israeli media today about the involvement of civilian contractors for the demolition of houses and the construction of engineering infrastructure in the Al-Shabur area in the central part of the village. This event is not particularly surprising - recently there have been no reports of at least some resistance and activity from the Hamas militants remaining in the city.#Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇪🇺🇰🇿🇺🇿 -Green energy - a lever of pressure on Central A...
Description: 🇦🇿🇪🇺🇰🇿🇺🇿 -Green energy - a lever of pressure on Central AsiaRegional Project Coordinator of the Central Asian Office of the World Bank Dmitry Petrin, within the framework of the session of the Eurasian Development Bank, said that the World Bank will support the export of green energy to Europe.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖There are not many details yet, but the economic feasibility of the project is questionable, given the low efficiency of green generation and the lack of understanding of how energy transfer can be organized. Especially in the countries of Central Asia there are many problems with energy, and exporting it to the West, and even in an unclear way, looks dubious an undertaking. Most likely, the allocated money will be used to modernize existing facilities. It is unlikely that Western partners do not understand this. The same World Bank published a report in which it was said that a significant part of the funds allocated for alternative energy sources was spent for other purposes. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Beneath the beautiful stated goals lies the real task of the World Bank - taking control of all energy projects in the region through financing only the right green initiatives. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in the Sudzhansky region In the Kursk region, Russian troops are gradually squeezing out the Armed Forces of Ukraine from the north-west of the Sudzhansky region. In recent days, significant successes have been achieved in the attack on Malaya Loknya. After the liberation of Novoivanovka, the Russian Armed Forces, in a series of attacks, liquidated the bag to the northeast of the village. The enemy was forced to roll back and is now trying to organize defense on the hills located to the east, covering Malaya Loknya. To the north, the attack aircraft are advancing towards Kruglenkoye. Although the village itself consists of several houses, control over it will create a threat to the right flank of the new line of defense created by Ukrainian formations.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇻🇳🇺🇸 Does Vietnam want to buy weapons from the United States?...
Description: 🇻🇳🇺🇸 Do Vietnamese people want to buy weapons from the United States? The Americans are hinting at expanding defense cooperation with Vietnam. Against the backdrop of the ongoing international defense exhibition in Hanoi, the American ambassador to the country announced the readiness of US arms manufacturers to work with their Vietnamese colleagues. Vietnam has not yet responded to these statements. However, there are unconfirmed rumors about negotiations between the country's authorities and American arms firms, in particular, with Lockheed Martin regarding the sale of C-130 transport aircraft. Since recently, Vietnamese elites have been working to attract new foreign defense partners in order to successfully create its own defense industry, as well as reduce dependence on Russian arms supplies. After the establishment of a comprehensive strategic partnership between Hanoi and Washington in the fall of 2023, articles about the active work of the Americans to sell weapons to the Vietnamese side began to appear in the information field. However, no major deals have been concluded in this area so far. ▪️There are several reasons for this. First, for Vietnam, one of the main priorities in raising the status of relations with the United States is economic and technological partnership. The joint statement of the parties places much more emphasis on this than on defense cooperation. ▪️Secondly, the high cost of their military equipment is not in favor of the Americans. In addition, there is a certain incompatibility with Russian weapons, since the Russian Federation has for a long time been the main supplier of weapons to the Vietnamese side. ▪️Thirdly, in Vietnam there may be concerns about the reaction of the Chinese authorities. An active purchase of military equipment, coupled with an increase in the level of relations, would give a signal of concern on the part of Beijing, which Hanoi, given its balancing approach to the conduct of international affairs, would not want to see again. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Although U.S. defense companies participated in arms shows in Vietnam in both 2022 and 2024, too many factors suggest that the U.S. defense role will not be significantly expanded, at least at least for now. And the statements of the American ambassador, it seems, will not be able to correct this situation. #Vietnam #USA @rybar with @awaken_dragon Support us Reuters Vietnam seeks to boost domestic defense industry as it hosts arms fair Vietnam will showcase locally made weapons at an international arms fair in Hanoi on Thursday, as it seeks to boost its domestic industry and possibly export military equipment .

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇾🇪 New success of the Houthis in the fight against Isr...
Description: 🇮🇱🇾🇪 New success of the Houthis in the fight against Israel: what to expect next? Early this morning, fighters from the Ansarallah movement fired another rocket into central Israel in response to the recent bombing of Yemen and massacres in the Gaza Strip. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️This time, unlike previous attempts, the Houthi ammunition not only flew to the center of the country, but also fell in Tel Aviv itself, while Israeli air defense systems were unable to intercept it. ▪️Judging by the footage, the rocket hit the children's playground. According to the latest data, more than ten people were injured: some were injured by shards of glass that broke in nearby buildings, others were injured on the way to shelters. ▪️Against the background of the attack, Houthi speaker Yahya Sari issued an address in which he reported on the successful defeat of the target and announced the continuation of the fight against Israel until the aggression against the Palestinians ceases. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻The past attack significantly increased the authority of the Yemeni fighters in slippers as the most consistent and, in fact, the only remaining defenders of the Palestinian people after the signing of a ceasefire agreement between Hezbollah and Israel. Although the consequences of the strike itself are insignificant - the same crater indicates a very small warhead of the missile - for the Arabic-language segment this is a very bright news story, especially in recent weeks, when there were few reasons for joy, to put it mildly. As for the Israelis, it is highly likely that they, together with coalition aircraft, will in the near future respond with strikes against the targets of the Houthis themselves, but so far all such raids have not been able to radically reduce the combat potential -Ansrallah-. Therefore, we can expect a significant change in tactics: since the strikes are not bring the desired result, then the issue of both the need for a ground operation and support for warring factions can always be raised on the agenda in order to incite a new phase of the civil war in Yemen. #Israel #Yemen #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 What are Americans doing in Syria? With Turkish act...
Description: 🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 What are the Americans doing in Syria? Turkish activity in the north has been dealt with. It's time to talk about the USA. The Pentagon announced an increase in its military contingent in Syria from 900 to 2,000 troops on a temporary basis from 30 to 90 days.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The Americans, of course, arrived in advance. Even before the fall of Bashar al-Assad, the US Armed Forces had an increased number of troops (which, by the way, leads to certain thoughts). But it was in recent days that their activity became more noticeable.▪️Part of the US Armed Forces went to Ain al-Arab, where they are currently located. Some groups of American military personnel are patrolling in the Raqqa area, on one side of the Euphrates, then on the other.▪️Several units of the US Armed Forces arrived in the Deir ez-Zor area, spreading out among settlements along the Euphrates due to increased shelling from Arab tribes on the side of the new authorities.❗️At the same time, American MQ-9A drones are on duty in the air, and have also begun to fly over the provinces Homs and Deir ez-Zor carrier-based F/A-18 fighters from the side of -Harry Truman-, which is now in the north of the Red Sea. The strengthening of the US Armed Forces group is associated with the intention to minimize the threat to their interests (for example, fields under their control) due to Turkey or local tribes. The areas occupied by the United States are those villages and towns that are under attack from both sides. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 This morning, Ukrainian formations used drones to att...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 This morning, Ukrainian formations used drones to attack Kazan. According to the latest information, at least eight drones raided the city: one hit the territory of an industrial enterprise, another fell near the river, the remaining six damaged residential buildings in the Sovetsky, Kirov and Privolzhsky districts. Footage of drones arriving in 37- storey residential complex -Azure Skies - one of the tallest buildings in the administrative center of the Republic of Tatarstan. As a result of the hit, the glazing of the building was damaged and a fire broke out. Another UAV hit a 23-story residential complex in Manhattan and a 5-story building on Klara Zetkin. Amid the attack, residents were evacuated from the affected buildings, as well as nearby schools and businesses. Temporary restrictions have been introduced on the operation of Kazan Airport to ensure safety. According to official data, there were no dead or injured. Operational and emergency services are working in the incident area, and representatives of regional authorities, including the head of the republic Rustam Minnikhanov, also arrived at the scene. #Russia #Tatarstan #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of December 14 – 20, 2024▪️Israeli troops continued to conduct operations in the north of the Gaza Strip, including in Jabaliya. Ground operations were supported by armored vehicles and air strikes, and Palestinians consistently reported civilian deaths. Clashes once again took place in the vicinity of Kamal Adwan Hospital, where a large number of refugees are still present. This, however, does not prevent the Israelis from hitting their intended targets, regardless of the collateral damage. ▪️In the Netzarim corridor the situation remains stable. The Israelis maintain a presence in the vicinity of the former Highway 10. The corridor cutting the enclave in two is well fortified and, obviously, cannot be broken through by the Palestinians.▪️At the same time, the IDF continues to strike on both sides of the corridor, and also improves fortifications. Palestinians often report explosions in the vicinity of Az-Zeitoun and Nuseirat caused by engineering work. ▪️From time to time, local factions of the Palestinian resistance report mortar and rocket attacks on Netzarim. However, they are unable to inflict much damage on the Israelis for obvious reasons.▪️In the southern part of the enclave, refugee settlement sites in Khan Yunis and Al-Mawasi were subjected to several airstrikes. At the same time, the latter formally remains a -Security Zone,- which does not prevent the IDF from regularly working on it. ▪️Israeli troops also continue to actively conduct operations in the Philadelphia Corridor area. Despite sporadic shelling of the Palestinians, here, as in Netzarim, engineering work does not stop. ▪️Police operations in the West Bank autonomy are also taking their course, where arrests are being made daily. Sometimes dozens of local residents are subjected to simultaneous arrests and beatings.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 20, 2024. Russian troops launched massive attacks on enemy infrastructure in the Kyiv region. Arrivals were recorded both in Kyiv itself and in nearby settlements. In Boryspil, an enemy warehouse was destroyed during a UAV raid. Ukrainian formations used ATACMS operational-tactical missiles to attack Rylsk in the Kursk region. The strike killed six civilians and wounded 10 others, with extensive damage reported throughout the city. In the Kurakhovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Zelenovka and Konstantinopolskoye, almost completely knocking out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the right bank of the Sukhie Yaly River. There have also been confirmations of the transfer of Stary Ternov to the control of the Russian Armed Forces. In the Kherson direction, during the night, Russian troops launched a series of artillery strikes on enemy positions in the vicinity of Kherson. Also, messages from the enemy appeared on the Internet about an attack by Russian troops in the Antonovsky Bridge area. Title: 🎬 🇩🇪🇸🇾🏴 These are the first real consequences of the Syrian...
Description: 🇩🇪🇸🇾🏴 Here are the first real consequences of the Syrian events. In the German city of Magdeburg, a driver drove into a crowd of people walking through the local market on the eve of Christmas. According to preliminary data, 1 person was killed and 85 were injured. An unknown person with a characteristic Middle Eastern appearance (many media outlets already call him a Syrian citizen) was detained. The motives, why, why he did all this are not yet clear. But this is exactly what we were talking about during the active offensive of the militants in Syria. The wave of refugees that poured out of Syria was an expected consequence. However, along with the civilian population, others also ended up in Europe. Now we should wait for details, but taking into account the activation of IS in Syria, it is highly likely that it was their supporter who carried out this terrorist attack. Although the Western media will certainly try to promote the version with the Afghan branch of the group. Unfortunately for Europe, we have to admit that this is just the beginning. #Germany #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 20, 2024 Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the Gaza Strip: hits included the capital of the Palestinian enclave and other major cities. According to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, about 80 people have died in the past 24 hours. IDF units continue ground raids in Jabaliya, while in neighboring Beit Lahia the main phase of a similar operation has come to an end: the IDF press service reported the destruction of three 7.5-kilometer-long tunnels there. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out arrests and searches in more than a dozen localities, while clashes with local militants occurred in Jenin and Nablus. And in Mard, settlers attacked a mosque. In southern Lebanon, Israeli troops withdrew from the settlement of Bani Hayyan, where they had been conducting engineering work for the past two days. Also, IDF units entered the Syrian village of Maaria, expanding the zone of control east of the Golan Heights. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Murder of ISIS leader in Syria: why is the USA doing t...
Description: 🇸🇾🇺🇸🏴 Murder of ISIS leader in Syria: why is the USA doing this? After the deployment of an additional contingent of the US Armed Forces, the time has come to justify the activities and presence of the American contingent in eastern Syria: supporting the Syrian Democratic Forces is one thing, but nevertheless, the Americans have always proclaimed their goal as a noble fight against terrorism. That is why now American aviation flights, like ours have already written and become more active. A small nod was also made to the fight against terrorism, so that the United States would once again try on the bright image of the world gendarme. They struck one of the leaders of the banned Islamic State, a certain Abu Yusif, also known as Mahmud. According to the US Central Command, he was killed during yesterday's raid on the province of Deir ez-Zor. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Such targeted operations allow the Americans to maintain the reputation of fighters against the terrorist threat without spending much effort on it - the same leaders of the Islamic State are replaced one after another, and the liquidation of some field commander does not will have a significant impact on the group. But for the American military and the establishment it is an information feed loud. Especially against the backdrop of the question, why did the United States again decide to increase its troops in the Middle East? And for this they have now prepared a clear answer - here they are again - fighting terrorism - on distant approaches. #Syria #USA #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 Will the Turks attack the Kurds in Syria? In northe...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 Will the Turks attack the Kurds in Syria? The tense situation remains in northern Syria. Turkey, together with its proxies in the person of the Syrian National Army (SNA), continues to prepare for an operation against the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces. If last week there were no serious prerequisites for this, then this year everything has changed.➖➖➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖▪️On December 15, the Turks intensified the number of attacks on SDS territories. 45 artillery and 17 air strikes were carried out. The main area of ​​attack remained the same - the Ain al-Arab - Ain Issa line. This pocket is Turkey's short-term cherished goal, as it will allow the SNA control zones in Manbij to be combined with Tell Abyad, as well as a reputational blow to the SDF due to political importance for them of Ain el-Arab.▪️In addition, Turkish artillery was recorded in the Ras area Al Aina. From there the Turks strike at Tel Tamr. The Akıncı drones, in turn, regularly patrol and strike at El-Qamishli and Arab Khan.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖From a tactical point of view, these actions of the Turks and their proxies can be called fire preparation before the offensive. However, knowing the Turks, they can wait for the right moment for months or even years. How many times have they announced plans to destroy the Kurds in Syria and Iraq? There are not enough fingers and toes. So far, the information field is talking about ongoing negotiations, up to the creation of a demilitarized zone in Ain al-Arab. But, frankly speaking, this option is doubtful. Trusting the Turks is a thankless task, so this scenario looks unlikely. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #terrorism #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍 #Comic from Rybar No. 35: Once upon a time in Pol...
Description: ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍 #Comic from Fisherman No. 35: Once upon a time in Poltava Living on the territory of the so-called. People in Ukraine do not always support the Kiev regime and the Ukrainian Armed Forces, but they rarely express open protest. They have other ways to express their attitude to what is happening. That is why information about an important target in the RF Armed Forces comes suddenly and from an unexpected direction: an old acquaintance, a distant relative, or even a former neighbor of the parents gets in touch and transmits data that was sorely lacking .Synopsis:NATO countries send to Ukraine not only equipment and money, but also specialists for training, including work with Western military equipment. Such personnel, as well as the locations where training is carried out, are an important military target. Invaluable assistance in carrying out this complex task is provided by the caring residents of Ukraine. They often find out information by accident and, at great risk, try to convey valuable data to the RF Armed Forces. 📌 You can download the comic using the following links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖍 Day of Security Agencies Worker of the Russian Federati...
Description: 🇷🇺🖍 Day of the Security Agencies Worker of the Russian Federation Since the beginning of the Northern Military District, the role of the security agencies of our country has grown many times over. The usual jokes that -Comrade Major hears everything- sound with hidden pride: on a daily basis we see footage of how they are putting things in order in the rear, we hear reports on the suppression of the next terrorist attack, we see that the volume of work is only increasing. Yes, to our country Numerous threats are being confronted: just remember that it was not possible to save Lieutenant General Igor Kirillov. Suffice it to recall the tragedy in Crocus. We cannot forget what happened to Dasha Dugina and Maxim Fomin. It's like a sophisticated game of chess where lives are at stake. In these difficult and difficult conditions, I would like to wish the Russian chess players from the State Security Department endurance and the ability to resist an insidious opponent. Identify British spies. Expose the pro-Ukrainian trash. Squeeze the liberal democracy. Destroy terrorists and kill extremists in toilets. We believe in you. And we are grateful to you. Happy holiday.High resolution art#art #WSRF@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🌓 The law on compulsory testing for knowledge of the Russian...
Description: 🇷🇺🌓 There will be a law on compulsory testing for knowledge of the Russian language. The law, according to which a ban on the admission to schools of migrant children without proper knowledge of the Russian language will be introduced, will come into force on April 1, 2025. Testing will be free. But it will be necessary to present a document confirming the legality of being in Russia.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖📌 The fact that after so much time and gossip, the law has finally been adopted cannot but rejoice. However, even this does not guarantee a radical improvement in the situation, since much will depend on officials of various stripes, as well as people and organizations that will be accredited to carry out these procedures. The problem is that at the regional level, corruption and local nuances have not gone away . Ethnic communities remain highly connected and empowered and are not restricted in any way. And this must be done first. This may result in the same problems as before. How will the exams be conducted? What criteria for assessing knowledge will be established? Where will the events be held? Who will be responsible for issuing the appropriate certificate? We need an understanding of how all this will be organized, otherwise for now it all looks like it’s centered in Dushanbe, where locals are already rubbing their hands in anticipation of buying exams.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The initiative is certainly positive. But there is no need to stop there. We need to continue working in this direction in order to ultimately ensure internal political stability and the legal influx of migrants who go to work, and not for the sake of crime and benefits, and in some cases, terror.#multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇹🇯 About Russian language exams in Tajikistan: what’s wrong with this innovation? Recently it became known that migrants were allowed to take a Russian language exam in Dushanbe. The list of government agencies conducting exams in the Russian language, history...

Title: 🎬🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 An hour ago, Ukrainian formations fired at the bord...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 An hour ago, Ukrainian formations shelled the border town of Rylsk in the Kursk region. According to preliminary information, the enemy could have used ATACMS operational-tactical missiles for the attack. According to local sources, the fall of ammunition was recorded in the area of ​​the bus station, school No. 1, teacher training college and the House of Culture. Currently, three victims are known. #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇷🇸🇩 How is Iran intercepting the Russian initiative in Sudan...
Description: 🇮🇷🇸🇩 How is Iran intercepting the Russian initiative in Sudan? In addition to Russian plans to create a naval logistics center in Port Sudan, the Iranian authorities have begun a similar discussion. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖The Iranian leadership initially supported government forces in the civil war. Over the past year, they have supplied many drones and weapons to the army. They played a significant role in turning the tide against the UAE-backed rebels. By the way, during the reign of Omar al-Bashir, Sudan was part of Iran's zone of influence. In particular, the country was a transshipment base for Iranian weapons, which were actively used by Hamas. Therefore, these plans may well be an attempt by the Iranian authorities to reconstruct previously existing communications. for themselves and the departure of Iranian forces from Syria, their influence in the region the Iranians may well focus on Sudan. Moreover, this will clearly not be prevented by the local authorities, who are winning thanks to help from Tehran. Against this background, the hesitations of the Russian responsible structures regarding the creation of their own logistics center for the Navy in Port Sudan seem strange. While economic projects are developing, an important logistics hub is leaving our hands.#Africa #Iran #Sudan #Russia@rybarSupport usBloomberg.comRussian Guns, Iranian Drones Are Fueling Sudan’s Brutal Civil WarInside Russia and Iran’s efforts to help Sudan’s army win a civil brutal war

Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Is Georgia afraid of European sanctions? Or not? Secreta...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Is Georgia afraid of European sanctions? Or not? Secretary General of the Council of Europe Alain Berset said at a press conference in Tbilisi that the Georgian authorities promised to amend the law on -foreign agents-, because of which mass riots swept across the country. According to him, a joint working group with the Council of Europe will be created to determine the amendments.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖We don’t know what the pro-Western Georgian channels were so happy about. There is an old saying - promising does not mean marrying. The Georgian authorities said that they would consider this option, think about it and maybe come up with something. Or maybe not. What the Secretary General of the Council of Europe said does not have any clear form, there is no specificity and no legal obligation. Why should the Georgian ruling party make concessions if they can cope without all this? On the contrary, they became confident in their abilities. The protests and riots led to nothing, the economy is on the rise, and sanctions from European countries will not have a negative impact. What at first glance looks like a concession on the part of the Georgian authorities is in fact more of a carrot, but for the EU.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇿🇹🇷🇺🇿 -Tentacles-OTG in Central Asia - the role of Azerbai...
Description: 🇦🇿🇹🇷🇺🇿 -Tentacles- OTG in Central Asia - the role of Azerbaijan in Turkey’s plans The delegation of the Ministry of Defense of Uzbekistan visited the department of the Ministry of Defense of Azerbaijan as part of its visit. This is not the first such exchange of experience, especially in 2024 - the number of military exercises and defense meetings in the Organization of Turkic States has increased significantly. Neighboring Kazakhstan signed an agreement on military intelligence with Baku, and joint tactical exercises of Kazakh and Azerbaijani units took place. Uzbekistan has not lagged behind Astana before, and Kyrgyzstan, together with Tajikistan, took part in the Birlestik 2024 exercises. And we are not talking about Turkey’s bayraktar diplomacy in the region. Azerbaijan acts as a kind of conductor between Central Asia and Turkey. This is especially facilitated by the image in the media, promoted for the region, that Baku is an example of a post-Soviet army that has undergone successful modernization and won on the battlefield - a traditional enemy for the Turkic world.➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🔻Military cooperation between members of the UTG is gradually increasing momentum. Various councils are appearing in the armed forces, security agencies, and further, judging by the pace, cooperation will deepen. The Turks are striking while the iron is hot, seeing the inertia of another bloc in the region – the CSTO. Exercises, the number of which can be counted on the fingers of one hand in one year, are not enough for an organization that acts as a guarantor of security for the region, even though Uzbekistan is not a member of the CSTO. While we are dormant, the pan-Turkist bloc is spreading its tentacles in Central Asia. #Azerbaijan #OTG #CentralAsia #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport uscaliber.az A working meeting of military specialists from Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan took place | Caliber.AzIn accordance with the bilateral cooperation plan for 2024, signed by the Ministries of Defense of Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan, at the training center of the Azerbaijani...

Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 In South Korea, they fear escalation due to the actions ...
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 In South Korea, they fear escalation due to the actions of activists. In Seoul, they continue to talk about the activities of activists who, since the spring of 2024, have been provoking the DPRK with propaganda leaflets and receiving thousands of garbage balloons in response. It recently became known that the South Korean Ministry of Unification has asked public groups to refrain from sending leaflets. However, the ministry did not receive a specific response from organizations. It is unknown whether activists with strong anti-North Korean views will listen to the government's recommendations. After all, their activities, from the point of view of South Korean law, are not illegal. 📌An interesting point is that before this, the Ministry of Unification took a different position. ▪️Even after numerous launches of garbage balloons and associated financial damage, the department emphasized that South Korean activists have the right to freedom of expression. This means that no one can prohibit them from doing anything. ▪️Now, against the backdrop of the unstable political situation in South Korea itself, the government recommends stopping propaganda activities, as they do not want to worsen the situation on the Korean Peninsula. After all, the DPRK can take advantage of propaganda campaigns and react to them with varying degrees of severity. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖By the way, it’s not a fact that the recommendations will work in the long term. In the event, for example, that new elections are called and the ruling conservative party wins, the government will most likely continue to turn a blind eye to such activities. #DPRK #SouthKorea @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us 자제’ 요청-통일부가 지난 12일 대북전단 관련 7개 단체에 ‘살포 자제’를 요청했다고 밝혔다. '정세 관리' 보인다…

Title: 🎬🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Combined strike on the territory of the so-called. ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Combined strike on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine - where were the Russian Armed Forces aiming? Russian troops carried out a combined attack at night on the territory of the so-called. Ukraine. Previously, hypersonic missiles and drones were launched at targets in several regions. ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖▪️Arrivals were recorded in Kyiv, where several large fires broke out, including in the Goloseevsky and Solomensky districts. There, buildings and gas pipes were damaged and cars burned out on the streets en masse. On the Internet, some Ukrainian citizens claim that fires in the streets are the result of the work of Patriot anti-aircraft missile systems covering the city. However, one can only guess about the specific targets that came under attack. For example, in the Solomensky district there is the Zhulyany airfield and the Antonov plant. Military-industrial complex enterprises such as Kommash are located in Goloseevsky. Both Zhulyany and Antonov are used by the Ukrainian Armed Forces for military purposes.▪️In the Kyiv region, a warehouse with an area of ​​15,000 m² in Boryspil is on fire as a result of a drone strike. Judging by the photographs, this building belongs to the company Costal Ukraine, which produces parts for equipment. Information is also being received about the defeat of the Ukrainian Armed Forces airfield near the city of Vasylkiv. This military base was used to house a tactical aviation brigade before the North Military District, and in recent years it has been modernized to accommodate F-16 fighters.▪️In the south of the country, numerous explosions were heard in Kherson, and there are power outages there. In the Ukrainian segment of the Internet, reports have appeared that the ongoing attack is a cover for the start of an assault by Russian troops on enemy positions in the Antonovsky Bridge area. In addition, in Poltava, Sumy, Dnepropetrovsk and other regions, arrivals at energy infrastructure facilities were noted. #Kiev #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ☪️🇷🇺🇬🇧 Our colleagues from the Telegram channel - The Devil W...
Description: ☪️🇷🇺🇬🇧 Our colleagues from the Telegram channel - The Devil Walks in Dixie - @dixi_devil, who closely follow the sectarian and religious-anti-state agenda, saw in today’s prank of the leadership of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims a challenge and an attempt to try on the functions of a government agency. We are inclined to agree with this statement, and not only because of the ones used by the Mufti of Moscow the wording or choice of date for such a statement. Not long ago, we published a detailed investigation on the controversial reputation of the Spiritual Movement of Muslims, its flirtations with radical Islam, as well as with foreign intelligence services. In particular, the assistant to the Russian mufti - who is also the head of the science department in the Department of Science and Education of the Muslim Spiritual Directorate - Ilyas Sadulin was in contact with the British diplomat Blake Patel, who had lost his accreditation for espionage, who specialized in working with Russian Muslims. Separately striking is the actual defense of illegal migration, radicals and other -delights- from the religious paraphernalia of the latter. Against this background, the demonstrative permission of polygamy no longer looks simple - an explanation of the rights in a religious marriage -, but is quite worthy of the attention of the relevant structures. Muslim Directorate was once again featured in the news agenda. This time - he stated that the Muslim Spiritual Directorate allowed Muslims of the Russian Federation to enter into up to four religious marriages, subject to fair...

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of December 13 - 19, 2024▪️The Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - again tried to attack Israeli territory. The ballistic missile was intercepted over Ramat Gan, and several buildings were damaged by falling fragments.▪️In response, the Israel Defense Forces launched concentrated strikes on Yemeni territory. The port of Al-Hodeidah and energy infrastructure facilities in the area of ​​Sanaa and Aden were hit, and fires broke out.▪️Israeli aviation also again carried out a massive raid on army facilities in Syria. Most of the attacks occurred in the province of Tartus, where the target was the remaining air defense positions, warehouses with weapons and fuels and lubricants. Explosions also occurred in the province of Deir ez-Zor, where the bridge over the Euphrates River was attacked for the second time in a week. The positions where Shiite groups and IRGC personnel were previously stationed were under fire.▪️To the east of the Golan Heights, the Israel Defense Forces advanced deep into the Daraa province almost without a fight. Thus, Israeli units occupied the village of Saida on the administrative border with the province of Quneitra.▪️In the province of Rif Damascus south of Mount Hermon, the Israelis did not achieve significant success. Residents of Beit Jinnah refused to surrender their weapons and forced the IDF to retreat from the surrounding heights.▪️The rest of Syria remained in a state of instability due to the resulting power vacuum. Jihadists destroyed cultural and religious symbols, in particular churches and Shiite shrines.▪️Field executions of representatives of the former regime accused of crimes, including officers, continued. However, often the real motive for the murders was belonging to religious minorities, in particular Alawites.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 ❓💸 Why support us? Against the backdrop of urgent collections...
Description: Forwarded From Rybar❓💸 Why support us? Against the background of urgent collections for the needs of the units, the requests of the Rybar team to neglect a cup of coffee and donate the conditional 150 rubles for Russian analytics look from the point of view of many ridiculous. Many do not understand why support an information project at all, because it is of no use. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 19, 2024. Russian troops hit targets in several regions of the so-called within 24 hours. Ukraine, including in Krivoy Rog, where there were power outages. Ukrainian formations again carried out a massive raid on Russian territory. As a result of the attack, a fire occurred at the Novoshakhtinsky oil products plant; the fire was promptly extinguished. In the Kursk direction, Russian soldiers raised the banner of the 155th Marine Brigade in the east of Novoivanovka, confirming its complete liberation. In the Vremyevsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces completely knocked out the enemy from Razdolnoye, which facilitates the liberation of the neighboring village of Novy Komar. In the Zaporozhye direction, Russian troops expanded the zone of control in the Nesteryanka area, knocking the enemy out of a large stronghold.🔻Detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Vremevka #digest #report #Zaporozhye #map #Krivoy Rog #Kursk #Russia #Rostov #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 19, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israelis continue operations in Jabaliya and Beit Lahia, as well as in the vicinity of the Kamal Adwan hospital. As a result of an Israeli Air Force airstrike on a house in Jabaliya, 13 people were killed. In the center of the enclave, the Israeli Air Force struck Al-Maghazi, the outskirts of Nuseirat and Deir al-Balah, and the situation remained calm, with the exception of explosions in the vicinity of the Philadelphia Corridor and artillery IDF strikes in the Khuzaa area. Clashes occurred in the West Bank in Nablus and nearby refugee camps, and four members of Kataib Shuhada al-Aqsa were killed in Tulkarm. In the Balata camp, an 80-year-old woman died during an Israeli operation. Last night, the Israeli Air Force carried out a series of attacks on ports and power plants in Yemen, killing at least nine people. In turn, the Ansarallah movement launched another missile at Tel Aviv, hitting a school in Ramat Gan.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish versionOnline maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #digest #report #Israel #map #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇸🇾🇹🇯🇺🇿🏴 Another remarkable news from Central Asia: it turn...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇯🇺🇿🏴 Another remarkable news from Central Asia: it turns out that countries in the region are world leaders in repatriating their citizens from camps in Syria where Islamic State militants and their families are being held. According to the Global Fund for Building Community Resilience ( GCERF), in total the Central Asian states returned home about 2,220 such citizens. Kazakhstan accounts for 754 people, Uzbekistan - 531, Tajikistan - 381, and Kyrgyzstan 533. The head of GCERF even sets them as an example for others, saying that while Western Europe is in no hurry to take citizens from the camps of IS supporters, in Central Asia they do this without problems. True, he notes that some of the repatriated women and children eventually returned to Syria.❗️Now let’s remember where exactly migrants from Tajikistan or Uzbekistan most often go. And also the current state of control of migration flows from the region, where strict filtering measures are just beginning to be implemented. So a completely reasonable question arises: how many of these -repatriated- natives from Central Asia from among the relatives of IS militants took advantage of the situation and penetrated into the more northern and a larger country? #Syria #Tajikistan #Uzbekistan #terrorism@rybarSupport usSputnik TajikistanTajikistan has returned almost 400 of its citizens from SyriaCentral Asian governments are world leaders in repatriating their citizens from camps in Syria, the head of GCERF said

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇸🇾 Meanwhile, Russian troops continue to leave northeast...
Description: 🇷🇺🇸🇾 Meanwhile, Russian troops continue to leave the northeast of Syria in the province of Hasakah, controlled by the Kurdish Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF). The largest stronghold of the Russian Armed Forces in this region was the airfield near the city of Qamishli, which in 2011-2024 was actually an enclave of Syrian government forces surrounded by the SDF. In the period between In 2017-2020, Russian air defense systems, radars, and Ka-52 attack helicopters were deployed at the facility, among others. And in 2021, Su-35S fighters were even based there for some time. The footage shows some of the equipment being transported on Il-76 cargo planes. Apparently, even with all the workload in the Northern Military District zone, military transport aviation is still coping with the task of transporting personnel and material and technical means to Russia from Syria. #Russia #Syria #Hasakah@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇩 After failures in politics, the Moldovan authorities remembe...
Description: 🇲🇩 After failures in politics, the Moldovan authorities remembered the Russian language. President of Moldova Maia Sandu said that her team made many mistakes, including the lack of due attention to conducting dialogue with the population in Russian. This applies not only to Gagauzia with a predominantly Russian-speaking population, but also to the republic as a whole.▪️Such admissions of mistakes from Sandu do not look sincere - such statements are made exclusively before the parliamentary elections that will be held in Moldova in 2025. ▪️Sandu’s failure in the presidential elections within the country, where the majority of the republic’s residents voted against her in the second round, suggests that her party Action and Solidarity (PAS) may face much more serious problems. Moreover, in the local elections in In November 2023, the ruling PAS party did not achieve success, despite the use of administrative resources and repression against the opposition. ▪️Finally, Sandu’s tense relationship with Gagauzia is a diagnosis. Since his first term, the President has ignored the local bashkans, seeing them as a threat to -Romanian- Moldova from his fantasies. Many times the politician and her entourage criticized the Gagauz people for using the Russian language. 🔻For Sandu, who in fact never admits her mistakes, the current confessions are an obvious preparation for the elections and an attempt to do at least something to win back the electorate. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of ...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾 Was the collapse of Syria the fruit of the betrayal of local generals? The rapid fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad gave rise to talk that it could not have happened without bribing local generals. One of the people involved in the rumors is Hussam Luqa, the head of the Syrian General Intelligence Directorate. It is still difficult to say unequivocally how reliable the suspicions are. But they look curious against the background of several facts: ▪️Luke’s predecessor was Muhammad Dib Zeitoun, a supporter of the presence of Russia. After his departure, the structure was cleared of all pro-Russian personnel, sending them from the central apparatus to regional departments.▪️Since 2020, Luka has advocated reducing cooperation with Russia and increasing it with Iran. He enlisted the support of Ali Mamluk, an ally of Assad, who began to receive interest on every Iranian loan for promoting the interests of the Islamic Republic.▪️With the worsening economic situation of the country, Luka came into contact with the intelligence services of Turkey and Qatar under the guise of work. It wasn’t that difficult to do, especially considering that his daughter worked at the UN.📌 What’s the result? There is a Syrian high-ranking Sunni general not from the ruling clan, who alternately ditches Syria’s main allies and at the same time has connections with the intelligence of Turkey and Qatar. According to some reports, it was Hussam Luqa who gave the order to end the resistance in Homs and Damascus. He is also associated with reports of a coup attempt, as well as the intention to arrest Assad during the failed address to the nation on December 7. Now the whereabouts of Hussam Luqa are unknown, but if he suddenly surfaces somewhere as part of the new Syrian authorities, this will be confirmation of his role in the takeover of the country by militants. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): attempts to reac...
Description: ❗️🇸🇾🇹🇷 Crisis in Syria (Aleppo province): attempts to reach agreements on Ain al-Arabsituation by 9:00 December 19, 2024 Expected Turkish military operation to capture the city of Ain al-Arab and its countryside in the northeast of Aleppo province for now hasn't started. ▪️Instead, the Turkish Armed Forces have so far only periodically struck at the positions of the Arab-Kurdish association - the Syrian Democratic Forces - (SDF). At the same time, Turkish troops are bringing reinforcements to the line of combat contact.▪️At the demilitarized Tishrin dam, located east of the city of Menbij, there were clashes between factions of the pro-Turkish Syrian National Army (SNA) and fighters of the pro-Kurdish Menbij Military Council.❗On this Against the backdrop, there were reports that the Americans managed to delay the start of the battle for Ain al-Arab until the end current week. During this time, the parties must reach a truce. The Kurds have already expressed their readiness for this.▪️So, the commander of the Syrian Democratic Forces, Mazlum Abdi, proposed declaring Ain al-Arab and the surrounding areas in the countryside a demilitarized zone. This should allay Turkey's concerns about the presence of Kurdish forces near its border. In the event of the withdrawal of SDF units from the city, all responsibility should fall on the American contingent. Another question is that such a number of US military personnel is unlikely to be able to prevent an attack by Turkey and its local allies.🔻As we wrote, Ain el-Arab (or Kobani, as the Kurds call it) will defend the SDF more actively: for them it is a symbol of resilience against the face of terrorism, where they include the Turkish-backed SNA. The majority of the city's population is also Kurdish. However, in reality everything may turn out differently. Ain el-Arab may well repeat the fate of Afrin, when the Kurdish units there promised to fight to the end for the city, but were forced to leave it under the threat of bombing by Turkish aircraft. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 18, 2024. During the course of 24 hours, Russian troops launched a series of attacks on enemy infrastructure and industrial facilities in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine. Ukrainian formations, in turn, attacked the Rostov region and the liberated territory of the Zaporozhye region with Storm Shadow cruise missiles. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian troops crossed Oskol and gained a foothold in the south of the village of Dvurechnoye. There are battles in the area to expand the bridgehead and form a stable front on the right bank of the river. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces significantly expanded the wedge in the Shevchenko-Novotroitskoye sector, liberating Novy Trud and knocking out the enemy from several positions north of Pushkino. In the Kurakhovsky direction, according to a statement from the Russian Ministry of Defense, Russian troops liberated Trudovoye and Starye Terny. At the same time, on the southern flank, the Russian Armed Forces completely knocked out the enemy from Uspenivka and raised the Russian flag on its northwestern outskirts. In the Vremyevsky direction there are heavy battles in the area of ​​Razdolnoye and Novy Komar. In the latter, contrary to individual reports on the Internet, the presence of the Ukrainian Armed Forces still remains. A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en)⭐️ Online -maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Russia #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️NATO military preparations in Europe 🇺🇸The US deployed t...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️NATO military preparations in Europe🇺🇸The United States deployed to a military base in Grafenwoehr in 🇩🇪Germany, where the 41st Field Artillery Brigade of the US Army (41st FAB), 3rd Battalion of the 321st is stationed Field Artillery Regiment (3-321 FAR). The battalion is equipped with an M270A2 (Himars) MLRS with an ER-GMLRS launcher for two missiles capable of hitting targets at a distance of up to 150 km. Lithuania has entered into an agreement with Germany to purchase 44 Leopard 2A8 main battle tanks, from which a tank battalion will be formed . In addition, the Lithuanian government will increase defense spending by more than 800 million euros in 2025. Poland received 84 K2 main battle tanks from South Korea. The remaining 96 will be delivered by the end of 2025. In addition, it is planned to supply K9 Thunder self-propelled guns (SPHs) and HOMAR-K MLRS (more than 200 units) to the army. Within the framework of contracts with the USA, 3 strategic MQ-9B SkyGuardian UAVs were supplied, 250 M1A2 SEPv3 Abrams tanks and 32 -x fighters F-35.🇨🇿The Czech Republic will purchase 14 Leopard 2A4 tanks from the German company Rheinmetall as part of a contract worth 161 million euros. The French company KNDS manufactured the first 2 Caesar self-propelled guns for the Czech army as part of a contract for the supply of 62 units, which will be delivered before the end of 2026. An agreement was reached on the supply of 10 thousand Sentry anti-tank mines to the troops. Greece is preparing an agreement with the Israeli company Elbit Systems on the purchase of 38 PULS MLRS. The contract is valued at 500 million euros. ✨Friendly NATO countries are clearly strengthening the combat capability of their armies not for parades. Two majors

Title: 🔁🎬 🖥️ CNN employee Frederic Pleitgen, who spread fakes about t...
Description: Forwarded From SOLOVIOV🖥️ CNN employee Frederic Pleitgen, who spread fakes about the special operation and justified the actions of the Kyiv regime, is now broadcasting live from Moscow, from the scene of the murder of the head of the RKhBZ troops, General Igor Kirillov and his adjutant Ilya Polikarpov. On August 30, 2024, Pleitgen prepared the story with footage of crossing the border of the Kursk region, which militants of the Kyiv regime handed him over. On September 2, he made a new propaganda video for CNN about the invasion of Ukrainian forces in the Kursk region. In September, an American -journalist- made a long report from occupied Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) in the DPR, where he recorded an interview with Ukrainian Armed Forces militants, and on September 11, CNN aired a story about Ukraine's -strong victory- in the Donbass. On October 16, Pleitgen’s story about the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ strikes on Russian territory was published. At the same time, the news that the journalist was in the areas of the Kursk region occupied by the Kyiv regime was not confirmed.✍ Subscribe to Solovyov! Video is too big

Title: 🇩🇿🇫🇷 Why did Algeria and France quarrel? Back in July, Algeri...
Description: 🇩🇿🇫🇷 Why did Algeria and France quarrel? Back in July, the Algerian authorities recalled their ambassador from France due to the recognition by the French authorities of Moroccan sovereignty over Western Sahara. And now there is the question of a final severance of ties due to the alleged French sponsorship of terrorist groups. The story began with the fact that former Islamic State militant Mohamed Amin Aissaoui told Algerian counterintelligence that French intelligence was trying to recruit him. According to him, he was instructed, with the help of other agents of the French diplomatic services, to collect information about Islamists in the capital of Algeria and Oran, as well as about smuggling networks, involved in illegal migration.📍The biography of Mohamed Amin Aissawi is quite interesting. In 2014, he secretly left Spain without informing his family. Having joined the ranks of terrorists, the radical Islamist fought in Raqqa, where he was seriously wounded by shrapnel. For treatment, he tried to enter Turkey, where he was arrested. Mohamed was then repatriated to Algeria, where he was released after three years in prison in 2019. And in 2023, the French intelligence services turned to him.▪️It is worth noting that this is not the only case of support for anti-government forces from France. So, last year, French intelligence services helped separatist Amira Buraoui escape from Algeria. In addition, there were other cases related to the sponsorship of Islamist parties in Algeria. Now Aissaoui decided to cooperate with Algerian counterintelligence, informing them of an attempt to recruit him. This incident served as a reason to summon the French Ambassador to Algeria, Stéphane Romate, for a conversation. Of course, the latter denied all accusations that the French supported terrorists. It is likely that this will be followed by an increase in tension, up to the expulsion of the French ambassador from the country. At the same time, the Algerian authorities, in their anti-French agenda, do not stop relations with the West. On the contrary, recently they have been building bridges with other Western powers, mainly the United States.#Algeria #Africa #France@rybarSupport usTSAL'Algérie convoque l'ambassadeur de France : ce que Alger reproche à ParisLa crise s'aggrave entre l'Algérie et la France. Le ministère des affaires étrangères a convoqué l’ambassadeur de France à Alger.

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 A serious incident occurred in the Murmansk region: a pas...
Description: 🇷🇺 A serious incident occurred in the Murmansk region: a passenger train traveling from Murmansk to St. Petersburg collided with a freight train at the Knyazhaya station. This happened at 16:15 Moscow time. As a result of the collision, eight cars of the passenger train derailed, and one freight car turned over on its side. At the time of the incident, there were 326 passengers on the train. According to preliminary data, at least ten people were injured. It is reported that one woman was pinned between the carriages, and other passengers were injured. The Governor of the Murmansk region, Andrei Chibis, confirmed that ambulance crews and rescuers were sent to the scene of the incident to provide assistance to the victims. It is currently known that the evacuation of passengers from the place has begun incidents.#incidents #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸🖇Scandal with CNN report from the scene of the murder...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸🖇The scandal with CNN's report from the scene of the murder of the head of the RKhBZ troops Igor Kirillov and his assistant by a migrant from Uzbekistan actually raises a number of non-trivial questions: ▪️is the activity of foreign journalists, at least from Western countries, monitored at a systemic level?▪️should Should we expect conceptual changes in the policy of issuing accreditations? journalists who work for anti-Russian publications (a list of them is very easy to compile)? ▪️What measures of prosecution and punishment will affect journalists of Western publications who illegally crossed the Russian border and with their reports misled world public opinion about the goals and methods of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Russian territory? Of course, none of them covered the kidnappings of civilians. 📌And the most important question is how many more such journalists remain in Russia now? And whose activities, both public and undercover, need to be verified. 🔻There is only one conclusion here: expelling journalists from the country and closing editorial offices only in response to sanctions against Russian media is already an outdated practice. Journalists from publications like CNN (if they were allowed in for some reason) should a priori be considered possible intelligence informants from unfriendly countries.
