Title: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 Is Aliyev threatening Armenia again? Azerbaijani Preside...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 Is Aliyev threatening Armenia again? Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev said that the Armenian authorities, together with their patrons in the United States and France, must stop rearmament of the Armenian Armed Forces. ▪️Aliyev, in his own style, added that if the militarization of Armenia continues, there will be no complaints against Baku, which actually sounds like another threat. ▪️One would think that Aliyev is denouncing the West for arming another country to create hotbeds of tension. For those outside the context of the Transcaucasian agenda, it may seem exactly like this. However, Azerbaijan has long been looking for a reason for a military operation, and periodic provocations on the border, active reconnaissance by Azerbaijani drones, as well as belligerent rhetoric in the media are evidence of this. ▪️The Armenian authorities, led by Pashinyan, are quite consciously (and under the supervision of Great Britain) playing along with Azerbaijan with new defense agreements, kindly providing new arguments for pressure and threats. Another goal of rearmament is to show that Yerevan can do without the Russian military-industrial complex and without Russia in general. For now, the Armenians are trying to develop a completely new market for Indian weapons and are content with one-time supplies from the French. Therefore, it is hardly possible to seriously talk about the great offensive potential of Armenia.▪️But Azerbaijan is also not stopping at militarization with the help of Turkey, and they certainly would not refuse a new military operation when the opportunity presents itself. 🔻The so-called peace negotiations between Yerevan and Baku have clearly reached a dead end recently, despite the demonstrative optimism of the Armenian authorities. Nevertheless, in Azerbaijan they are deliberately inventing new demands for Armenia. It is strange that Aliyev does not directly demand the complete demilitarization of Armenia as a condition of the peace treaty, but the Azerbaijanis clearly do not strive to sign it. #Azerbaijan #Armenia @rybarSupport usTelegramBefore anyone else. Well, almost.❗️Azerbaijan is telling Armenia and its allies in the United States about the need to stop rearmament of the Armenian army, Ilham Aliyev said in an interview with VGTRK and RIA Novosti: -We are and will continue to convey both within the framework of the negotiation process and within the commission...

Title: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 Everything about this news is great: Abkhazia asked Russ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇬🇪 Everything about this news is great: Abkhazia asked Russia to continue supplying electricity for free in 2025. However, according to local authorities, they have not yet received an answer in Sukhum. Problems with electricity there arose against the backdrop of the local parliament’s refusal to ratify an agreement allowing Russian business to implement investment projects in Abkhazia. This is what the consequences of Russia’s soft policy in the post-Soviet space look like : entire republics can live off the Russian budget, give almost nothing in return and demand continued free assistance. Well, in the current situation, Abkhazia will have to urgently redistribute energy in favor of consumers and massively close down mining farms that have proliferated across its territory in the face of generous supplies of Russian electricity.#Abkhazia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore anyone else. Well, almost.⚡️Abkhazia asked Russia to supply 327 million kWh of electricity free of charge in 2025, but did not receive a response, the authorities of the republic told RIA Novosti.

Title: 🏳️🇺🇸 Why should Americans recognize Somaliland? Republican Con...
Description: 🏳️🇺🇸 Why should Americans recognize Somaliland? Republican Congressman Scott Perry introduced a new bill in Congress advocating recognition of the Republic of Somaliland as an independent state.▪️Such a move by the American government represents both US interests in the Red Sea region as a whole and reflects their confrontation with China. In particular, to the north of Somaliland, in Djibouti, there is the only Chinese military base in Africa. In addition to this, the Somaliland authorities are able to maintain control over their country, unlike the Somalis. However, the United States has already stopped placing hopes on the latter. ▪️This decision is also being pushed by various think-tanks and certain circles among the Republicans, who said that they would urge Trump to recognize Somaliland, even if this does not happen on the first day. 📍What’s interesting is that such a decision goes against past in Ankara, negotiations between Ethiopian and Somali leaders, which, it seemed, were supposed to lead to peace. Therefore, this gesture should be regarded as a slight hint to the leadership in Addis Ababa that they should rely primarily on the White House. Moreover, Washington has already considered the option of removing the current authorities of Ethiopia. And in addition, the Americans are quite capable of getting another controlled vassal, whose position is favorable both for the war with the Houthis and for the confrontation with the PRC.#Africa #Somalia #USA #Ethiopia @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺 We read with surprise the passions of the so-called. -Doomsd...
Description: 🇷🇺 We read with surprise the passions of the so-called. -Doomsday radio station - UVB-76, on the air of which they observe record-long messages and see in them signals for the launch - Oreshnikov - or even a harbinger of the use of nuclear weapons. The reality is much simpler: when - Swan Lake - or songs are played on UVB-76 - Shaman, then this is just the fun of radio amateurs with broadcasting over the frequency. It’s quite easy to do this - you don’t even need to hack anything. And the biggest laugh from such sensations is in the community of radio amateurs UVB-76, which has been dabbling in such things for several decades. It is unlikely that they could have imagined that in their harmless games the media would manage to see preparations for -nuclear winter-.#Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramURA.RUThe Doomsday radio station again gave signals: in the evening the song Shaman -I am Russian-, the anthem of the USSR and music from the ballet -Swan Lake-. Some users suggested that the Buzzer had been hacked, and others that it was sending signals for use...

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇸🇾 British diplomat Stephen Hickey is a harbinger of cha...
Description: 🇬🇧🇸🇾 British diplomat Stephen Hickey is a harbinger of chaos in the Middle East. After numerous interviews, the leader of the terrorist group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, Abu Muhammad al-Julani, began receiving foreign delegations from Western countries. Diplomats from Germany, France, and the UN have already noted themselves in Damascus . Everyone has the same goal - establishing contacts with the new Syrian authorities. The EU went further, saying that they were ready to lift sanctions in exchange for the closure of Russian bases in the country.❗️But two British politicians were among the very first to visit Syria. The British Commissioner for Syria, Anne Snow, and the head of the Middle East department in the British Foreign Office is Stephen Hickey, who is not even mentioned in the media.📌 Hickey is a very interesting person. He moved up the career ladder very quickly, specializing in the Middle East region. He managed to work in Libya, Syria, Iraq, Egypt and even South Africa. And it just so happened that with his arrival, mass unrest began in these countries, and in Egypt everything even came to a coup. Of course, this can all be called a coincidence, but, as a rule, where the British have important interests, something similar happens there. And Hickey’s rather rapid rise through the ranks, regardless of the change in the top leadership of Great Britain, demonstrates his skills and importance. True, in choosing Al-Julani the British showed, to put it mildly, indiscriminately. However, after Zelensky, you are no longer surprised by anything: the leader of HTS, unlike the Ukrainian president, at least thought to wear a suit, observing minimal politeness. But no one told Al-Julani that he needed to put on a tie - but the British will probably quickly correct this mistake. High-resolution mapEnglish version#Great Britain #Syria #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: what is the signifi...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: what is the significance of the breakthrough of the Russian Armed Forces to the Toretskaya mine - the situation as of 10:00 on December 18, 2024🔻In the Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction, Russian troops are advancing in the direction of the Toretskaya mine. The positions of the Russian Armed Forces came under attack in the area of ​​the Avangard stadium, not far from the building of the local military registration and enlistment office. The enemy is paying special attention to the Toretskaya mine, on the territory of which the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are regularly subjected to massive artillery shelling and air raids. ❗️The mine itself is important - its occupation will be a key stage for the subsequent coverage of the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Dzerzhinsk along the private sector from the north, as well as simultaneous entry into the adjacent village of Krymskoye with the prospect of access to the railway.▪️It also increasingly flies through neighboring Dachnoye and Dyleevka , which the enemy uses as supply points and temporary deployment for the transfer of troops to Dzerzhinsk. Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 18, 2024 ▪️ The main even...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 18, 2024 ▪️ The main event of the past day was the murder in Moscow of Lieutenant General Igor Kirillov, chief of the RKhBZ troops, and his assistant with the rank of major. The explosion was organized by the Kyiv special services, who did not hide their joy in the controlled information dumps, but never officially took responsibility. ▪️ Heavy bloody battles continue in the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces continue strikes in the area of ​​the settlement. Kruglenkoe, as well as near the settlement. Russkoye Porechnoye, expanding the zone of control north-west of Plekhovo. The enemy is putting up fierce resistance. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, our troops are advancing on a broad front south of Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk). There are attacks in the area of ​​the village. Shevchenko and Dachenskoye, in the direction of the settlement. Peschanoye, Solenoye and Novovasilevka. Moving from village to village, the Russian Armed Forces close the emerging -pockets-, leveling the front.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces clear out the Uspenovsky -pocket-, advance in Kurakhovo itself and expand the zone of control southeast of the city near Zelenovka. Busy n.p. Constantinople, they reported that the area had been cleared. ▪️ North of Velikaya (Bolshaya) Novoselka, our Marines are consolidating their positions in the settlement. New Komar and expand the control zone. If successful, the enemy forces in Velyka Novosyolki have only one supply road left - through the settlement. Vremevka. At the same time, from the south, the Russian Armed Forces are attacking the settlement. Sentry. ▪️ At night, Geranium strikes were carried out on enemy territory against targets in Kremenchug, Pavlograd, Starokonstantinov, the suburbs of Kyiv, and the Kirovograd region. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKurakhovsky direction According to @voin_dv, Sakhalin warriors from the 68th Army Corps continue the onslaught. Currently occupied. Constantinople (Ostrovsky), the remaining enemy forces on the streets are being cleared. Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsky direction: oncoming battles in Shevchenko a...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsk direction: oncoming battles in Shevchenko and advance to Novovasilevkasituation as of 8:00 December 18, 2024🔻In the Pokrovsk direction, Russian troops are advancing towards Pokrovsk. The heaviest fighting takes place in Shevchenko, where the enemy throws reserves into battle. ▪️On the way out from the northern outskirts of the village, an Armed Forces tank exploded on a mine installed by Russian sappers actually in the battle zone. Apparently, the enemy no longer controls most of the village. Information about the start of battles for Peschanoye, located to the north, has not yet been confirmed.▪️To the west, from the Novotroitsk unit of the Russian Armed Forces, they are advancing towards Novovasilevka. It is not yet clear whether it was possible to gain a foothold on the outskirts of the latter, however, the presence of attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces has already been noted on the approaches to it.▪️On the eastern flank of the Ukrainian Armed Forces at the Lysovka-Dachenskoye line, they took a wait-and-see position. According to the enemy, Russian troops are trying to approach Dachensky from the east. Most likely, in the near future the pocket along the M-30 highway will cease to exist. Description: Forwarded From Rybar📌 WHAT PLATFORMS IS THE @RYBAR PROJECT AVAILABLE ON? Title: 🖼 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 About the preparation of the Turks and their proxie...
Description: 🇸🇾🇹🇷🏴 About the preparation of the Turks and their proxies for an attack on the Kurds Yesterday night, the first real signs of preparation of Turkish troops and the formations controlled by them - the Syrian National Army - for an attack on the positions of the Kurds - the Syrian Democratic Forces - in northern Syria appeared.▪️At first they were recorded columns of military equipment moving from Manbij towards Kobani (Ain al-Arab) through Turkish territory.▪️Along the section from Jarabulus to Tel Abyad, demolition of the fence and walls that were installed back in 2019 by the Turks began, probably in order to simplify the ground offensive on Kobani. Also, pro-Turkish proxies are removing minefields.▪️The number of SNA personnel in the area of ​​the Karakozak Bridge and Tishrin Dam was also increased. The area around the crossing is currently occupied by American troops.▪️Several columns of Turkish ground forces have advanced from Turkish Sanliurfa towards the border with Syria. And from the territory of several air bases, drones of various types headed towards Kurdish-controlled cities.❗️The Turkish operation was expected for a long time. The positions and appetites of the Turkish authorities in northern Syria have become too strong, which was noted more than once after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad in the words of Erdogan. This fact is confirmed by statements by Kurdish representatives who say that the Americans were unable to resolve differences peacefully due to Turkey’s reluctance to negotiate with the SDF. In fact, the position of the Kurds specifically in Kobani is extremely vulnerable, since when attacked from three directions at once, namely this The Turks are planning, it will be extremely difficult for the SDF to hold this pocket north of Ain Issa. High resolution mapEnglish version#Syria #terrorism #Türkiye@rybarSupport us

Over the past few days, rumors have been circulating on the Internet about unprecedented progress in negotiations between Israel and Hamas. Against this background, various fakes are also spreading - for example, today it was reported that militants were allegedly transmitting lists of surviving hostages.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#digest #report #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the reasons for turning off the mobile Internet ...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the reasons for shutting down the mobile Internet in CrimeaToday, to ensure the safety of residents of Crimea, shutdowns of the mobile Internet are possible, as stated by the press service of the Ministry of Information of the Republic of Kazakhstan. This applies to any operators. It can turn off at any time, and not just at night as before. Many people have questions about why, why, and why all this is being done. Some even began to assume that special forces in Crimea were testing some new equipment for jamming communications. In reality, everything is simpler: SIM cards of local operators are increasingly being found in drones of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and in some cases there were also mainland ones, and even from the DPR. And now, when a massive UAV attack is confirmed, the Internet will be turned off. So if the Crimeans and residents of Sevastopol suddenly lose their connection, you yourself understand what is happening. #Crimea #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 War in response to protests: how Israeli authorities ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 War in response to protests: how the Israeli authorities are extinguishing rallies since the beginning of the escalation. The next round of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict has been going on for more than 14 months - during this time, over 1.6 thousand protest events took place in Israel, the lion's share of which were demands to conclude an agreement with Hamas for the return of hostages. Participants in such actions were not only relatives of citizens abducted by militants and everyone who was not indifferent to their fate, but also those who seized on any opportunity to call for the resignation of the ultra-Orthodox government - and there were enough of them throughout their stay in power. 🔻What are the dynamics of the protests? The Hamas invasion of the Gaza Strip itself sharply reduced the number of protests in Israel, where throughout 2023, protests against laws from the so-called judicial reform package arose every now and then. However, the taking of hostages by militants and the IDF's sluggish attempts to return them have led to the emergence of an increasing number of those who disagree with the policies of the ultra-Orthodox. ▪️Until the end of the year, the number of demonstrations was insignificant, including against the background of the population’s expectations of a quick victorious end to the conflict, and a small surge of discontent that arose by the end of November was quickly extinguished by the conclusion of a four-day truce with Hamas and the return of several dozen hostages. ▪️However, since the beginning of 2024, against the backdrop of successive completions of IDF operations in different parts of the enclave without the expected release of hostages, they again led to a significant number of demonstrations. For the first time, the Israelis managed to quell this with rumors about the preparation of a new agreement with Hamas and an exchange of blows with Iran, but by May the IDF operation in Rafah was unable to contain the tension. ▪️Subsequently, it was possible to calm the population a little only with the murder of Hamas head Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, however, after the discovery of the bodies of six hostages in Rafah during a rescue operation, the country was again overwhelmed by mass demonstrations. But the sharp escalation of the conflict with Hezbollah helped to calm the dissatisfied: the number of shares decreased by almost 80% from 226 shares in September to 48 in October. ▪️In November, the protest activity of the population increased again - due to the decrease in the intensity of fighting in southern Lebanon and the subsequent ceasefire agreement. Although the actions of progressive jihadists in Syria and the growth of new rumors about an impending truce with Hamas led to a relative stabilization of the situation in December. 🔻What follows from all this? If you connect the number of demonstrations with the events that took place, even for a reader not immersed in the context, a very remarkable picture will open - the ultra-Orthodox government is quite skillful in extinguishing protest activity by gradually increasing the level of escalation. However, we have already noted more than once that for the Israeli ultra-Orthodox elite, the presence of any conflict is an effective and, apparently, the only way to silence their own population. Otherwise, they will simply have nothing to restrain dissatisfied citizens. Therefore, even against the backdrop of rumors raging in recent days about an imminent agreement with Hamas, there is no point in believing in a peaceful life under the current government in Israel - a new escalation will happen in any case. The only question that remains open is where it will happen: Syria is suitable for this, where IDF fighters are already creating a buffer zone, and the West Bank, where you can always fight with local militants, as well as Iran. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#infographics #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Accordingly, there is no encirclement of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Makarovka either. Currently, battles are taking place on the southern outskirts of Storozhevoy and Blagodatnoye, the capture of which will open the way to Neskuchnoye and the encirclement of the positions of Ukrainian formations in Bolshaya Novoselka from the south.⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru

Title: 🇦🇲🇷🇺 Will Russian TV channels be closed in Armenia? The topic...
Description: 🇦🇲🇷🇺 Will Russian TV channels be closed in Armenia? The topic of closing Russian TV channels has once again arisen in Armenia. Local media report that Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan is being persuaded to take such a step by Western sponsors. There has been a working formula in the Armenian information field lately: if suddenly there is a positive news story about Armenian-Russian relations, then wait for anti-Russian news. ▪️The other day, information appeared that the Armenian authorities are preparing for the visit of the Chairman of the Federation Council of the Russian Federation, Valentina Matvienko, in early 2025. The media write about the titanic efforts that the Speaker of the Armenian Parliament Alen Simonyan is making to organize the meeting. ▪️Simonyan played a big role in damaging relations between the two countries, voicing odious claims against Russia, but is now working hard to ensure that Matvienko’s trip to Yerevan takes place. ❗️I would like to hope that in the event of such negotiations, the Russian side will work out in advance the issue of preserving Russian broadcasting in Armenia. ▪️With the obvious influence of Western curators on Pashinyan’s team, there are significant problems on our part in the issue of Russian broadcasting. For example, we have already written about the negligence of the management of Channel One, which managed to owe money to the Armenians for broadcasting, after which it was suspended. ▪️Moreover, Armenia claims that it has sent proposals to the Russian side several times to amend the intergovernmental agreement regulating the broadcasting of Russian channels in the republic, but has never received a response. 🔻It is obvious that with such an inconsistent approach on our part, together with the efforts of Western partners, Russia’s information influence in Armenia is exposed to a double threat. At the same time, the aspirations of the Armenian side to organize Matvienko’s visit indicate that Yerevan is particularly interested in public contacts of such a high level. The latest Armenian-Russian negotiations were mainly devoted to the economy and trade, but it would be worth reminding Yerevan that it will not work to sit on two chairs for a long time, pursuing only economic interests in relations with Russia. #Armenia #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramSystemic pesticide🇦🇲🇷🇺 About the possible closure of Russian TV channels in ArmeniaThe Armenian media, citing their own sources, claim that the government of Nikol Pashinyan decided to finally stop broadcasting Russian TV channels in the republic at the request of Western...

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the activity of the United States and its allie...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the activity of the United States and its allies in the Asia-Pacific region in 2025 This year has not yet come to an end, and the Japanese press is already beginning to appear dates for exercises in the Asia-Pacific region that will take place next year. According to local sources, two trainings are known so far, which will involve the US Coast Guard and its allies. ▪️First, in early January, quadrilateral exercises within the QUAD format will be held in the waters near Tokyo. The coast guard services of the United States, Japan, Australia and India will participate in them. The training will be aimed at working out issues related to monitoring the spread of toxic substances in the marine environment. The teachings appear to be focused on humanitarian action. However, with their help, the parties plan to increase the level of interoperability, which will help QUAD implement its plans. Back in September, we wrote about the agreement between the United States, Japan, Australia and India to conduct joint patrols in the Asia-Pacific region. 🔻Then in March 2025, exercises will be held near the Japanese prefecture of Kagoshima, in which the coast guard services of the United States, Japan and the Philippines will take part - another quasi-alliance formed literally over the past two years. The training will be aimed at practicing search and rescue operations. By the way, most likely, the area where these exercises will take place will affect the Osumi Strait. Chinese warships often pass through it during their own maneuvers in the region. Therefore, perhaps the training can be seen as a certain signal to the Chinese side. Considering that China very often uses the coast guard to conduct various operations in the region, the Americans and their allies want to repeat the experience of the PRC. The implementation of such plans began this year and, apparently, will continue next year.  High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇬🇪 On the impact of elections in Georgia on Armenia Prime M...
Description: 🇦🇲🇬🇪 On the impact of elections in Georgia on Armenia Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan congratulated Mikhail Kavelashvili on his election as President of Georgia. Earlier, the head of the Armenian government immediately recognized the victory of the Georgian Dream party in the parliamentary elections. ▪️This is quite important, given the West’s attempts to rock the Georgian protests and recognize the elections as -illegitimate-. But the clearly pro-Western authorities of Armenia did not follow the general line of discrediting the Georgian elections, which even caused an attempt by protest leader Salome Zurabishvili to spark a diplomatic scandal. ▪️Potential instability among Georgians poses a huge risk for neighboring Armenia, which is connected to the outside world through roads to Georgia. Moreover, in 1993, during the civil war in Georgia, Armenians suffered greatly from blocked infrastructure, finding themselves surrounded by Azerbaijan and Turkey. 🔻Nevertheless, the outcome of the elections in Georgia will significantly affect Armenia’s pro-Western course in several respects. On the one hand, the fairy tales of the Pashinyan government about potential European integration will become even more fantastic, since without Georgia such a scenario is unrealistic for Armenia due to the inability to provide infrastructure ties with the EU. On the other hand, all Western budgets for building democracy, including American USAID projects, will now collectively flow from Georgia to Armenia, where a similar agenda may intensify, and local figures will once again enrich themselves with grants. #Armenia #Georgia @rybarSupport usSputnik ArmeniaPashinyan and Khachaturian congratulated Kavelashvili on his election as President of Georgia Representatives of the Armenian government congratulated the newly elected President of Georgia.

Title: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 The internal political crisis in South Korea has given t...
Description: 🇰🇷🇯🇵 The internal political crisis in South Korea has given the Japanese reason to worry about the future of relations between Tokyo and Seoul. Several social surveys have been conducted in Japan in recent days, with a majority of respondents expressing fear that bilateral ties will once again turn sour. It can be assumed that such sentiments also exist among the ruling elites of Japan, because with the coming to power of Yun Seok-yeol, relations between Seoul and Tokyo have undergone qualitative changes for the better. 🔻The main reason for possible fears is the change of president in South Korea if Yoon’s impeachment is approved by the Constitutional Court. After all, one or another opposition politician can win the election of the country's leader.  The problem is that such figures most often have anti-Japanese views. They, for example, vehemently criticized Yun for bringing South Korea and Japan closer together. Therefore, if the opposition wins in only a hypothetical election, there is clearly no need to expect a pragmatic course towards Tokyo. However, it is worth understanding that, given the dynamically developing situation in South Korea, it is too early to draw specific conclusions about the deterioration or improvement of bilateral ties with Japan. Therefore, the US plans to contain both the DPRK and China with the help of a trilateral alliance with Seoul and Tokyo cannot be dismissed for now. 70 percent of respondents expressed concerns that recent political turmoil in South Korea, triggered by President Yoon Suk Yeol's martial law declaration, could impact bilateral relations with Japan, a Kyodo News poll shows.

Title: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Reintegration of citizens of Uzbekistan - what is the po...
Description: 🇺🇸🇺🇿 Reintegration of citizens of Uzbekistan - what is the point of American policy? The United States is ready to support Uzbekistan and other countries in the region in the repatriation and reintegration of citizens returned from armed conflict zones. This was stated by the Deputy Permanent Representative of the United States to the UN, David Johnson.❓The Council was created in 2024 under the auspices of the UN Office of Counter-Terrorism. The initiative belonged to the President of Uzbekistan. More than 530 citizens (mostly women and children) have been returned to Uzbekistan since 2019. And such work is an important step in the rehabilitation of those who suffered from the actions of terrorists or committed a rash act and decided to fix everything.❗️However, things can often be different. There are no guarantees that, under the guise of returning to peaceful life, some of these repatriates will not want to return to their homeland to promote extremist ideology in their country. This could be facilitated by the fall of the government of Bashar al-Assad and the rise to power of radical elements, including from Central Asia. For example, under the banner of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, the militants of Katiba al-Tawhid wal-Jihad are fighting - a group mainly consisting of Uzbeks. During the active phase of the offensive and after the capture of Damascus, there were many videos with militants speaking Uzbek, in Turkmen and Russian, where they say that after Syria they will come to restore their there is order in our homeland.🔻So the interests of the American side are quite understandable. Despite the fact that some think-tank structures in the United States consider such a policy to be ineffective, the United States continues to use the factor of terrorism to consolidate its presence in the region. Therefore, the West will certainly help bring back the former terrorists. #CentralAsia #USA #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport usPodrobno.uzThe United States expressed its readiness to support Uzbekistan in the repatriation and reintegration of citizens from combat zonesUzbekistan, Tashkent - Podrobno.uz AN. The United States stands ready to support Uzbekistan and other Central Asian countries in the repatriation and reintegration of their citizens. This was stated by the Deputy Permanent Representative of the United States to the UN, David Johnson.

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸 Joker DPR obtained a document from the Administration for...
Description: 🇺🇸 Joker DNR obtained a document from the Administration for Children and Families in the US Department of Health and Human Services, reflecting information about grants that the American government allocates to help refugees and immigrants. The amounts are really large - from 2023 to 2025 the United States will spend for these purposes almost $1.1 billion. It would seem to be a completely standard American document, in which there is nothing special. However, a closer look reveals the overall priorities of the Joe Biden administration in the field of migration policy - namely, the Democrats' desire to catch up with more potential voters ahead of the presidential election. The report shows that funding for refugee support programs shows a decrease in the level of urgency and volume of funds in 2024-2025 compared to 2023. It is unfortunate, of course, that there is no data for 2021-2022; most likely, the financing of migration in these years was also at a high level. The statistics above also show how lower-priority programs are falling away. For example, support for Afghan and Ukrainian migrants. With the advent of the Donald Trump administration, this whole migration story will lose priority. Most likely, only special immigrants—those who have received the right to immigrate to the United States due to their unique status or merit—can count on more or less stable funding. High-resolution infographics Russian version #USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇨🇦🇺🇸Canadian company Roshel opens first plant in the USA...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇨🇦🇺🇸The Canadian company Roshel opens its first plant in the USA. Today, guardsmen-marines from the 810th brigade boasted of how they captured the enemy MRAP Senator, which is produced by Roshel. This - well - goes to the Armed Forces of Ukraine in an almost inexhaustible flow. According to the company, more than 1.4 thousand MRAP Senators have been delivered to Ukraine since 2022 (at 375 thousand euros per unit). Production facilities in Canada operate continuously, producing 140 vehicles per month. Taking into account the new plant in Shelby Township (Michigan🇺🇸), production will be increased. In addition, Roshel plans to open production facilities in 🇩🇪Germany, as well as in Ukraine, in addition to already operating repair and maintenance enterprises.✨It is not worth expecting that foreign military manufacturers will stop making money from the Ukrainian conflict, which means there will only be personnel with NATO trophies more. Title: 🔁 The murder of the chief of the RKhBZ troops, Kirillov, was not...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey MedvedevIt was no coincidence that the murder of the head of the RKhBZ troops, Kirillov, was committed by Ukrainian terrorists literally the next day after the open board meeting of the Russian Ministry of Defense, where both the head of the department and the Supreme Commander-in-Chief spoke. Since the authorities of the former Ukraine attach great importance to various types of PR and information warfare, we can confidently say that the target for the terrorist attack was chosen a long time ago, but the curators adjusted the time to use the murder of the Russian general, with maximum effect for the domestic Ukrainian audience. -It doesn’t matter what they say in Moscow, it doesn’t matter how many Ukrainian soldiers die every day, it doesn’t matter that the TCC grabs men on the streets indiscriminately. It doesn’t matter that they bring energy to us with missiles. Our saboteurs blew up the general. Glory to all of us, there is not much time left before the ultimate victory. Will the murder of the Russian general affect the course of hostilities? Of course not. As soon as it affects the future of Ukrainian territory, the fate of the Ukrainian military at the front. Such terrorist tactics and logic of reasoning are very consistent with the Bandera tradition. When, in the 50s, militants came out of hiding and killed, realizing that they had no goal for a long time, that the OUN-UPA was all over. And there are no leaders. But Ukrainian militants killed without a purpose, simply out of hatred. And the desire to prove to themselves that they still mean something. Well, because British and American intelligence gave money for the underground war. However, I repeat that for the leadership of the former Ukraine, the terrorist attack in Moscow is a way to distract the domestic audience from news about the possible mobilization of youth from 18 years of age. Or from such news.-People 25-60 years old with II or III group disability from the designated line of re-examination of claims will be required to go through the period from 1st quarter to 1st leaf fall in 2025 after the new Law-. Not clear? I'm translating. Men with disabilities are required to undergo a medical examination. I wonder why, right? The population of Ukraine, in principle, understands what this means for them. So the terrorist attack and the murder of Russian officers will not change anything. But for us, this is a reminder that war is near everyone. Literally, here, at arm's length. May the memory of the fallen Russian officers be blessed. We will win no matter what. https://t.me/rybar/66413TelegramRybar🇷🇺 The murder of the chief of the Russian Chemical Defense Forces in Moscow once again emphasizes that no matter what successes we achieve on the battlefield, no matter what euphoria reigns and no matter how much we talk about intercepting the initiative, the other side always has the opportunity...

Title: 🇨🇦 About the political crisis in Canada and the possible resign...
Description: 🇨🇦 About the political crisis in Canada and Trudeau's possible resignation The Liberal government of Canada experienced a serious shake-up on the eve of the Christmas holidays. Two ministers left their posts at once: Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Finance, Deputy Prime Minister of Canada (and an ardent supporter of support for Ukraine), and Sean Fraser, Minister of Housing. It is noteworthy that it was the economic situation and the housing crisis that became the main subjects of criticism against the government of Justin Trudeau. Trudeau has faced calls to resign in recent months, including from members of his own Liberal party. However, as we see, the Prime Minister decided instead to give the people - the heads - of the ministers responsible for reducing the living standards of ordinary Canadians. 📌The decision is quite desperate, given that according to polls, the Liberal Party lags behind the opposition Conservative Party by more than 20%, and there is less than a year left before the elections. However, Prime Minister Trudeau still has a chance to prolong the agony with personnel changes. According to rumors, Trudeau offered the position of Minister of Finance to Mark Carney, the former head of the Bank of Canada and the Bank of England, a respected economist. 🔻However, there is now no reason to believe that personnel changes will help Trudeau win the election, as well as retain the post of prime minister until October 2025. The Conservative opposition has already tried three times to pass a vote of no confidence against Trudeau. And the only thing keeping Trudeau and the Liberal minority afloat is the fragile support of other left-leaning parties. And it may disappear as soon as the reputational risks begin to outweigh the benefits of cooperation with the liberals.#Canada@rybarSupport usNational PostTrudeau picks loyalist LeBlanc to replace Freeland after shock resignation sparks chaosOTTAWA — Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's government is facing life-threatening chaos after the shocking resignation of Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland from cabinet on Monday, along with the resignation of Housing Minister Sean Fraser, with several Liberal…

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 17, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of December 17, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops is developing success east of Novoivanovka and advancing in the adjacent forest plantations. Fierce fighting is taking place in the Russky Porechny area. At the same time, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are able to conduct an organized maneuverable defense and conduct counterattacks in forest areas near Malaya Loknya and Cherkasy Porechny using armored vehicles. There is no need to talk about the collapse of the enemy’s defense in the region, despite the low level of moral and psychological state of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.▪️ In the Kharkov direction there are battles in Volchansk and in the Liptsovsk direction, the line of combat contact is without significant changes.▪️ In Chasov Yar, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone of control near Fireproof plant, the main enemy fortified area in the city. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction south of Dachensky they report the advance of our troops, there are battles near Ukrainka.▪️ The offensive of the Russian Armed Forces on the southern flank of the Kurakhovsky direction is developing. Fighting is going on in Constantinople, n.p. Sukhie Yaly, our attack aircraft rushed towards Zelenovka. ▪️ In the Velikonovoselovsky direction, our troops have almost completed the coverage of Makarovka and are approaching Neskuchny. There are battles in the village. New Mosquito, the enemy is trying to counterattack. At the same time, the villages are being captured from the direction of Rovnopol, and the collapse of the enemy’s defenses in the southern settlements of the Vremevsky direction becomes a matter of time. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, assault units of the Russian Armed Forces began separate offensive operations in the Orekhovsky direction. Using highly maneuverable equipment, after powerful artillery bombardment, attack aircraft close with the enemy and fight for strong points in forest plantations, occupying enemy positions in heavy battles. The enemy snarls with drone strikes. The main forces of the Russian Army have not yet been brought into battle. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, near the village of Borki, Valuysky district, an FPV drone of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked a moving truck, the driver was injured. A drone was shot down by an air defense system over the Belgorod region. In Shebekino, a social facility building was damaged as a result of a shell landing. Title: 🇷🇺🇪🇺 On new EU sanctions against Russia, the Council of the E...
Description: 🇷🇺🇪🇺 On new EU sanctions against Russia The Council of the European Union approved another sanctions package aimed at 54 individuals and 32 legal entities accused of undermining (quote) the rules-based international order and hybrid activities. The restrictions included Russian technology companies, managers of large corporations, intelligence officers and famous people, in particular Tina Kandelaki and singer Larisa Dolina. 📌The list has also been supplemented by companies and individuals from China, India, Iran, Serbia and the UAE, suspected of circumventing restrictions and supplying dual-use goods. As Tina Kandelaki already noted in her statement, Western sanctions against individuals have indeed turned into an element of a show that, at first glance, does not carry any practical meaning. This is especially true for top managers of large companies and military personnel who are not allowed to travel abroad, for whom the restrictions of the European Union are neither hot nor cold. 🔻However, this show still has a goal. While all the media are discussing the motive for including individuals or organizations in the list of sanctions for so-called hybrid operations, the main attention is diverted from economic measures directed against Russian enterprises, foreign counterparties and the energy industry. There should be no illusions here - Western countries are carrying out comprehensive work to strangle the Russian economy, improving the mechanisms of financial pressure. Therefore, new restrictions need to be carefully analyzed in order to actively and effectively resist this.#EU #Russia #economy@rybar Support usTelegramTina KandelakiWhenever I hear that sanctions have been imposed against me, I remember -The Headless Horseman- who gallops somewhere- then, having neither thoughts nor images, driven only by the thirst for revenge. And it doesn’t matter whether there is any sense in these matters, the main thing is to jump around and sow horror. Today...

Title: 🇩🇪 Following France, a political crisis is developing in German...
Description: 🇩🇪 Following France, a political crisis is developing in Germany. The Bundestag expectedly passed a vote of no confidence in Chancellor Olaf Scholz: only 207 deputies spoke in favor of his government, 394 voted against, and 116 abstained. Now, with a high probability, President Frank-Walter Steinmeier will dissolve the parliament, and early elections have been announced in the country. Scholz himself had already agreed in advance with the opposition parties to hold them on February 23, 2025. What happened is a consequence of the collapse of the ruling traffic light coalition in November, when several ministers from the Free Democratic Party of Germany (SPD) left the bloc. The reason was disagreements in plans to improve the health of the German economy, which is in crisis. So far, everything is going according to the scenario that we previously wrote about. Therefore, after the new elections, you shouldn’t expect changes in German politics with the replacement of -green- with -yellow- or -red- with gray-brown-crimson: the task set by the Americans to destroy the German economy for all of them remains the same.#Germany@rybarSupport us stagesschauBundeskanzler Scholz verliert VertrauensfrageKanzler Scholz hat die Vertrauensfrage wie beabsichtigt verloren. 207 Abgeordnete stimmten für ihn - er verfehlte also die absolute Mehrheit von 367 Stimmen. Damit wäre der Weg für die Auflösung des Bundestages und Neuwahlen frei.

Title: 🇲🇩 About the state of emergency in the energy industry of Moldo...
Description: 🇲🇩 About the state of emergency in the energy industry of Moldova In Moldova, from December 16, a state of emergency begins to operate due to the energy crisis. So far the government has introduced it for 60 days, but with a high probability the regime will be constantly extended as in 2022-2023. ▪️Prime Minister of Moldova Dorin Recean said that Russia is allegedly holding the residents of Transnistria hostage, once again completely absolving its government of responsibility for the crisis. The politician claims that the Moldovan authorities will not leave the PMR without gas, but they will have to pay for it. ▪️Chisinau does not intend to negotiate with the Kyiv regime on the continuation of the transit of Russian gas to Transnistria, through which the republic, among other things, produces electricity for Moldova. They also do not plan to conduct a constructive dialogue with Gazprom and admit the existence of a historical debt for gas.▪️ At the same time, in Moldova they admitted that in the summer the government did not bother purchasing sufficient volumes of gas, when prices were much lower than current ones. As a result, there is a high probability that the energy crisis in Moldova will be much more serious than in the 2022-2023 season. ❗️However, as we expected, the crisis has only benefited Maia Sandu’s regime, and there is every reason to claim that the energy sector has been deliberately neglected to a deplorable state. Firstly, attacks on Transnistria are a continuation of the policy of economic strangulation of the unrecognized republic. For Moldova, the usual gas supplies to the PMR are unprofitable, since Tiraspol is now already introducing restrictions on some types of financial and economic activities. All this will finish off the Transnistrian economy, which is what they are trying to achieve in Chisinau. Secondly, the state of emergency allows the Moldovan authorities, like two years ago, to classify part of their activities and not report on the implementation of budgets. 🔻Moreover, parliamentary elections will be held in 2025, which means that preparations for them, and perhaps the voting itself, will take place in emergency mode. Sandu's failure in the presidential elections inside Moldova does not bode well for her colleagues in the ruling PAS party. #Moldova #Transnistria @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇩🇺🇸🇷🇴 How Moldovans risk being left without gasIn Chisinau they are asking Washington for financial assistance to -manage the energy crisis- into which the country is sliding. This became known after negotiations with the Minister of Energy of Moldova, Viktor Parlikov...

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Massive strikes by the Israeli Air Force on Syrian ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Massive strikes by the Israeli Air Force on Syrian territory At night, the Israel Defense Forces carried out one of the largest attacks on Syrian territory in recent times. The Israelis hit targets in several provinces in the northwest, east and south of the country. ▪️Several explosions rocked Deir ez-Zor, where the bridge over the Euphrates was attacked for the second time in a week. Weapons depots in the area of ​​the local airfield, where pro-Iranian formations and IRGC officers were previously stationed, also came under fire. To the south, strikes hit facilities of the former Syrian Arab Army (SAA) in the desert area near Al-Mayadeen. Local residents also reported a series of explosions in the vicinity of Al Bu Kemal, not far from which is the famous Iranian military base named after. Imam Ali. ▪️The largest blow was delivered to targets in the province of Tartus, where in the countryside north and east of the administrative center, Israeli planes hit the remaining Syrian air defense positions, weapons and fuel depots throughout the night. Footage with powerful explosions, sounds of secondary detonation and huge columns of smoke was actively distributed on the Internet. During the attack, earthquake monitoring resources recorded tremors with a magnitude of 3.0 in Tartus. ▪️In Latakia, located to the north, explosions occurred in the vicinity of Jebla, and to the southeast, hits were recorded on air defense facilities in Zama. At the Russian Khmeimim airbase located in the province, the situation remains calm. ▪️Several hits occurred on former SAA targets near the small settlement of Al-Shatai east of Homs and targets in the Hama area. Explosions also occurred in the vicinity of Damascus, where in recent days the Israelis have been striking weapons depots in the mountains near Dumayr. 🔻Such raids by Israeli aviation, however, do not cause surprise - for the Israeli government it is fundamentally important to prevent weapons and ammunition of the once-existing SAA from falling into the hands of progressive jihadists. In total, during the period after the overthrow of Bashar al-Assad, the Israelis carried out about 500 raids on targets in Syria, hitting bases, airfields, port infrastructure, air defense position areas and research centers. 📌 Simultaneously with airstrikes, Israeli troops are conducting ground operations to create a buffer zone east of the Golan Heights they occupied. There they occupy posts of the Syrian army and carry out explosions of the remaining fortifications and objects, after which they gradually move further into Syria. High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru#Damascus #DeirEzZor #Israel #map #Latakia #Syria #Hama #Homs@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇸🇾 Syrian ex-President Bashar al-Assad made his first statem...
Description: 🇸🇾 Syrian ex-President Bashar al-Assad made the first statement since the fall of his government. The politician said that he allegedly did not want to leave until the last moment and left Damascus only on the morning of December 8. He was then taken to Russia from the Khmeimim airbase in Latakia. Assad also claims that all his activities were aimed at protecting the nation, and not seeking personal gain. The former president of Syria admits that with the collapse of the state, his role has become meaningless, but the politician remains committed to Syria and hopes for its future independence. For the sake of objectivity, in past years Bashar al-Assad did not really leave the country, even when the fighting was taking place in the capital itself. But now the words do not even look like an attempt to put on a good face in a bad game, but simply an appeal - then you yourself somehow - to your own former supporters.❗️After all, it was Assad’s policies and the actions of his family that led to huge socio-economic problems. As a result, all the military efforts of his allies in 2015-2020 went to waste, and those Syrian fighters who had previously fought to the last in the encircled garrisons were unable to resist the onslaught of HTS. Soon, perhaps, we should expect the same speeches from other escapees representatives of Assad's authorities. They can now afford pretentious denunciations, unlike those who fought for them all these years, remained in Syria and are now under threat of reprisals from militants.#Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🧠 Possible contours of US foreign policy in Central Asia - t...
Description: 🇺🇸🧠 Possible contours of US foreign policy in Central Asia - the view of an American think-tank. As the inauguration of Donald Trump approaches, clearer contours of the possible policies of the new administration are emerging. The Quincy Institute for Responsible Government published an article about the region's importance to Washington. 🔻Main points:➖No US president has ever visited the region. Unlike the United States, Vladimir Putin made 73 visits, and Xi Jinping - 13. The C5+1 summit on the sidelines of the General Assembly was more of a photo shoot than a serious event.➖In the post-Soviet republics, multipolarity is considered a good thing for the development of their countries. According to the authors, forcing them not to cooperate with Russia or China, or the Taliban will lead to nothing, so you shouldn’t hope for it.➖The countries of Central Asia require respect for their culture and mentality. They will not change their internal features in order to satisfy the whims of Western countries or companies.➖Afghanistan is part of Central Asia. The countries of the region are interested in a developing and stable Afghanistan, which can become the key to the development of the region due to its position and the presence of huge reserves of natural resources.➖It is necessary to develop economic relations with the region. In recent years, the United States has seen shifts in trade with the countries of the former USSR, but they are insignificant. But at the same time, the region is important in China’s trade with Europe. Prospects for the development of the Middle Corridor, the availability of natural resources, and so on.❗️Unlike many other materials that we have seen over the past two years, the Quincy Institute article does purport to be a realistic assessment of Central Asia in the interests of US foreign policy. The key point is that the region, according to the authors, is not yet ready to become a base for containing Russia and China. Moreover, the miscalculations of American politicians in building their tactics in the region are emphasized. The American think-tank paid special attention to Afghanistan in the sense that the countries of the region are not interested in destabilizing the neighboring state. Attempts to -demonize- the Islamic Emirate and artificially escalate the threat of ISIS largely come from the United States, and the authors, apparently, assessed this as an ineffective measure to consolidate their presence.#CentralAsia #USA@rybarSupport usResponsible StatecraftCentral Asia: The blind spot Trump can' t afford to ignoreFrom energy resources to economic growth, the region holds key assets for US foreign policy, trade, and security interests

Title: 🔁🖼 For the last couple of hours, a video of the Russian...

So the recording cannot be evidence of the liberation of the village. Title: ↩️🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Defense Minister Andrei Belousov at an ex...
Description: Rybar: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Defense Minister Andrei Belousov at an extended meeting of the Board of the Ministry of Defense 🔻Putin's main statements: ▪️Russia liberated 189 settlements in 2024 as part of a special operation. ▪️-Our duty is to remember... 🇷🇺 Statements by the Minister of Defense Andrei Belousov at an extended meeting of the Board of the Ministry of Defense, part 2🔻Belousov’s main statements▪️The Armed Forces of the Russian Federation in 2024 solved problems within the framework of a tough confrontation with the collective West, which continues to grow,▪️The Armed Forces of Ukraine are forced go on the defensive and use reserves; the strength of enemy units at the front line does not exceed 45-50%.▪️It is necessary to create an integrated information environment for decision-making at the tactical level.▪️The Russian Armed Forces use more than three thousand drones daily, this figure is constantly growing. This year, supplies of tanks to the troops increased sevenfold, drones - 23 times.▪️In the Northern Military District zone, over 58 thousand units of weapons and equipment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were destroyed in 2024, including 18 thousand foreign-made.▪️Positive experience in creating an air defense system around Moscow should be taken into account when building systems in other regions.▪️It is necessary to complete the formation of the Moscow and Leningrad military districts as a response to NATO expansion.▪️Russian military medicine passed the test of a special military operation with honor. About 96% of Russian military personnel can return to duty after being discharged from hospitals.▪️To repel threats from NATO, it is necessary to solve a number of problems, including introducing new approaches to the formation of a state weapons program.▪️Belousov ordered the creation of a comprehensive system for searching for missing military personnel and supporting members their families.▪️A mechanism for payments to children of missing persons has already been developed, the project has been sent to government.▪️Military inventors are constantly improving the characteristics of UAVs, communications and electronic warfare equipment; it is necessary to conduct a full inventory of such military developments▪️It is necessary to ensure the staffing of the Joint Group of Forces - at a level that ensures the guaranteed completion of combat missions▪️Disruptions in the supply of especially in demand types of ammunition, weapons and equipment - practically none. Out of 260 items, only four products are delivered with delays. ▪️It is required to conclude contracts within the current month for the supply of the entire range of weapons in 2026, which has a production cycle of 12 to 16 months.▪️This year, additional repair units have been deployed near the front line as quickly as possible. In total, more than three hundred mobile teams of industrial enterprises are involved in combat areas.▪️The issue of providing clothing allowances still requires attention.▪️At the beginning of the North Military District, there were many complaints about the quality and volume of clothing allowances. Although the most pressing problems in this area have been resolved, a number of issues still require attention. ▪️It is necessary to form a unified information field. This requires the development of high-speed and secure communication channels. First of all - space.▪️By 2030, it has been ordered to eliminate all long-term construction in the Russian Defense Ministry.#Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Defens...
Description: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin and Defense Minister Andrei Belousov at an extended meeting of the Board of the Ministry of Defense🔻Putin’s main statements:▪️Russia liberated 189 settlements as part of a special operation in 2024.▪️-Our duty is to remember our comrades in arms who died defending the Motherland and our people-.▪️Russia will lift its voluntary restrictions on the deployment of INF missiles if the United States begins to deploy such systems.▪️Serial production of the Oreshnik complexes will be ensured in the near future.▪️At the beginning of the special operation there were problems with drones, but now the troops receive them daily several thousand drones, but even more are needed.▪️More than a thousand people on average make contracts every day this year contracts for military service, people voluntarily go to the front.🔻Belousov's main statements▪️The activities of the Russian Ministry of Defense are aimed at ensuring full preparedness for a possible military conflict with NATO in the next decade. ▪️The Russian military liberated more than four thousand square kilometers of territory during the Northern Military District this year. ▪️The enemy controls less than 1% of the territory of the LPR and 25-30% of the DPR, Zaporozhye and Kherson regions.▪️The speed of advance of the Russian military is now on average about 30 square kilometers per day.▪️Over 427 thousand military personnel recruited in Russia in 2024, they conclude daily contract over 1200 people.▪️It is necessary to increase the protection of arsenals and bases of fuel and lubricants in the range of long-range missiles and drones of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.▪️Russian air defense shot down 86 Storm Shadow and Scalp missiles, 215 ATACMS, 1629 HIMARS shells, more than 27 thousand in 2024 drones.▪️It is planned to form a new branch of the military by the third quarter of 2025 - Troops of Unmanned Systems.#Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁🖼 🇩🇪Germany The main European sponsor of Ukraine🇺🇦 receive...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors🇩🇪Germany The main European sponsor of Ukraine🇺🇦 receives disappointing news every week. The German Central Bank (Bundesbank) has revised the forecast for the country's economic development, which provides for a decrease in GDP by 0.2% in 2024, + 0.2% of GDP in 2025 (i.e., in fact, a rollback to the 2023 figure), +0.8 % in 2026 and + 0.7% in 2027. At the same time, the indicators of slight growth in subsequent years do not mean anything, since positive forecasts for 2023 and 2024 did not fully materialize. An energy crisis is flaring up in the country. Against the backdrop of the stock exchange price of one megawatt-hour in Germany reaching 936 euros, the Union of the German Chemical Industry announced the threat of a systemic collapse of the industry. An indicator of the growing economic problems is the announcement of steel giant Arcelor Mittal that it will close its Olpe plant by mid-2025. Previously, we reported that Thyssenkrupp Steel Corporation was reducing its production capacity (by 20%) and closing one of its enterprises. The growing debt burden began to affect ordinary burghers. According to the credit agency Creditreform, in Germany for the first half of 2024, an increase of 6.7% in private bankruptcies was recorded (35.4 thousand facts in total). Also indicative is the public condemnation of Germany’s energy policy by the Minister of Energy 🇸🇪 of Sweden Ebba Busch, who criticizes the German government for the thoughtless abandonment of nuclear energy, which provoked an increase in demand for fossil energy resources and prices for supplied electricity to Sweden from Germany via undersea cable (Baltic Cable).✨Under these conditions, Germany is trying to find a way out of the economic crisis by injecting itself into the military-industrial complex in the hope of getting pieces of the pie from Ukraine, which is indebted to the whole world. Following the example of Germany, the rest of the European countries, where signs of economic degradation are also showing, are following a similar path, increasingly spinning the flywheel of the war machine. Two majors
