Title: 🇧🇫🇲🇱🇳🇪 How is the integration of the Sahel States going? Ov...
Description: 🇧🇫🇲🇱🇳🇪 How is the integration of the Sahel States going? Over the past few months since the signing of the agreement between Burkina Faso, Niger and Mali on the creation of the Confederation, the integration processes of the three states have continued. Among the first decisions taken: the creation of a single passport and a television channel, but our attention was drawn more to measures of an economic nature.▪️The most important step was the creation of the Investment Bank and the Stabilization Fund of the Three States. Now economic sovereignty will be achieved through internal resources and support from Russia. The governments of the three countries, which actively cooperate with Russian companies in the energy sector, are counting on the latter.▪️Foreign policy has acquired a common course: for example, it is worth remembering how the authorities of the three countries broke off diplomatic relations with the so-called. Ukraine. General coordination in matters of diplomacy allows you to have connections with many supranational organizations. The results of the decisions made will not be noticeable immediately, but their declared goal is to receive economic assistance in creating an industrial base, and not money to patch up holes. The same, hopefully, applies to security issues. Using the example of Syria, we have already seen what happens if you refuse to build national armies and rely exclusively on external actors.#Africa #BurkinaFaso #Mali #Niger@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇱🇧🇫🇳🇪 How the first summit of the Alliance of Sahel States took place on July 6 in the capital of Niger Niamey hosted the first summit of the Alliance of States Sahel, which unites anti-Western governments in West Africa. As a result, steps were taken to create a confederation...

Title: 🇰🇬🇺🇸 About the new phase of the internal political struggle i...
Description: 🇰🇬🇺🇸 About the new phase of the internal political struggle in Kyrgyzstan Today it became known that Akylbek Japarov wrote a letter of resignation from the post of Prime Minister of Kyrgyzstan. This is a person who is considered a conductor of Western interests, primarily the USA and Great Britain.❗️A tour of Great Britain last fall, increasingly frequent visits by representatives of the Rothschild family to the republic in order to gain control over natural resources, constant meetings with the British ambassador in Bishkek - this only a small part of Akylbek Japarov’s merits over the past year. In Kyrgyzstan itself, Akylbek Japarov is considered almost a national treasure due to the fact that under him the economy of Kyrgyzstan grew sharply. However, for some reason, everyone forgets that the jump occurred during the period of sanctions on Russia, and the associated bypass through partner countries such as Kyrgyzstan. Considering the role of the ex-prime minister in the events around Kyrgyzstan, it is extremely unlikely that his political career is over. According to rumors from Kyrgyz sources, Akylbek Japarov has already been given an agremand for the post of Ambassador of Kyrgyzstan to the United States. 📌 As for replacing the Prime Minister, the situation here is interesting, and there are several options for development.➖Firstly, the power bloc may be strengthened. In such situations, the head of the State Committee for National Security, Kamchybek Tashiev, will strengthen his position through the vacancy.➖Former Prime Minister Omurbek Babanov is considered another candidate. His appearance in this position will balance the political and regional alignments in Kyrgyzstan, taking into account his connections and financial capabilities.➖Well, the third option is the most compromise. A politician without serious influence will be appointed, which will make him a convenient figure for representatives of both the security and political blocs. The further development of events will depend on the appointment of the head of the government of Kyrgyzstan. Considering that elections are at stake (and, possibly, early elections), this post can determine the entire policy and development of the internal political situation in Kyrgyzstan.#Kyrgyzstan #USA@rybarSupport usInterfaxPrime Minister of Kyrgyzstan Akylbek Japarov has been relieved of his postPrime Minister of Kyrgyzstan Akylbek Japarov has been relieved of his post, sources in the presidential administration told Interfax.

Title: 🖼 🇸🇩 The situation in Sudan: the liberation of Sinj and the fi...
Description: 🇸🇩 The situation in Sudan: the liberation of Sinj and the fighting in El Fasher as of December 15, 2024 Over the past month, the Sudanese army has continued to develop its offensive and consolidate previous successes: previously, the armed forces managed to cut off the Sennar ledge. However, the rebels represented by the Rapid Reaction Forces (RRF) do not give up and are strengthening their positions in the south.▪️The offensive of the armed forces in the Sennar region led to the liberation of its administrative center, the city of Sinja. Some towns in the vicinity and north of Sennar were also retaken. With this, the army finally broke the communications of the rebel group in the White Nile with the rest of the forces.▪️However, this did not stop the RRF in its advance along the border with South Sudan. During the last battles, they managed to occupy some settlements in the Blue Nile. In this area, the Sudanese armed forces are experiencing a shortage of personnel. At the same time, the army is using its advantage in aviation and conducting counterattacks.▪️In the west of the country, bloody battles continue in the city of El Fasher. RRF militants were able to advance to the city center, capturing several areas. There is also significant support from rebel artillery in this direction. ▪️In the capital, fighting remains intense - the armed forces have failed to expand their bridgehead in Khartoum. At the same time, RRF militants cannot drive the army out of Omdurman by carrying out unsuccessful attacks.🔻The situation is increasingly in favor of government forces who do not agree to peace initiatives, counting on new victories. At the same time, external actors still insist on resolving the conflict through negotiations. 📌So, Turkish President Recep Erdogan also offered his help. According to him, Turkey can also become a negotiating platform between the official government of Sudan and the sponsors of the rebel RRF from the UAE. Another Turkish peace initiative in the negotiations between Somalia and Ethiopia quickly failed, which is why the prospects for Turkish mediation in Sudan confuse many. This is also understood in Sudan, where they strongly support Russian economic projects and diplomatic initiatives. High-resolution map Russian version#Africa #Sudan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of December 16, 2024 ▪️In the Kursk r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of December 16, 2024▪️In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports fierce battles in the Sudzhansky district, our units are advancing near Guevo. ▪️ North of Kupyansk, our troops continue to form bridgeheads on the right bank of the river. Oskol. There have been separate reports about the creation of a new landing point for the Russian Armed Forces - against the settlement. Masyutovka▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces advanced to the Khimkolonka microdistrict further to the west in urban development. The enemy, retreating, undermines the abandoned buildings. Heavy fighting is going on.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction there are battles near the settlement. Shevchenko, located south of the city. It was reported that the enemy brought reserves into battle to hold Pokrovsk.▪️ In Kurakhovo, the enemy admits the complete loss of a block of multi-storey buildings. Most of the city is under the Russian Armed Forces. The battles near Constantinople continue, the Uspenivsky pocket is being cleared, Annovka has been taken. The Armed Forces of Ukraine never received an order to withdraw from their command, despite the obvious encirclement.▪️ In the Vremevsky direction, fighting for the settlement resumed. New Komar, which is located in the north of the cascade of these villages. It is noteworthy that the crossing of the Ukrainian Armed Forces through the water barrier near the settlement was destroyed. Novoocheretovatoe, along which the enemy was transferring reinforcements.▪️ Yesterday, three UAVs of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked Grozny in the morning. Two of them were shot down by air defense forces. The third fell on the territory of the riot police - AKHMAT-Grozny - Directorate of the Russian Guard for the Chechen Republic.▪️ Over the weekend, enemy strikes continued in the Belgorod region. On Saturday, a 9-year-old boy was killed in a drone attack on a residential building in the village of Maisky. His mother and seven-month-old sister were wounded.▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), as a result of an IED dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces onto a passenger car on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1958 was killed, a woman born in 1958 was wounded. The impact of NATO caliber cluster artillery shells on the street. Bolotnikov, a man born in 1974 was wounded, on Pobeda Ave. women born in 1966 and 1952 were wounded. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsVremevskoe direction, reports @voin_dvThe work of aviation of the Vostok group in the area of ​​the settlement. Novoocheretovatoe, north of Velikaya Novoselka. The enemy's crossing was destroyed by the FAB strike. There are separate reports of a new assault on New Komar. Preliminarily…

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week 9 - December 15, 2024▪️Russian troops, after a short lull, again launched a combined strike on enemy targets in the western regions of the so-called. Ukraine. In the Ivano-Frankivsk region, arrivals were noted in the area of ​​the Burshtyn thermal power plant and at the Kolomyia airfield, and in the Cherkasy region, the Kaniv hydroelectric power station was hit.▪️ At the same time, in the center of Dnepropetrovsk, local partisans detonated an explosive device on the territory of the regional military registration and enlistment office. As a result of the detonation, at least one TCC employee was killed, and several more police officers and military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were injured.▪️Ukrainian formations, in turn, after a long period of time again tried to attack the military airfield in Saratov. The drone was shot down on approach to the facility, without causing any damage to the infrastructure.▪️The enemy did not ignore the facilities of the fuel and energy complex. As a result of flying through the territory of a loading point in Bryansk, a fire broke out at the facility, which was quickly extinguished.▪️Another energy facility was damaged by a raid by Ukrainian drones on an oil storage facility near Orel. As a result of the detonation of the UAV, two fuel tanks caught fire, which were extinguished after 23 hours.▪️In addition, Ukrainian formations attacked the Rostov region for the first time with American operational-tactical missiles. As a result of the air defense, two missiles were shot down and four more were diverted from their course by electronic warfare systems. There is no significant damage, there are casualties among the personnel.▪️Twice in a week, the barracks buildings of the special regiment of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in Grozny are also damaged. As a result of one of the Ukrainian drone attacks, at least four guard soldiers were injured.▪️And in the Leningrad region, one of the Ukrainian drones carried out reconnaissance of the area in the area of ​​Vysotsky Island. As a result of the work of air defense forces, the drone fell in the Gulf of Finland, there was no damage or casualties.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Decembe...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on December 14-15, 2024. Russian troops attacked enemy targets in the central and eastern regions of the so-called. Ukraine, and also shot down a Ukrainian plane in the occupied part of the Kherson region. Ukrainian formations carried out several acts of sabotage, and also attacked with drones an oil depot in the suburbs of Orel and one of the Russian Guard bases in Grozny, Chechen Republic. Fierce fighting is taking place in the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction in the area of ​​​​Kruglyakovka and Zagryzovo . According to some reports, from Masyutovka, the Russian Armed Forces carried out a landing on the right bank of Oskol. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, attack aircraft entered the Khimkolonka microdistrict and cleared the western outskirts of the Zabalka microdistrict, moving further into Dzerzhinsky. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops are fighting within the borders of Shevchenko , and also improved their tactical position in the Nikolaevka area by north of Novogrodovka. In the Kurakhovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated most of Kurakhovo and hoisted a flag on the local administration building in the city center. Fighting continues on the western outskirts of Uspenivka and Constantinople.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction (ru; en) )Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction (ru; en)⭐️ Online maps are available at subscribe to map.rybar.ru #Grozny #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #map #Kupyansk #Kurakhovo #Orel #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #Kherson@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Protests are taking place in Tbilisi again this evening....
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 Protests are taking place in Tbilisi again this evening. However, judging by the amount of news, interest in them is steadily declining. The victory in the presidential elections of Mikheil Kavelashvili, a candidate from the ruling Georgian Dream party, means that the opposition will soon lose one of its symbolic leaders in a high post - Salome Zurabishvili, who actively called on fellow citizens to street protests according to the scenario of the Ukrainian Maidan. The next escalation is now expected on December 29 - after Kavelashvili’s inauguration - because Zurabishvili will no longer have any rights to occupy residences and call himself president. However, this protest (if it exists) will most likely quickly fade for a number of reasons:➖because the president in Georgia is still a ceremonial figure, for the sake of whose salvation it is unlikely that it will be possible to raise large masses of dissatisfied people;➖the opposition is not united in its fight against government;➖The West, represented by the same Macron, demonstrates its readiness to maintain connections and communicate with official Tbilisi - an example of this is the recent telephone conversation between the French leader and Bidzina Ivanishvili;➖in Georgia they respond in the same way, saying that they do not refuse to join the EU. 🔻And, probably, such a balancing, subject to the prompt response of the Georgian authorities to the excesses and new provocations of the opposition, will allow the government to continue to restrain destructive forces in a comfortable manner.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for December 14-15, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on Jabaliya and Gaza. Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸 Donald Trump appointed Richard Grenell as special envoy...
Description: Forwarded From American Issue🇺🇸 Donald Trump appointed Richard Grenell as special envoy for special missions, entrusting him with work in sensitive regions such as Venezuela and North Korea. In fact, his candidacy was previously considered for the post of US Secretary of State, but the position ultimately went to the vice chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee, Marco Rubio.🔻What could Grenell's appointment mean and how will it affect the policies of the Trump administration?▪️Grenell's diplomatic style is characterized by directness and a willingness to negotiate toughly, which is generally consistent with Trump's approach to international relations. This also indirectly indicates the future administration's willingness to use unconventional methods to resolve crises.▪️Grenell's experience in the Balkans (role in resolving differences between Serbia and Kosovo) demonstrates an emphasis on making quick, but not always sustainable, deals.▪️Grenell shares Trump's philosophy that that foreign policy should be based on transactions, not ideological principles. This could mean an increased pragmatic approach to negotiations, with compromises based on economic or military benefits for the United States.▪️Although Grenell was not appointed special envoy for Ukraine, his views, including proposals for the creation of autonomous zones in eastern Ukraine and skepticism about NATO expansion may still influence the Trump administration's policy towards the Ukrainian conflict.▪️For US allies, this could be a signal of tougher approach to security issues and trade relations - for example, with Germany and the European Union, with which Grenell had tense relations during his tenure as ambassador. ▪️For Russia and China, Grenell's appointment is a signal of U.S. readiness to employ more assertive diplomatic tactics.▪️Grenell's appointment as special envoy for special missions signals the Trump administration's intent to aggressively advance its foreign policy priorities through direct diplomacy and the use of proven personnel.▪️Grenell is one of the key figures of the -Trumpist- approach to governance: the emphasis on personal loyalty is more important than traditional bureaucratic expertise. In general, Trump's approach to selection candidates for such positions are not much different from the methods of the previous administration. Now the Trump team is selling the people -protection of US interests-, and under Biden it was called -defense of democracy-. In fact, everything is primarily subordinated to one thing - protecting the interests of America’s economic and military corporations. And with the advent of Donald Trump, this approach is unlikely to change.@usaperiodical

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: breakthrough to the...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction: breakthrough into the Khimkolonka microdistrict and liberation of the Zabalka microdistrict, situation as of 18:00 on December 15, 2024. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovskoe direction, Russian troops pushed through enemy defenses in several areas in Dzerzhinsk at once. ▪️Fierce fighting in the city is taking place in the central market area. Previously, in this area, the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces relied on the mine named after. Dzerzhinsky - reserves were accumulated there before subsequent transfer to urban areas. After the structure came under the control of Russian troops, the stability of the enemy’s defense line was seriously compromised. ▪️Southwest of the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in the Khimkolonka microdistrict, relying on the mine. This would have been impossible without the liquidation of the positions of the Ukrainian formations on the waste heaps, from where the UAV calculations were adjusted and the area was monitored. ▪️At the moment, waste heaps No. 1 and 2 are in the gray zone, and the enemy’s attempts to regain control over them are being thwarted. Taking into account recently received georeferences and data from local sources, Russian attack aircraft are confidently advancing in this area and eliminating the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense centers. It is likely that the Russian Armed Forces will soon gain a foothold on the heights, which will create additional difficulties for the enemy garrison. ❗️A characteristic feature of the battle for Dzerzhinsk was the widespread use of sapper units by the parties. With their help, the enemy blows up multi-story buildings in order to prevent the Russian Armed Forces from using them as shelters. ▪️In the south of the city, Russian troops completely knocked out Ukrainian formations from the Zabalka microdistrict. In recent weeks, the enemy has sought to prevent its western outskirts from coming under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, for which purpose he has been transferring reserves across roads near waste heaps. These routes were scouted by Russian UAV crews, as a result of which many armored groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were burned on the approaches to the microdistrict. Establishing control over waste heaps and the success of the offensive in the Khimkolonka microdistrict will create the preconditions for an offensive in the northern part of Dzerzhinsk with the subsequent creation of a northern claw envelopment around the remaining in the city of the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison. It is likely that in the near future the RF Armed Forces will concentrate on suppressing the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the waste heaps of the Toretskaya mine, which are the predominant heights within the city. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version⭐️ Online maps are available by subscription to map.rybar.ru #Dzerzhinsk # digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺📸🖍 Day of Remembrance for Journalists Who Died in the Li...
Description: 🇷🇺📸🖍 Day of Remembrance for Journalists Who Died in the Line of Duty December 15 is a special date when we remember those who dedicated their lives to the truth and died while remaining faithful to their professional and human duty. Journalists, reporters, photographers, television cameramen who go to the most dangerous places in the world not only document history, but also make it accessible to each of us. Wars, local conflicts, disasters and hot spots are not only an arena of military action, but also a place where those who strive to tell about events honestly, without distorting reality, work. They often pay the ultimate price for this devotion. Relatives, friends and colleagues remember and honor everyone who passed away while fulfilling their mission. Their sacrifice reminds us of the importance and value of truth, for which they risked everything. Remembering them means continuing the fight for justice and honest information in a world where it is often rare. High resolution art#art #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 Today, together with the Rybar team, we are launching a proj...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: about the landing of th...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: about the landing of the Russian Armed Forces in the Masyutovka area; the situation as of 16:00 on December 15, 2024. The Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction was again in the spotlight. The enemy's analysts were again to blame for this. Since the night, in the Ukrainian media segment, unsubstantiated statements about the next crossing of the Russian Armed Forces through Oskol from Masyutovka to the opposite bank have been massively replicated.▪️At the moment, this story is reminiscent of the recent events near Novomlynsk, when the Ukrainian media announced a landing of the Russian Armed Forces in the village, who later heroically managed to knock him out of the village. Following the battles, not a single trophy from the battlefield or Russian prisoner of war was demonstrated. Until this hour, no clear footage of objective control had been received from the Masyutovka area, which could confirm not just the consolidation of Russian military personnel in this area, but even just their presence. Previously, there were such personnel from the enemy, but now there are none. Information from the field also does not confirm a Russian landing on the right bank of Oskol.🔻The area itself is also not conducive to crossing to the opposite bank of the river. The difference in elevation is about a hundred meters: the entire territory held by the Russian army near Masyutovka and Gryannikovka is located in the lowlands, and the opposite bank, in addition to the dominant heights, is also replete with nature reserves and a large number of forests, in which infantry and equipment can be secretly accumulated to repel potential Russian attacks. ▪️Fierce clashes continue in the area of ​​Kolesnikovka and Zagryzovo. Ukrainian formations and the Russian Armed Forces strike positions and use heavy armored vehicles in fire raids.▪️In addition, messages appear online on various sources, both from pro-Russian and pro-Ukrainian sources, about the advance of Russian troops in the vicinity of Lozovaya and to the north-west from Cherry. The information has not yet been confirmed by objective monitoring personnel, however, it is possible that the Russian Armed Forces launched attacks in this area in recent days, taking advantage of weather conditions unfavorable for UAV operators. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, — You can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kupyansk #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ⭐️🖍#Comic 810 No. 1: Sudzha The Fisherman Team together with ...
Description: ⭐️🖍#Comic 810 No. 1: SudzhaTeam Rybar, together with the leadership of Sevastopol, is launching a project dedicated to the 810th Separate Guards Order of Zhukov and Ushakov Marine Brigade of the Black Sea Fleet. The occasion is more than worthy - the birthday of the brigade, which is turning 57 years old. Since its founding in 1967, the Marines of the 810th have repeatedly proven that they are ready to defend the country in the most difficult conditions. Based on the number of units formed and the range of tasks performed, it is high time for the 810th brigade to be called a division. Today, 810 fighters find themselves on a variety of fronts - including the Sudzhansky district of the Kursk region, where they continue to fight Ukrainian formations. For the head of Sevastopol Mikhail Razvozhaev @razvozhaev, this project is not just a tribute. The leadership of the hero city understands that the existing formats for conveying information about the exploits of the Marines are not enough - especially when it comes to the younger generation. Comic 810 is intended to serve as a reminder that the Marine Corps is not only the pride of the fleet, but also the support of the city, whose history is closely connected with military exploits.📍The first issue of the comic about the 810 Marine Brigade is available at the link #VSRF #Crimea #Russia #Sevastopol #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🗳 About massive violations of voting rights during elections...
Description: 🇲🇩🗳 About massive violations of voting rights in elections and referendums in MoldovaThe presidential elections and the referendum on European integration in Moldova have already been clearly recognized as valid, and the attention of the opposition (communists and socialists) has switched to preparations for the 2025 parliamentary elections. Against the backdrop of the unprecedented cancellation of the results of the first round of presidential elections in Romania, it can now be seen that a new standard of democracy has emerged in Eastern Europe at the instigation of the West. 🖇And recently an expert report appeared, incorporating facts of massive violations of the electoral rights of citizens of Moldova and reflecting these new -standards-. 🔻Foreign interference▪️The Central Election Commission of Moldova, which should be independent and financed from the state budget, allowed the UNDP to develop its website with money from the American USAID, the British UKAid and the Embassy of the Netherlands.▪️Most of the candidates for the presidency had Romanian citizenship.▪️The head of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen before called on Moldovans to vote go to vote and promised the largest aid package of 1.8 billion euros.▪️The EU, at the request of Chisinau, sent a rapid response team to cyber threats, which monitored the cybersecurity situation during the first round and referendum. This group was headed by employees of the Lithuanian Ministry of Defense, it also included specialists from Belgium, the Netherlands, Croatia, Romania, Poland, Austria, Latvia.🔻Foreign voting ▪️234 polling stations were established for voting abroad. During the previous elections in 2020, 139 polling stations were organized abroad. Most of the new polling stations were in Europe and the USA.▪️For the first time, voting by mail was used, but only for the USA, Canada, Norway, Sweden, Iceland, Finland. ▪️In Russia, only two polling stations were organized, to which only 10,000 ballots were delivered. However, according to the Moldovan Ministry of Foreign Affairs, there are about 260,000 Moldovan citizens in the Russian Federation.▪️Sometimes the number of ballots in foreign polling stations exceeded the number of Moldovans in the country. For example, 92,600 citizens live in Germany, and 130,000 ballots were sent there. There were numerous other violations that affected the reliability of the voting results in the elections and referendum in Moldova. As a result, the president of the diaspora, Maia Sandu, along with her referendum, joined the club of illegitimate leaders along with Vladimir Zelensky and Solome Zarubashvili, which shows a demonstrative disregard for the institution of elections and the will of the people on the part of the West. #elections #Moldova #CIS @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇩 🗳 In a few days Before the second round of presidential elections, the Constitutional Court of Moldova approved the results of the referendum on European integration. Let us remind you that the referendum was won by a margin of less than 1%. At the same time, the majority of the population of Moldova voted against...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🖇️ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk ...
Description: 🇷🇺🖇️ Head of the @rybar analytical center Mikhail Zvinchuk spoke to employees of government organizations and non-governmental NGOs, youth and volunteer organizations of the Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug. There was a lot of talk about the correct positioning of projects, what role visual propaganda can play in the fight against disinformation, and what a humanitarian project should be like in order for the audience to react to it correctly. Next year in Yamal has been declared the Year of Heroes, so we talked in detail about our practices and approaches to forming the correct image of a hero - no matter whether we are talking about the indigenous peoples of the north, home front workers or veterans of the Northern Military District. Each hero must be unique and memorable: This is the only way to create a new galaxy of images and symbols that will become examples for contemporaries and the younger generation.#speech #mediatechnology #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇹🇬 About US nuclear expansion in Africa The American compan...
Description: 🇺🇸🇹🇬 About US nuclear expansion in Africa The American nuclear energy company NANO Nuclear Energy signed a memorandum of understanding with the Togolese government. This is the second such agreement by a US developer after Rwanda. As part of the memorandum, NANO Nuclear will supply small nuclear reactors, fuel plants and transport nuclear materials to Togo. In addition, Kenya is in the interests of American nuclear energy producers. After the protests that took place in the country, the Americans quickly picked up the weak President Ruto and imposed their services on him - green energy -.🔻This is the trend towards active expansion of American nuclear energy in Africa. Companies from the USA are trying to pick up all the markets where the French or other Western partners are leaving, until the Chinese or Rosatom take their place.#Africa #USA #Togo@rybarSupport usNANO Nuclear Energy Inc.NANO Nuclear Signs a Memorandum of Understanding with the Government of the Togolese Republic - NANO Nuclear EnergyNANO Nuclear to explore the peaceful use of atomic energy for sustainable socio-economic development in West African nation

Title: 🇺🇸🛰 The United States continues to invest in military space pr...
Description: 🇺🇸🛰 The United States continues to invest in military space projects. One of these is the Next-Gen OPIR program launched in 2018 to create a new generation satellite missile attack warning system (MSWS). The cost of implementing the initiative is estimated at $14 billion. The constellation will consist of two satellites in geostationary and two in polar highly elliptical orbit , with the first device planned to be launched at the end of 2025. The main contractor is Lockheed Martin Space. At the same time, the Pentagon is developing similar systems for placement in low and low-Earth orbit. In fact, we are talking about tracking the launches of any ballistic missiles anywhere in the world with prompt transmission of information about the exact location of the launch positions. Such programs again show what role the United States assigns to confrontation in space. By deploying space infrastructure, the Pentagon strives to gain technological superiority, which will help neutralize the fire capabilities of a potential (and not only) enemy. The transformation of space into the battlefield of modern conflicts is almost a fait accompli, in which the absence of countermeasures or similar systems is fraught with expected consequences in the event fighting with the side that has them.#space #weapons #USA@rybarSupport usMedia - Lockheed MartinLockheed Martin Advances First Next-Gen OPIR Missile Warning Satellite Toward LaunchSunnyvale, Calif., Dec. 10, 2024 – Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) fully assembled, powered-on and advanced the U.S. Space Force’s first Next-Generation Overhead Persistent Infrared (Next-Gen...

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for the morning of December 15, 2024 ▪️ On th...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Report for the morning of December 15, 2024▪️ On the eve of the negotiation process expected by Zelensky after Trump’s arrival in the White House (January 20), the enemy is increasing efforts to hold positions in the Kursk region, striking with long-range American weapons on our territory and forms strike formations to create new centers of tension. Thus, in the Kursk region, despite the collapse of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense in Plekhovo and the narrowing of logistics capabilities, the enemy is throwing expensive German and British tanks into battle, placing manpower in maneuverable defense, regardless of losses. The ATACMS strike on Taganrog caused a retaliatory massive raid on Ukrainian energy and military facilities, but clearly did not stop the bad guys in Kyiv, although even Trump admits the dead end of using not so many American missiles on Russian territory. Now the main question remains the direction of the Nazis’ final strike, which will allow them to create at least the appearance of a strong position if negotiations begin. Crimea, Bryansk, Kherson and Zaporozhye regions, if they become such a target, will only be used as a diversionary strike by the enemy. More and more often they are writing about a possible attempt by the Ukrainian Armed Forces to repeat the Kursk adventure in the Belgorod direction with movement across the border to the north along the rear of our group of troops. However, the enemy is now purposefully playing a big game of misinformation of our intelligence and is trying to hide his true intentions in the strongest information noise.▪️ Yesterday’s news about the transfer of an entire military unit to Pokrovsk (Krasnoarmeysk) indicates that the enemy has reserves. Preliminarily - the 3rd separate assault brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, the backbone of which consists of Azov terrorists. In fact, an elite unit has been brought into battle, the historical analogies are obvious. ▪️ In Kurakhovo and the surrounding area, the enemy forbids his almost completely encircled troops to retreat, despite requests from the field. On radio broadcasts, the Armed Forces of Ukraine's repeated appeals to the senior command do not find approval. The enemy is trying to delay our offensive at any cost.▪️ In the Kupyansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are trying to expand the bridgehead on the right bank of the river. Oskol, in Chasov Yar there are battles near the fireproof plant (the enemy’s main stronghold). On the Zaporozhye Front, advanced units are conducting offensive operations, but the main forces have not been brought into battle. The enemy is still expecting an attack on Kherson through the Dnieper, trying to completely reveal our plans. ▪️ The supply of equipment through the Ministry of Defense to advanced units remains a problematic issue. That is, the same Maviks, off-road vehicles and other technical equipment important for attack aircraft do not always quickly reach the front end. Hence the attacks on enemy positions in customized passenger cars, hundreds and hundreds of requests for volunteers. At the same time, Defense Minister Belousov is gradually taking personnel measures in relation to military leaders, trying not to break what is working. ▪️ The enemy’s actions in the information field are aimed at misleading our military leadership. A striking example were further exaggerations about the scale of damage after a missile strike this week. Although in fact in many places the lights were turned off to avoid network overloads while awaiting arrivals. Also, numerous reports from that side of the front about the deplorable state of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are only partly true. The enemy maintains combat stability, provides organized resistance, achieving the main strategic goal set for him by the West - inflicting maximum military and economic damage on our country. It doesn’t matter to Washington whether our troops took Annovka or not; the West is trying to drain our military potential against Ukraine as much as possible. In addition, the sent Ukrainian information about the severity of the battles is intended to justify to the remnants of the enemy population the reduction in the mobilization age, which the United States demands in exchange for new shipments of weapons. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above ▪️At the same time, military-technical support for Ukraine is developing, America’s European satellites are already preparing the population for an increase military spending, carrying out the deployment of military production to the detriment of the standard of living in the EU. On the other side…

Title: 🔁 I had time to take a little breath - I listened to this round ...
Description: Forwarded From Prince Cherkassky I had time to take a slight breath - I listened to this round table about the situation in Syria. I won’t try to be too clever; the smart people there have basically already said everything. I’ll add my thoughts (maybe I’ll repeat myself): 1. The Russian presence is now experiencing a catastrophe. We bet on the horse, saved (together) from death, but the horse turned out to be a donkey, which, however, we did not particularly strive to ennoble, as a result of which he unexpectedly died. And there’s nothing you can do about it—you need to realize, accept it, and move on. 2. You can’t have any illusions about the three-stars who seized power. Russia in this case is their enemy, or rather an ally of the main enemy, who conscientiously ironed them out and they remember this very well. And on occasion they remind you without microphones.3. Save who and how you can among the pro-Russian ones. The time will come (and it will definitely come) - all of them will be useful to us in the future. 4. Bases pinched by the Turks from the straits and with space blocked from the north, and now also as virtual hostages of HTS - devalue all those few advantages and are a negative factor. Contrary to the reasoning of the Turks, the Americans do not need any counterbalance from us now; they believe that they will figure it out themselves. The fact that there was a threat of sagging with Africa (even the supply of the bases themselves after the start of the Northern Military District became a problem) I, and not only me, wrote earlier, pointing out that additional safety routes are needed, both air and sea. Paradoxically, maintaining our bases could be beneficial for the Americans in order to remain a thorn in the side of the Turks, but not to such an extent as to actually lobby them.5. If Trump leaves Syria, he will be like Biden with Afghanistan. Let it be distant, without drama, but still. Abandoned allies and swelled with self-importance, Turkey is no longer a slightly lost NATO member that is too often insolent and self-willed. Again, the Gulf monarchies (KSA in the first place) will be even more strengthened in the idea that after Afghanistan the second time is no longer an accident and we need to somehow work more closely with others and look less back at such an ally.6. I think Qatar will give money to HTS or has already agreed, at least for the first time, so as not to stretch its legs. The main ones who want to bask in this are the Turks, given the leaky market and the instant flow of currency beyond the borders of the former Syria.7. If HTS still agrees to autonomy for the Kurds, this will be a blow for Turkey. And there is no need to compare Iraqi Kurdistan and Syrian. Even the Kurds themselves are different, not to mention the fact that Barzani has been collaborating with the Turks for a long time and is not friends with the PKK. There is no such Barzani in Syria, although there, too, within the Kurds there are about 50/50 those who are close to the PKK and those who are not. It’s just that the pro-PKK forces there are the most militant.8. Now the Syrian population (part of it) is euphoric. Everyone expects quick improvements after liberation from the bloody regime. Perhaps this will happen partially and in some places, but fundamentally, without huge injections of money for the purchase of oil (or the return of Trans-Euphrates, but it also needs to be restored) and wheat, spending on the restoration of basic infrastructure, the situation will not change, and most likely, on the contrary, will worsen. The bottom line is that we need to record damage, minimize further losses and allow the situation to drift further, monitoring and rebooting the concept. https://t.me/lukyanovtalk/287Telegram That same Lukyanov A dynamic and meaningful exchange of views on what is happening in Syria took place yesterday as part of the RIAC round table - The Syrian crisis: reasons for the aggravation of the situation and possible consequences - in MIA - Russia Today -.📽 The entry was posted in open access: Watch...
